Francais: Pendant la troisième année du règne de Joaquim, roi de Juda , le roi de Babylone, Nabucodonosor, vint assiéger Jérusalem.
Anglais: In the third year of the reign of  Jehoiakim king of Judah,  Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came to Jerusalem and besieged it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata ɦidita vi Yehoyakim hay mulda vi Yuda, Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilon co'o, nam mot Yerusalem.
Bulu: Mbu lale Yeôyakim, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Nébukatnétzar; njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga soo nkane mewosane wé a dili tisone Yérusalém a bita.
Guiziga: Ti Zoˀakiŋ, buy Zuda mazum buy ngi vi mimakir naŋ na, Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a sawa, a tiɓa Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yehoyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, tataɓu, Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, wari, hippi Urusaliima .
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yehoyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, tataɓu, Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, wari, hippi Urusaliima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Jɔakim wannu Juda, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ kɛr Jerusalɛm e nu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Jɔakim wannu Juda, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ kɛr Jerusalɛm e nu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mahekene ta va ta Zhowakim, meghe nya mbe Zhəwda mbe meghe ne, pa Nabəkodonozor, meghe nya mbe Babilone se kahave nda mpa ke Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de swa' maga Yehoyakim wañ Juda hay joñ wañ mono, Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon raw urgi wo le' Jerusalem day raw kañge ne hen jag go de cir ti äe go de sode wo.

Francais: Le Seigneur livra Joaquim en son pouvoir, et le laissa s’emparer d’une partie des ustensiles sacrés du temple de Dieu. Nabucodonosor emmena des prisonniers en Babylonie et déposa le butin dans le temple de ses dieux, dans la salle du trésor .
Anglais: The Lord gave Jehoiakim king of Judah into his hand, along with some of the articles of the house of God; and he brought them into the land of  Shinar, to the house of his god, and brought the articles into the treasury of his god.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum-Sumuna vul Yehoyakim mulla vi Yuda hay ɓalamu, hiɗi galla vi slen ma ka hay ziyda vi Lawna kaw. Nam jokom hay nagata Sineyar,  hay ziyna vi lawayna valamu. Nam lak jakŋa hay timgilla vi ziyda vi lawayna valamu.
Bulu: Nti a nga ve Yeôyakim, njô bôte ya Yuda, e mo me njô bôte ya Babilôn, a ve fe nye éfase bisua a bilaé ya nda Zambe, nye ve kee bie e si ya Sinéar, e nda zambe wé; a nga futi bisua a bilaé bite e ndaa énaan akume zambe wé.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a vula Zoˀakiŋ asi haŋ ngi Nabukodonozor. Joˀ Nabukodonozor a hil cah avu gazlanga ngir hay ngi Buymisemuŋ. A ji mizli ng'ar dangay ngi Babiloŋ, yo a pa gwat mitiɓa ar vurumo ng'ar hay ngi kuli naŋhay, ar hay ngi pi zlili.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo hokki mo Yehoyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, non boo yeɓre kuuwruɗe gonɗe nder haykaliiru Allah. Nabukodonosor yahri ɗe haa suudu ɗowanteeɓe muuɗum haa lesdi Sine'ar, nastini ɗe nder ndesaari ɗowanteeɓe mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo hokki mo Yehoyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, non boo yeɓre kuuwruɗe gonɗe nder haykaliiru Allah. Nabukodonosor yahri ɗe haa suudu ɗowanteeɓe muuɗum haa lesdi Sine'ar, nastini ɗe nder ndesaari ɗowanteeɓe mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ee Jɔakim wannu Juda kɔ̧ er-a in o ŋma nyɛk mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧. A̧ baa a̧ in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ sɛn nu Sinɛar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ee Jɔakim wannu Juda kɔ̧ er-a in o ŋma nyɛk mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧. A̧ baa a̧ in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ sɛn nu Sinɛar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə vame Zhowakim, meghe nya mbe Zhəwda ba'a bela ta wəshi kemene slene nyi mbe ghɛa Shala mbe dzeve ta ŋkɛ. Pa ŋkɛ fəghe ka mavashi kajive Babilone ba'a beteyi wəshi kemene slene mbe ghɛa yɛ shala ta ŋkɛ, mbe cɛ kebete yɛ shala ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Manwur raw haç Yehoyakim wañ Juda go ne hen do de te feçeçre ma äil tiñ Baa no. Se kal rawge de äaara äil sir Sineyar, äil tiñ mani baa äe no.

Francais: Nabucodonosor ordonna au chef de son personnel, Achepénaz, de choisir parmi les Israélites quelques garçons de la famille royale ou de familles nobles.
Anglais: And the [Babylonian] king told Ashpenaz, the chief of his  officials, to bring in some of the sons of Israel, including some from the royal family and from the nobles,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di tam Aspenaz, ma tuni ŋol kay sa sunna sa patayna, kay nam ma maram sa as jar sa Israyella, hay jafna vi mulda, kuɗ jafna vi sum sa ŋulona kaw.
Bulu: Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bendé Aspenaz, évete ya biwôlô bebo bisaé bié na a top, e bone bʼIsraél été, bendôman ba so mvoñe bejôô, nge so menda bingoʼo yʼayoñ.
Guiziga: A ɓa Asepenas, madiɗa ngi mizli naŋhay, ɓa a wini gawlahay cah ar tizer ngi buyoy waɗ a wuzla ziri ngi mizli madiɗahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o umri Aspenas, mawɗo saraaki'en maako, o suɓa caka Isra'iila'en, derke'en woɗɓe diga danygol laamiiɗo e tedda-asli'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o umri Aspenas, mawɗo saraaki'en maako, o suɓa caka Isra'iila'en, derke'en woɗɓe diga danygol laamiiɗo e tedda-asli'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Aspɛnaz gasawi zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i mɛ kai o ŋma be  Israɛl  tɛnɛ, kóó nɛ́ bezaŋ wannu, kóó nɛ́ bezaŋ o ŋma gasawi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Aspɛnaz gasawi zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i mɛ kai o ŋma be  Israɛl  tɛnɛ, kóó nɛ́ bezaŋ wannu, kóó nɛ́ bezaŋ o ŋma gasawi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa meghe gezave nda ke Ashepɛnaz, wəndə nya te ghəa mbeli nyi yite, kezha tseha ŋwale tezhili ɓɛhwɛ mbe hwelefe ta meghe keɗema hwa hwelefefia mbeli ganji:
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon raw riñ Aspenas wañ jar äe ma de ndar äayn wo ga aà mo hoo jar Israyel po ma ti wer mani wañn wo de ma ti moobe ma tinoo po wo mbagge,

Francais: Ces jeunes gens ne devaient présenter aucun défaut physique ; ils devaient avoir bonne apparence et être remplis de sagesse, de connaissance et de discernement, afin de pouvoir entrer au service du roi, dans son palais. On leur enseignerait la langue et l’écriture des Babyloniens .
Anglais: young men without blemish and handsome in appearance, skillful in all wisdom, endowed with intelligence  and  discernment, and quick to understand, competent to stand [in the presence of the king]  and  able to serve in the king’s palace. He also  ordered Ashpenaz  to teach them the literature and language of the  Chaldeans.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-jufay nisina may tisiɗi, sa ɗuw jifiy ŋolo, sa yalla visi asay ŋaa'a ŋolo, wida visi asay ŋolo, asay kay hat ŋolo kaw, sa nagay kay sun hay ziyna vi mulla, a nisi ma hat ɗota hiɗi vunna vi Kaldeena kaw.
Bulu: Bendôman bete be too mvoʼé ne selem, abeñe ya yen, njalan a fek, ñyeman a mfasan bi too fe be be, ndemben ba ye saane njô bôt e nda jé été. Ba ye yeʼele be ane ba kobô a tili nkobô ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri gawla taŋhay manja hereweɗ ko neˀ. Deŋ taŋ naŋ kuy, taŋ ti sinmijileŋ, a sinam haɗa, yo taŋ ti sin ngi gi gwata ma. Taŋ, a sa gam a hay ngi buy. A sa dubunaka taŋ mingiɓi ati toho gwat ngi mizli Babiloŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓen ngalaa batte, ŋarniiɓe, marɓe faamu e hikma fuu, jaŋnguɓe, hakkilɓe, fotanɓe ngam kuugal nder saare laamiiɗo. Sey ɓe ekkito boo wolde e binndol Kaldiya'en .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓen ngalaa batte, ŋarniiɓe, marɓe faamu e hikma fuu, jaŋnguɓe, hakkilɓe, fotanɓe ngam kuugal nder saare laamiiɗo. Sey ɓe ekkito boo wolde e binndol Kaldiya'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ ya nɛ o bíí nɛ yora ŋgaiwi; ká‘i zɔk wa ɓɛɛ ɔ dee tɛ-wi. Wa tɛ ya nɛ o haya wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ yamba mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa nyɛma wen dee tom tɛ ko wannu. Wi tɛ usi nú ko o be Kaldee ha̧ wa in yuwar yɔra-a mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ ya nɛ o bíí nɛ yora ŋgaiwi; ká‘i zɔk wa ɓɛɛ ɔ dee tɛ-wi. Wa tɛ ya nɛ o haya wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ yamba mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa nyɛma wen dee tom tɛ ko wannu. Wi tɛ usi nú ko o be Kaldee ha̧ wa in yuwar yɔra-a mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: ŋwale tezhili nyi ɗema beze te hɛ, nyi ndeɗe ndeɗe, nya kentsehwele ntsehwele, nyi keɗepe wəshi ba'a nyi nza zəzə va hɛ, yitea mene slene hɛ ki ghɛa meghe. Kateteke rafe wəshi ba'a ghena ta ka Babilone hɛ.
Tupurri: mo hoo weere ma joçoçre ma bay ëarge wo see ga wo de wore lay, wo de ko ree lay, wo de ti ngeel lay, car wo äil feçeçre go lay day wo de kaçaçge ma joñ peele liñ ni wañ lay mono, nen maga aè mo had ra de feçeçre ma de yerge mani jar Kalden wo lay, de jag äaran lay.

Francais: Le roi prescrivit qu’on leur fournisse chaque jour la nourriture et le vin de la table royale, et qu’on les instruise durant trois ans. A la fin de cette période, ils entreraient à son service.
Anglais: The king assigned a daily ration for them from his finest food and from the wine which he drank. They were to be educated  and  nourished this way for three years so that at the end of that time they were [prepared] to enter the king’s service.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla ɗeksi goy kay tina ma nisi as kay tum hay buurta buurta kafna, hiɗi vinna ma nisi as cumna. Kay nisi min hatsi ir busat ɦidi. Hay li ma busat ɦidi vatawana, nisi ma lak sun vok mulla.
Bulu: Môs ôse njô bôt a nga tiñeti be ngabe yʼavale bidi a mbe a jaʼak, a nyô ya avale woon a mbe a nyaʼak. Njô bôt a kômbôʼô na be yeʼele be tañe mimbu mila, mvus éte nje ba ye saane nye.
Guiziga: Buy a juwa le, ɓa vur hin gar na, a vulaka taŋ gwat ngi zum ati gwat ngi si kaɓa nga naŋ buy vuna, yo a dubunaka taŋ gwat ngi gi hã vi makir. A dirba nah, a sa gam slra ngi buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo darni: Kala nyalaade fuu o yeɗi ɓe diga nyaamdu e njaram maako, ɓe njaŋnga duuɓi tati, ɓaawoɗon ɓe puɗɗan kuugal yeeso laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo darni: Kala nyalaade fuu o yeɗi ɓe diga nyaamdu e njaram maako, ɓe njaŋnga duuɓi tati, ɓaawoɗon ɓe puɗɗan kuugal yeeso laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ nú wen ha̧ wa mɛ ha̧ nɛ pɛrti nyɔŋmɔ n'aa nyɔŋ in pɛrti dɔ̧ɔ̧ n'aa nɔ ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ mbɛt. Wa tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ wa tɛ pɛ taar. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i tɛ ye nɛnɛ tɛ tom ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ nú wen ha̧ wa mɛ ha̧ nɛ pɛrti nyɔŋmɔ n'aa nyɔŋ in pɛrti dɔ̧ɔ̧ n'aa nɔ ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ mbɛt. Wa tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ wa tɛ pɛ taar. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i tɛ ye nɛnɛ tɛ tom ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe gezete kezha ve nda wəshi kezeme ta ŋkɛ ba'a wəshi kesa ta ŋkɛ mbeli ke hɛ keveci keveci, kezha teke nda wəshi mbeli ke hɛ kava mahekene. Ma kwa sebe ta vəa shɛ ne, katedzembe slene ta ŋkɛ hɛ.
Tupurri: Wañ raw ngaä reege ne hara maga aà wo nen reege äe tum nen naw see reege mani äe wañ no, see yii maga se hay jooge äe mono nen maga se mo had ra nen kiñgi swa' day blam äe aà mo a wo pel wañ joñ peele ne hene.

Francais: Parmi ceux de la tribu de Juda qui furent choisis se trouvaient Daniel, Hanania, Michaël et Azaria.
Anglais: Among them from the sons of Judah were: Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi yuda sa jarsin kayni mi Daniel, Hananiya, Mikayel hiɗi Azariya.
Bulu: Bendômane benyine ya bone be Yuda be mbe nsamba ya ba be nga toban be mbe môé na: Daniel, Anania, Mikaél a Azaria.
Guiziga: A wuzla taŋ, dideˀ ngi Zudahay ada cah, i ti Daniyel, Hananiya, Mikayel waɗ Azariya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi caka maɓɓe Yahuudu'en woɗɓe: Daniyel, Hananiya, Miisayel e Azariya.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi caka maɓɓe Yahuudu'en woɗɓe: Daniyel, Hananiya, Miisayel e Azariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Juda nɛ a̧a̧ so mgbara o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i nɛ Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Juda nɛ a̧a̧ so mgbara o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i nɛ Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa mbeli nyi tsehave mbeli ne, ka Zhəwda ya shɛ: Daniyɛl, Hananiya, Mishayɛl ba'a Azariya.
Tupurri: Yoo jar sen wo ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan mono, Danyele, Hananiya, Mikayel wo de Asariya hay wo ni lay.

Francais: Le chef du personnel royal leur donna de nouveaux noms : Daniel reçut le nom de Beltassar, Hanania celui de Chadrac, Michaël celui de Méchak, et Azaria celui d’Abed-Négo .
Anglais: The commander of the officials gave them [Babylonian] names: Daniel he named Belteshazzar, Hananiah  he named  Shadrach, Mishael  he named  Meshach, and Azariah  he named  Abed-nego.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sa patayna kaasi sem mara'a, Daniel nam kaam selem ala Belsasar, Hananiya mi Sadrak, Mikayel mi Mesak, Azariya mi Abed-Nego may.
Bulu: Vʼévete biwôlô bebo bisaé é nga yôlé be mimfefé mi môé avale di: Daniel na Beltsazar, Anania ke na Sadrak; Mikaél nyeʼe na Mésak a Azaria na: Abéd Négô.
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi migi slra ngi mamay buyo, a ca taŋ slimiɗ mekelemey. Daniyele, a zila Beltasar, Hananiya, a zila Sadrak, Mikayele, a zila Mesak waɗ Azariya, a zila Habet-Nego.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mawɗo saraaki'en hokki ɓe inɗe kese. O ewni Daniyel Beltesacar, Hananiya boo Sadarak, Miisayel boo Meesak, Azariya boo Abed-Nego.
Fulfulde_DC: Mawɗo saraaki'en hokki ɓe inɗe kese. O ewni Daniyel Beltesacar, Hananiya boo Sadarak, Miisayel boo Meesak, Azariya boo Abed-Nego.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua ko wannu gɔna mbe nin ha̧ wa. Ko Daniɛl nɛ Bɛltasar, ko Hanania nɛ Sadrak, ko Misaɛl nɛ Mɛsak, ɓɛɛ ko Azaria nɛ Abɛd-Nɛgo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua ko wannu gɔna mbe nin ha̧ wa. Ko Daniɛl nɛ Bɛltasar, ko Hanania nɛ Sadrak, ko Misaɛl nɛ Mɛsak, ɓɛɛ ko Azaria nɛ Abɛd-Nɛgo.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene hekate nda slə mɛnɛfɛ ke hɛ: Bɛltasar ŋa Daniyɛl, Shadrak ŋa Hananiya, Mɛshak ŋa Mishayɛl, Abɛd-Nɛgo ŋa Azariya.
Tupurri: Wañ jar ma de ndar äayn raw coo ëu äaara go de wañ: Kañ ne Danyel ga Belsatsar, ne Hananiya ga Sadrag, ne Mikayel ga Mesag, ne Asariya ga Abed-Nego.

Francais: Daniel prit la ferme résolution de ne pas se rendre impur en consommant la nourriture et le vin de la table royale. Il demanda donc au chef du personnel de ne pas l’obliger à se rendre impur par de tels aliments.
Anglais: But Daniel made up his mind that he would not defile (taint, dishonor) himself with the  king’s finest food or with the wine which the king drank; so he asked the commander of the officials that he might [be excused so that he would] not defile himself.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Daniel so'ot dikamu a nam min muɗ tuwam liwisi hiɗi tina ma jibetna vi mulla hiɗi dolayna ma mulla ka cumnaɗi, nala nam giɗel del ma ŋolla vi sa patayna kay nam ma muɗum liwisi hiɗi tin namnaɗi.
Bulu: Ve Daniel a nga tuʼa tyik e nleme wé été na a ye bo te ve émiene nsem a ndian avale bidi njô bôt a nga di di, nge a nyuan avale woon njô bôt a nga bo a nyaʼak. Nde a nga sili évete biwôlô bebo bisaé é bo te tindi nye na a ve émiene nsem a avale bidi te.
Guiziga: Daniyel a juwa le a mevel naŋ, ɓa a zum gwat malla a si gwat misi kaɓa ngi buy na ta, vur naŋ masa ci ar dili. A cufuɗa madiɗa ngi migi slraˀahaya, ɓa a tikaŋ ˀay ngi zuma gwata ta, vur naŋ masa ci ar dili ti gwat ngi zumo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel annini taa o soɓna hoore maako bee nyaamdu e njaram laamiiɗo. Ngam man o tori mawɗo saraaki'en taa o doola mo soɓnugo hoore maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel annini taa o soɓna hoore maako bee nyaamdu e njaram laamiiɗo. Ngam man o tori mawɗo saraaki'en taa o doola mo soɓnugo hoore maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl taa mɔ nɛ kɔ̧ see'e, wi beka ɗaŋ war-tɛ-wi tɛ nyɔŋmɔ in tɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔfi wi-duk-zu wa mɛ e a̧ wen ka a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-a tɛ o nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl taa mɔ nɛ kɔ̧ see'e, wi beka ɗaŋ war-tɛ-wi tɛ nyɔŋmɔ in tɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔfi wi-duk-zu wa mɛ e a̧ wen ka a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-a tɛ o nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Daniyɛl kelete zəzə megela kezha ɗema kazhɛre ghəa ŋkɛ wale wale laka zeme wəsə kezeme ba'a sa wəsə kesa ta meghe. Pa ŋkɛ 'yɛwete va wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene kezha ɗema ŋkɛ katərənə ŋkɛ kazhɛre ghəa ŋkɛ wale wale.
Tupurri: Danyel raw bag jag äe le go äil äe ga se mo gluä see se go de reege mani wañn wo de yii maga aà hay jooge äe mo wa. Se raw kem wañ jar ma de ndar äayn wo ga aà mo kañ wer se go glub see se äegde' wa.

Francais: Dieu permit que sa requête soit accueillie avec faveur et bienveillance par le chef du personnel.
Anglais: Now God granted Daniel favor and compassion in the sight of the commander of the officials,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulini Lawna hin Daniel fi ŋaata hiɗi slugota vok ir ma ŋolla vi sa patayna.
Bulu: Zambe a nga bo na évete ji é nyoñe nsili Daniel a mevak a mbamba nlem .
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ga mezle da Daniyele, ɓa madiɗa ngi migi slrahay a tiɓa cufuɗ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah heɓni mo mo'ere e hinnuye haa mawɗo saraaki'en oo.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah heɓni mo mo'ere e hinnuye haa mawɗo saraaki'en oo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ kpa desee zu Daniɛl, ɓɛɛ kpɛk akamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ kpa desee zu Daniɛl, ɓɛɛ kpɛk akamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala pelave nda hweŋkwa ke wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene kezha yɛ 'yɛwe ta Daniyɛl le ganyɛa mehele ba'a zhɛ heli.
Tupurri: Baa raw joñge nen maga Danyel mo coo jag wañ jar ma de ndar äayn wo day aà mo ko decoo äe lay.

Francais: Toutefois celui-ci répondit à Daniel : « C’est Sa Majesté le roi lui-même qui a prescrit ce que vous devez manger et boire. J’ai peur qu’il ne vous trouve pas aussi bonne mine qu’aux autres jeunes gens de votre âge ; ainsi, à cause de vous, le roi pourrait me faire couper la tête. »
Anglais: and the commander of the officials said to Daniel, “I am afraid of my lord the king, who has prearranged your food and your drink; for why should he see your faces looking more haggard than the young men who are your own age? Then you would make me forfeit my head to the king.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sa patayna di tam Daniel: Nan li nari kay mulla bum-ziyna vanu, nam ma ɗekan kay slen ma nigi ma ti'e hiɗi ci'e. Kay hay li ma vokgiya ma ɗuw kiram joo'o suw nuroygin ɗawni, nan ma mar joot kanu vokom nam mulla!
Bulu: Vʼakôsa bo nalé, é nga yalane Daniel na: Ma ko masa wom njô bôte woñ, amu nye a nga telé jôm mia yiane di a nyu; woñ ô ne me na mesu menan me za bo te faé ane ma bendômane ya miaé wônan. Njô bôt a za tyiʼi me nlô amu mia.
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi migi slrahay a ɓa Daniyele: «Muɗuviy ɓi ngi gwat ngi zum ati gwat ngi si kum, ya mavulukum di na, i buy vuna ti haŋ naŋ. Zluwun ara giy vur naŋ masa lumuw zah zah a wuzla cil ɗikeye. Asi vur zih ɗik na, a sa bukiy hirnga ti maslalam.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o wi'i Daniyel: “Mi ɗon hula jaagorɗo am laamiiɗo. Kaŋko umri ko on nyaamata e ko on njarata. Mi wonan nder joote maayde to o yi'i geese mooɗon mbooɗaay bana geese ngorgiraaɓe mooɗon.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o wi'i Daniyel: “Mi ɗon hula jaagorɗo am laamiiɗo. Kaŋko umri ko on nyaamata e ko on njarata. Mi wonan nder joote maayde to o yi'i geese mooɗon mbooɗaay bana geese ngorgiraaɓe mooɗon.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Mɔ n'am yu nɛ́ dáà wannu, wen mɛ nɛ a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧ nú wen nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. A̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk'e tɛ‘nɛ́ dak dak mgbara o gbama-ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen tɛ tik zu'm, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓira zu'm pi̧ nu wen zu'nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Mɔ n'am yu nɛ́ dáà wannu, wen mɛ nɛ a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧ nú wen nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. A̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk'e tɛ‘nɛ́ dak dak mgbara o gbama-ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen tɛ tik zu'm, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓira zu'm pi̧ nu wen zu'nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ma ke wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene sha Daniyɛl: «Meghe le ghəa ŋkɛ nde gezete wəsə kezeme ta ŋayɛ ba'a wəsə kesa ta ŋayɛ. Kazhɛ ɗa ghazlənə yagha ŋkɛ tesləyi ŋayɛ sheŋwe sheŋwe hwa kweci ka mandalahɛ ŋayɛ. Tsagha ne, katesla ghə ŋkɛ te 'ya tewəmbəreke gheyɛ.»
Tupurri: Wañ jar ma de ndar äayn kal wii Danyel gano: Ndi joñ heçeçne na do wañ, je waçaç ree äi maga hay ngaä fen maga nday nen reege, nen jooge go mono. Gahaçyla, aà wo ge we ko nday de ngogre de dañ weere joçoçre maga kiñgi äay boñ mono, sen mo ta' kañ ge taw äi ge na kañge.

Francais: Alors Daniel dit à l’homme chargé par le chef du personnel de s’occuper de Hanania, de Michaël, d’Azaria et de lui-même :
Anglais: But Daniel said to the overseer whom the commander of the officials had appointed over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay na'ta Daniel di tam sa ma ŋomda ma sa ma ŋolla vi sa patayna colom kay ŋom Daniel, Hananiya, Mikayel hiɗi Azariya Ala:
Bulu: Daniel nyee môt évete biwôlô bebo bisaé é nga ve na a baʼale Anania, Mikaél, Abéd-Négo a émiene na:
Guiziga: Akẽh na, mbur mekelem ada. Madiɗa ngi migi slrahay a vulaŋ Daniyel, Hananiya, Mikayel, waɗ Azariya, asi haŋ naŋ. Daniyel a ɓaŋ:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daniyel wi'i kaliifaajo mo mawɗo saraaki'en jo'ini dow Daniyel e Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daniyel wi'i kaliifaajo mo mawɗo saraaki'en jo'ini dow Daniyel e Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ gasawi ee mɛ zɔk a̧ in Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ gasawi ee mɛ zɔk a̧ in Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, ma ke Daniyɛl gezete nda ke wəndə nya veyi wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene kezha newe ghweme te Hananiya, Mishayɛl, Azariya ba'a gheŋkɛ le ghəa ŋkɛ:
Tupurri: Day Danyel raw wii je maga wañ jar ma de ndar äayn hay waçaçre reege mani Danyel, Hananiya, Mikayel wo de Asariya ne hen do gano:

Francais: « Je t’en prie, fais un essai avec nous pendant dix jours : qu’on nous donne seulement des légumes à manger et de l’eau à boire.
Anglais: “Please, test your servants for ten days, and let us be given some vegetables to eat and water to drink.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kemkem', wakaŋ sa sunda vaŋu ir buur doogo, hinsi vulma hadafna a ti'e, niyna a ci'e kawge,
Bulu: Tame veʼele bebo bisaé bôé éyoñe ji tañe melu awôm, be ve bia bijebejeba ya di a mendime ya nyu;
Guiziga: «Ambuh takwa! Inga titila hã hin kuruˀ, ki vulam ndra ngi zumo, i lar kalafay ati yam tewle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'i mo: “Foondu maccuɓe ma nyalɗe sappo. Accu min nyaama haakooji tan e min njara boo ndiyam tan.
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'i mo: “Foondu maccuɓe ma nyalɗe sappo. Accu min nyaama haakooji tan e min njara boo ndiyam tan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé yɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn tɛ zɛ ɓu ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk. Wa a̧ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo h’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɔŋ in gee yi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé yɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn tɛ zɛ ɓu ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk. Wa a̧ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo h’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɔŋ in gee yi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ,
Kapsiki_DC: «Təhwə təhwə ŋa 'ya, dzeghakɛ n'yɛ kahɛ meŋe. Ve n'yɛ nɗeli sleke ba'a yɛmə kesa mbeli.
Tupurri: Kam kam äo, lam mbo weere äon wo nen naw hwal boñ, day haç mbo ne wuur ma reege diñ sug feçeçre wo de bii ma jooge tawa

Francais: Ensuite tu compareras notre mine à celle des jeunes gens qui consomment la nourriture de la table royale. A ce moment-là, tu agiras envers nous d’après ce que tu auras vu. »
Anglais: Then let our appearance and the appearance of the young men who eat the king’s finest food be observed  and  compared by you, and deal with your servants in accordance with what you see.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugol kayni naŋ ma sarma vokma'a hiɗi iraŋu, naŋ ma sar vok segena kaw sa ka ti tin ma jibetna vi mulla, bugolda naŋ ma li hiɗi sa sunda vaŋu kuɗ va ma iraŋ wi'e.
Bulu: mvus éte, wo ye veʼane mesu mangan a ma bendôman ba di avale bidi njô bôt a di, nalé ate wo ye bo bebo bisaé bôé avalʼane jam wo ye yen e né.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, kisa pura dumvu ndra ati ngi mizli mazumam kaɓa buyo, joˀ kisa gi ti ndra weˀe avu ka masa pura vuna.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawoɗon a laara jaati amin bee jaati derke'en nyaamanɓe nyaamdu laamiiɗo. Nden waɗ min fodde ko tammiiɗa yi'ugo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawoɗon a laara jaati amin bee jaati derke'en nyaamanɓe nyaamdu laamiiɗo. Nden waɗ min fodde ko tammiiɗa yi'ugo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ zɔk tɛ yɛ in ko o wi nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ ko wannu; hegɔ tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de nɛ mɔ in yɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ zɔk tɛ yɛ in ko o wi nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ ko wannu; hegɔ tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de nɛ mɔ in yɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, kateyipə nza ta n'yɛ na le nza ta ka mempɛhwetɛti nyi kezeme wəshi kezeme ta meghe. Ma vəa ŋkwa shɛ ne, kateme na te ghen'yɛ laka wəsə nya teneweve na.»
Tupurri: day ni ndo ko ge nen wuur lay, ko nen weere joçoçre maga ree wo reege mani wañ mo lay day ni ndo joñ ge mbo do maga ndo kon ge no so no.

Francais: L’homme accepta cette proposition et fit un essai de dix jours avec Daniel et ses compagnons.
Anglais: So the man listened to them in this matter and tested them for ten days.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nam hum jobta visiya, nam waksi ir buur doogo.
Bulu: Nde a nga kañese jam be nga sili nye a veʼele be tañe melu awôm.
Guiziga: Mbur tuwa a tiɓa ɓi nah, a titila ngi hin kuruˀo so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaliifaajo go jaɓani ɓe, o foondi ɓe nyalɗe sappo.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaliifaajo go jaɓani ɓe, o foondi ɓe nyalɗe sappo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ mɔ nɛ wa aka, ɓɛɛ a̧ we wa tɛ zɛ ɓu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ mɔ nɛ wa aka, ɓɛɛ a̧ we wa tɛ zɛ ɓu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəndəa shɛ yɛte ghena shɛ ba'a dzeghakɛ hɛ kahɛ meŋe.
Tupurri: Se raw yaçaç jag äaara ti fen maga aà hay wiin wo mono day se raw lam rage nen naw hwale.

Francais: A la fin de cette période, on put constater qu’ils avaient meilleure mine et avaient pris plus de poids que les jeunes gens nourris des mets de la table royale.
Anglais: At the end of ten days it seemed that they were looking better and  healthier than all the young men who ate the king’s finest food.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay ma buur doogo vatawana, voksiya muɗi ɗuw jifiy suwa, nisi ɗoray suw guron sa ka ti tin ma ŋaana vi mulla.
Bulu: Eyoñe melu mete awôm me lôteya, mesu map mme me nga dañ abeñ a menyôle map avem a dañe bendôman be nga di avale bidi njô bôt a mbe a jaʼak.
Guiziga: A dirba hin mukuruˀo, a puraka na, hiri taŋ celelle, yo taŋ ɓiɓir ɓiɓir fineˀ mizli mazumam kaɓa buy tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde nyalɗe man timmi, o tawi jaati maɓɓe ɓuri jaati derke'en nyaamɓe nyaamdu laamiiɗo fuu wooɗugo e tekkugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde nyalɗe man timmi, o tawi jaati maɓɓe ɓuri jaati derke'en nyaamɓe nyaamdu laamiiɗo fuu wooɗugo e tekkugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ zɛ nɔ‘i ɓu'i dama kaɗi, wa zɔka saŋa-yí-wa ɔ dee in wa ɔ ŋmaŋa gan oi o dɔka bíí nɛ nyɔŋ kɔ‘i nɛ mɔ ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ zɛ nɔ‘i ɓu'i dama kaɗi, wa zɔka saŋa-yí-wa ɔ dee in wa ɔ ŋmaŋa gan oi o dɔka bíí nɛ nyɔŋ kɔ‘i nɛ mɔ ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta hɛ meŋe ne, pa mbeli nakɛ tsema tsema nza nza ta nci ganyɛ ma ke ŋa pɛtɛa ka mempɛhwetɛti nyi kezehwe wəshi kezeme ta meghe. Nahe hɛ kenza deke deke ma ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Naw se hwaln taw go mono, see äaara raw koge de el sar dañ jar lan wo no, day saara hay de goäre de dañ weere joçoçre maga hay wo ree reege mani wañn mo äuy no.

Francais: C’est pourquoi l’homme responsable d’eux continua d’écarter la nourriture et le vin qu’on leur fournissait ; il leur donnait seulement des légumes.
Anglais: So the overseer continued to withhold their fine food and the wine they were to drink, and kept giving them vegetables.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala sa ma ŋomsina min so kay vulsi tin ma jibetna hiɗi vinna loɗi, nam vulsit kayni mi hadafna ɦawa.
Bulu: Ajô te môt a mbe a baʼaleʼe be a nga bo a teléʼé bidi be mbe be yiane di a woon be mbe be yiane nyu fefe a ve be bijebejeba.
Guiziga: Mbur mijigin taŋ a pula gwat ngi zum ati mbaazla mavulaka taŋ di zleˀe tuwa, a vula taŋ lar kalafay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O itti geɗal nyaamdu e njaram maɓɓe, o nyaamni ɓe haakooji tan.
Fulfulde_DC: O itti geɗal nyaamdu e njaram maɓɓe, o nyaamni ɓe haakooji tan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ wi-zɔk-wa ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu ha̧ wa na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo ha̧ wa ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ wi-zɔk-wa ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu ha̧ wa na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo ha̧ wa ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa wəndə nya kenewe ghweme te hɛ kelemte wəshi kezeme ba'a tɛ nyi ve nda mbeli ke hɛ. Deke nɗeli sleke yave nda ŋkɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Go blam sen mono, je waçaç ree reegen hay go heerge de reege wo de yii maga hay diñ ma äaara mbe go kar kar so, hay mbe haçge ne hara diñ sugnee mbe ceä so.

Francais: Dieu accorda aux quatre jeunes gens du discernement et de vastes connaissances dans les domaines de la langue et de la sagesse. Daniel était capable en outre de comprendre le sens des visions et des rêves.
Anglais: As for these four young men, God gave them knowledge and skill in all  kinds of  literature and wisdom; Daniel also understood all  kinds of  visions and dreams.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro joriyo sa fiɗin lakŋi Lawna vulsi wida-yalla, hatta hay ɗot kaf, hiɗi yalla kaw, Daniel di caw sle ma vul tuwam kir sana hiɗi duwayta goy kaf.
Bulu: Zambe a nga ve bendôman bete benyin mfasan a abui ñyeman e nkobô a fek. Daniel a mbe fe nguleya yem atinane ya miñyenan a biyeyem mevale mese.
Guiziga: Gawla mumufaɗ tayna tuwa, Buymisemuŋ a vula taŋ sin ngi gi gwat ati sin ar mingiɓi waɗ ar sinmijileŋ. Daniyele, a sla wala ngi gwat gar, gwat mupura ti kleŋ ati musuwuno gu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Derke'en nayo ɓe'e, Allah hokki ɓe anndal e faamu nder binndi e nder hikma fuu. Daniyel waawi fassitirgo koyɗi e wahayuuji fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Derke'en nayo ɓe'e, Allah hokki ɓe anndal e faamu nder binndi e nder hikma fuu. Daniyel waawi fassitirgo koyɗi e wahayuuji fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i naar'i; a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ nú ko o wi nɔ‘i nɛ de-a in ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Daniɛl, a̧ iŋa tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-zu nɛ‘i ɔ in hɔɔ-zu mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i naar'i; a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ nú ko o wi nɔ‘i nɛ de-a in ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Daniɛl, a̧ iŋa tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-zu nɛ‘i ɔ in hɔɔ-zu mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala ndeke nda ɗepe wəshi ba'a zəzə ghena laka ghena ba'a ntsehwele ke ka mempɛhwetɛti nyi wəfaɗe nyi. Ɓiyitsa ne, wərə Daniyɛl kafave pɛtɛa wəshi nyi ketemene geva ba'a pɛtɛa shiwə.
Tupurri: Ne weere joçoçre ma naan wo mono, Baa raw haç koge, ti ma car äil feçeçre ma de yergen wo mo äuy wo de koge ree ne hara, day Danyel hay go ndar wer feçeçre maga mbuë wo nen jar wo go de lwa'ge wo äuy.

Francais: Au terme du délai fixé par le roi Nabucodonosor pour qu’on lui présente les jeunes gens choisis, le chef du personnel les lui amena.
Anglais: At the end of the time set by the king to bring all the young men in [before him], the commander of the officials presented them to Nebuchadnezzar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma buura asawa kay marsi tam mulla, ma ŋolla vi sa sunna marsi vok ir Nebukadnesar.
Bulu: Eyoñe éyoñe njô bôte Nébukatnétzar a nga tiñeti na be zuu nye bendôman bete é nga kpwaan, évete biwôlô bebo bisaé é nga zuu nye be.
Guiziga: Ar kiɗa mi ngi hin ngi Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa misla, ɓa a bigakaŋ gawlahay tuwa na, madiɗa ngi migi slrahay a raŋ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde saa'iire nde laamiiɗo ta'uno ngam haa ɓe ngadda derke'en fuu yeeso maako yotti, mawɗo saraaki'en yahri ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde saa'iire nde laamiiɗo ta'uno ngam haa ɓe ngadda derke'en fuu yeeso maako yotti, mawɗo saraaki'en yahri ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gɔna so ha̧ wa dama kaɗi, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kaia o be-ŋgaiwi lɛŋ nɛnɛ ti a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gɔna so ha̧ wa dama kaɗi, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kaia o be-ŋgaiwi lɛŋ nɛnɛ ti a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakanyɛ və nya sləyi meghe Nabəkodonozor kezha ncɛ nda ka mempɛhwetɛti nyi tsehave nyi mbeli ne, pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene slene fəke nda hɛ.
Tupurri: De maga wur maga wañ hay ngaän go ga fer le de äaara pel se a mono, wañ jar ma de ndar äayn raw woge de äaara pel Nebukanetsar so.

Francais: Le roi s’entretint avec eux : Daniel, Hanania, Michaël et Azaria se révélèrent plus compétents que tous les autres. C’est pourquoi ils entrèrent à son service.
Anglais: The king spoke with them, and among them all not one was found like Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah; so they were [selected and] assigned to stand before the king  and  enter his personal service.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla kus yoboyn hiɗi nisiya, jarsi kaf kayni sa ma ŋray hiɗi Daniel, Hananiya, Mikayel, hiɗi Azariya mayɗi. Kay na'ta nisi lakay sum mulla.
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga laane be minlañ, ve teke wua ya bendôman bete a nga yené ntyetyeñ ane Daniel, Anania, Mikaél a Azaria. Nde be nga nyoñebane bisaé be njô bôt.
Guiziga: Buy a kiɗam slir ati taŋ. A wuzla taŋ gar na, a lum misi kaɓa ti Daniyel, Hananiya, Mikayel waɗ Azariya na ta. Vurˀe, taŋ a ndiram a mbuŋ buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo wolidi bee maɓɓe, ammaa walaa koo gooto maɓɓe foti bee Daniyel e Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya. Ngam man ɓe puɗɗi kuugal yeeso laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo wolidi bee maɓɓe, ammaa walaa koo gooto maɓɓe foti bee Daniyel e Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya. Ngam man ɓe puɗɗi kuugal yeeso laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mgbara wa'i, a̧ kpa o ŋma hee Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria ga na, ɓɛɛ wa ya kɔ-wa ɓɔn katɛ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mgbara wa'i, a̧ kpa o ŋma hee Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria ga na, ɓɛɛ wa ya kɔ-wa ɓɔn katɛ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe gezete ghena le hɛ. Ama hwa hɛ pɛtɛ ne, wəndə shɛ kesləyi ŋkɛ kala Daniyɛl, Hananiya, Mishayɛl ba'a Azariya we. Vatse dzembe slene ta ŋkɛ hɛ.
Tupurri: Wañ kal waçë waçaçre de äaara day yoo weere joçoçren wo mono, je ma do Danyel, Hananiya, Mikayel wo de Asariya bay wa. AÀ raw lag rage joñ peele ne wañ so.

Francais: Lorsque le roi les interrogeait sur n’importe quel sujet exigeant de la sagesse et de l’intelligence, il les trouvait dix fois supérieurs à tous les devins et magiciens de son royaume.
Anglais: In every matter of wisdom and understanding about which the king consulted them, he found them ten times better than all the [learned] magicians and enchanters (Magi) in his whole realm.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay slen ma yalla hiɗi wida kaf ma mulla ka job kalamna, nam fisi ŋaa'a sem doogo suw sa li gul-yalda hiɗi sa wi caw mislekŋa sa ka hay nagata valamu kafe.
Bulu: E jam ese njô bôt a nga sili be e fombôʼô fek a mfasan, a nga yene be dañe bebo majik a mimvimviʼi mise yʼéjôé jé biyoñ biyoñ.
Guiziga: Da buy a cufuɗa taŋ le ar ɓi ngi sinmijileŋ, yo ar ɓi ngi lesl wanaka gar kwana, gawla tayna, a slaka wala naŋ, is kuruˀ, fineˀ misi cucukoy ati muɓula musuɗukoy misi asi ruwuy naŋ ma zum buyo anga.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo ndey laamiiɗo ƴami ɓe fuu, o tawi ɓe ɓuri laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti nder laamu maako fuu hikma e hakkiilo nde sappo.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo ndey laamiiɗo ƴami ɓe fuu, o tawi ɓe ɓuri laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti nder laamu maako fuu hikma e hakkiilo nde sappo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ ko iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wannu ak nɛ wa'i, a̧ zɔka'e wa gana o wan-gbana in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi tɛ zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ war ɓu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ ko iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wannu ak nɛ wa'i, a̧ zɔka'e wa gana o wan-gbana in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi tɛ zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ war ɓu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te pɛtɛa ghena nyi ke'yɛwe ntsehwele ba'a zəzə ghena nyi se meghe ka'yɛwe va hɛ ne, za ma sləyi hɛ ŋkɛ meŋe zhigə ke pɛtɛa ka mene ghɛ ba'a ka ŋa zlera nyi kese mbe pɛtɛa hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ti feçeçre maga wii wo diñ koge ree wo de ti ngeel ga wañ wië wer äaara mono, wañ hay da' Danyel wo de dañ jar ko wer feçeçre wo de jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñ maga hay wo ti sir wañ äen mo äuy äaale hwale.

Francais: Daniel resta au service du roi jusqu’au moment où Cyrus devint roi .
Anglais: And Daniel remained there until the  first year of [the reign of] King Cyrus [over Babylon; now this was at the end of the seventy-year exile of Judah (the Southern Kingdom) in Babylonia, as foretold by Jeremiah].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel ay ɗawni ta-ta hay busata ta Sirus kal hay mulda.
Bulu: Daniel a nga bo ésaé e nda njô bôt a kui éyoñe Sirus a zu telébane njôô.
Guiziga: Joˀ Daniyel a gi slra ngi buyo hã ar vi mudumbuŋ ngi Kiriyus mazum buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel jooɗi ton haa wargo hitaande nde Koores laamani Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel jooɗi ton haa wargo hitaande nde Koores laamani Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl ɓɔna tɛ ko wannu hɔ tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko wannu Sirus.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl ɓɔna tɛ ko wannu hɔ tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko wannu Sirus.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Daniyɛl kenza mbe slene ta meghe hwa'a te və nya dzete meghe Sirəs.
Tupurri: Danyel joñ dosen nono haçaç wo go nen kiñgi ma tañgu maga wañ Sirus kol ti wañ mono.

Francais: Daniel et ses compagnons à Babylone
Anglais: The Choice Young Men
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel hay Babilon
Bulu: Daniel a bemvôé bé e Babilôn
Guiziga: Daniyel ati cil naŋhay a Babiloŋ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel e soobiraaɓe muuɗum haa Baabila
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel e soobiraaɓe muuɗum haa Baabila
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl in o sɛm kɔ‘i
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl in o sɛm kɔ‘i
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Daniyɛl le ka mcɛhɛnyɛ mbe Babilone
Tupurri: AÈ raw de Danyel Babilone

Francais: Pendant la deuxième année de son règne, Nabucodonosor fit un rêve. Il en fut si troublé qu’il en perdit le sommeil.
Anglais: In the second year (604  b . c .) of the reign of Nebuchadnezzar, Nebuchadnezzar had dreams which troubled  and  disturbed his spirit and [interfered with] his ability to sleep.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata ma'ta vi Nebukadnesar hay mulda, duwayt dumu, dikam muɗ vum bat-bat', senda may na kiramɗi.
Bulu: Mbu baa ya njôane wé, ñwô Nébukatnétzar a nga yeme biyeyem, biyeyeme bite bi nga ndeñele nye nsisim , te fe nguleya beta ke ôyo.
Guiziga: Buy Nabukodonozoro, ti naŋ mazum buy ngi vi mucuw naŋ na, musuwun a gaŋ. A gaŋ lesle welele, hã a hinje mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu maako ɗiɗaɓu, Nabukodonosor hoyɗi. Koyɗi ɗi'i cakli mo, o waawaay ɗaanaago.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu maako ɗiɗaɓu, Nabukodonosor hoyɗi. Koyɗi ɗi'i cakli mo, o waawaay ɗaanaago.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, a̧ ɔɔ ŋma zu; zu'i sakala taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ yá hɔ yi-a ɓɔna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, a̧ ɔɔ ŋma zu; zu'i sakala taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ yá hɔ yi-a ɓɔna.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa bake ta va ta Nabəkodonozor mbe meghe ne, pa shiwəte shiwə. Pa mehele ta ŋkɛ tazenyɛ ba'a pa hɛ shaŋe kakele ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de äog maga Nebukanetsar de ma joñwañ mono, Nebukanetsar raw lwa'ge. See äe raw dañge äe go day nen äe la ba na gaè.

Francais: Il ordonna de convoquer les devins, magiciens, sorciers et enchanteurs, afin qu’on lui révèle ce qu’il avait rêvé. Lorsqu’ils arrivèrent et se présentèrent devant lui,
Anglais: Then the king gave a command to call the magicians, the enchanters, the sorcerers, and the  Chaldeans to tell the king his dreams. So they came in and stood before the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla gi sunda kay yi sa li gul-yalda, sa ɗuw mislekŋa, sum sa guna hiɗi sa Kaldeena, kay nisi ma di caw duwayt goy mi mulla. Nisi co'o, lak kulo vok mulla.
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga bendé na be loone mimvimviʼi, bebo majik, mingbwengbwee, beyeme mam mevale mese, be kate nye biyeyeme bié. Eyoñe be soya a tebe asu njô bôt,
Guiziga: A ɓa mizli, a zilakaŋ misi cucukoy, muɓula musuɗukoy, mupura kulihey ati Babiloŋhoy, ɓa a mbiɗakaŋ ɓi ngi musuwun naŋ na. A soko joa ciki buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O umri ewnoyaago laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e waɗooɓe hiila e Kaldiya'en  haa ɓe paamtina mo koyɗi ɗi o hoyɗi. Ɓe ngari, ɓe ndari yeeso laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: O umri ewnoyaago laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e waɗooɓe hiila e Kaldiya'en  haa ɓe paamtina mo koyɗi ɗi o hoyɗi. Ɓe ngari, ɓe ndari yeeso laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o wi-zɔk-mɔ in o wi-a-tani  tɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ tɔ̧ zu'i ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ wa tɛ lɛŋ, mɔi̧ ŋmaa ya ti wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o wi-zɔk-mɔ in o wi-a-tani  tɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ tɔ̧ zu'i ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ wa tɛ lɛŋ, mɔi̧ ŋmaa ya ti wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ gezete kezha heka ka mene ghwɛ, ka ŋa zlera, ka beze ŋkwa le ghwɛ ba'a ka kelɛŋə, yitea ncɛ nda shiwəa ŋkɛ hɛ ke meghe. Pa hɛ se ba'a ghereŋenji kwa kema ta meghe.
Tupurri: Wañ raw ëe jar halge wo le de jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñn wo de jar guurkoon wo de jar Kalden wo le nen maga aà mo naa wo wer lwa'ge wañn go ne hene. Saara raw age lagge pel wañ.

Francais: il leur déclara : « J’ai fait un rêve qui m’a beaucoup troublé. J’aimerais que vous me disiez ce que j’ai rêvé. »
Anglais: The king said to them, “I had a dream, and my spirit is troubled  and  anxious to know the [content and meaning of the] dream.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di tisiya: Duwayt danu, dikan may tun sukɗi, kay nan min fi caw duway na'ta.
Bulu: nde a jô be na: Ma te yeme biyeyem bia ndeñele ma nsisim abui: ma kômbô mi kate ma bie.
Guiziga: Buy a ɓa taŋ: «I musuwun na, hã a giy lesle welele, i wuɗ ɓa ki ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'i ɓe: “Mi hoyɗi e mi sakli, mi yiɗi faamugo ko mi hoyɗi.”
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'i ɓe: “Mi hoyɗi e mi sakli, mi yiɗi faamugo ko mi hoyɗi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi ɔɔ zu, ɓɛɛ zu'i sakala'm; mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ zu'i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi ɔɔ zu, ɓɛɛ zu'i sakala'm; mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ zu'i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe sha hɛ: «Nahe 'ya keshiwəte shiwə nya ketazemte ɗa mehele kwele kwele. Kaɗe 'ya kagezete ɗa shiwə nya shiwəte 'ya yɛ.»
Tupurri: Wañ day riñ ra gano: Ndi hay lwa'a, day see äi dañ me go wer maga ndi hay daga ndi mo da' wer go ne lwa'ge seno.

Francais: Les enchanteurs répondirent au roi, en langue araméenne  : « Longue vie au roi ! Qu’il nous communique ce qu’il a rêvé, et nous lui en donnerons la signification. »
Anglais: Then the Chaldeans said to the king in  Aramaic, “O king, live forever! Tell the dream to your servants, and we will declare the interpretation.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Kaldeena di tam mulla hiɗi vun Arameena ala: Mulla, musaŋ iri ta-ta musge. Naŋ ma duma duway na'tiya, numa ma daŋgi cawa' goyo.
Bulu: Beyem be nga yalane nye nkobô aramééñ na: Enyiñe njô bôt é boʼo ayap! Kate bebo bisaé bôé biyeyem wo te yem, bi kate wo atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Mizli Babiloŋhoy a ɓakaŋ ti mi A ram: «Haˀaw buy, anja Bumbulvuŋ a juw hutuŋ subur! Ka ɓa ndra ɓi ngi musuwun ɗike da ndra gawla ɗikeye, ɓa i ɓukuw mbiɗeˀvra naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en njaabi mo bee Aramiyaare: “A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama! Yeccu maccuɓe ma koyɗol man, haa min passitirane ngol.”
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en njaabi mo bee Aramiyaare: “A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama! Yeccu maccuɓe ma koyɗol man, haa min passitirane ngol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu nɛ nú Aram: «Dáà, wannu nɛ́ ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu nɛ nú Aram: «Dáà, wannu nɛ́ ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ka kelɛŋə sha meghe le ghena ta ka Aram: «Meghe yawe, hɛyi ŋa Shala teghweme! Gezete nda shiwəa ŋa ke ka mene slene ta ŋa, yitea gezete ŋa ghena nya mbe ghen'yɛ.»
Tupurri: Jar Kalden kal wo ferge ne wañ de jag Aramayeçeç gano: Daga wañ mo hay ciñ caw tum! Sii mbo lwa'gen ne weere joçoçre äon wo day ni wuur naa wer äe yañ ne ndo.

Francais: Le roi répondit : « Ma décision est fermement prise : si vous ne me révélez pas le contenu et la signification de mon rêve, vous serez coupés en morceaux et vos maisons seront transformées en tas de décombres.
Anglais: The king replied to the Chaldeans, “My command is firm  and  unchangeable: if you do not reveal to me the [content of the] dream along with its interpretation, you shall be cut into pieces and your houses shall be made a heap of rubbish.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla hot sli ditiya, nam di tam sa Kaldeena ala: Dita van coli ala, la nigi ɗekan duway na'ta goyɗi, da' cawa' goyɗi kaw, nigi ma calis goyo, ziyna vigiya ma muɗ goy difir-fira.
Bulu: Njô bôte nye na: Me maneya tyik avale di na, nge mi bo te kate ma biyeyem a atinane yʼété, mia ye tyiʼibane bifuse bifus, a menda menan ma ye bo ve mevise me mbuan.
Guiziga: Buy a mbiɗa taŋ di: «Yi cica wuluk ɗu le. Da ki njikikiy musuwun ɗu na ta, yo ki ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ ta ma na, i sa puwukum meɗ meɗ waɗ hay kumoy a sa tiram diŋhey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo jaabi ɓe: “Ndaa ko ndarnumi: To on anndinaay yam koyɗol am e fassaruuye maagol, mi umran ta'ugo on geɓe geɓe, wartirgo cuuɗi mooɗon boo bana jiddere.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo jaabi ɓe: “Ndaa ko ndarnumi: To on anndinaay yam koyɗol am e fassaruuye maagol, mi umran ta'ugo on geɓe geɓe, wartirgo cuuɗi mooɗon boo bana jiddere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu kifa nú ha̧ o be Kaldee hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi ha̧a̧ nú, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu'i tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na mbɛt, wa tɛ ɓir ɛnɛ sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa gbina tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ a nu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu kifa nú ha̧ o be Kaldee hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi ha̧a̧ nú, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu'i tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na mbɛt, wa tɛ ɓir ɛnɛ sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa gbina tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ a nu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe zhɛnete nda ke hɛ: «Wa nya wəsə nya tarete 'ya nya: ma kencɛte ɗa ma shiwəa ɗa ba'a ghena nya mbe yɛ ne, katenza yɛ kencɛhwe ncɛhwe ba'a katezhɛre geva ghɛa ŋayɛ kakəsə.
Tupurri: Wañ fer waçaç waçaçre day riñ jar Kalden wo gano: Mokay diñ fen maga ndi bag jag äe le go äil äi mono: Hayga nday sii lwa'gen we go ne ndi de naage wer äen gaa no, aè taw nday go, day tiñ äayn kol ge wo go diñ tabul ma de cor ëugul ne keçeç ti.

Francais: Si au contraire vous me les révélez, vous recevrez de moi de riches cadeaux et de grands honneurs. Alors, dites-moi le contenu et la signification de ce rêve. »
Anglais: But if you tell [me] the [content of the] dream along with its interpretation, you shall receive from me gifts and rewards and great honor. So tell me the dream and its interpretation.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May la nigi ɗekan duway na'tawa, da' cawa'awa goyo kaw, nigi ma fi slen ŋolo ɦawa'a hay ɓanu, slen ma vulda ŋolo hiɗi suburta ŋolo kaw. Kuɗ na'ta kayni nigi ma dan duway na'ta, da' cawa' goyo kaw.
Bulu: Ve nge mia kate ma biyeyeme a atinane yʼété, ma ye ve mia abui memvaka a duma e nʼanen. Ajô te katane ma biyeyem a atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Yo da ki njikikiy di le, ki ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ le na, i sa vulukum gwat ngatarahay, i sa vulukum madiɗa waɗ i sa ɗuvukum hirnga haɗa. Njikikiy musuwun ɗu, yo ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa to on anndini yam ngol e fassaruuye maagol, nden kam mi hokkan on dokke e caahuuji e tedduŋgal ɗuuɗŋgal. Anndineeɗam koyɗol am e fassaruuye maagol kadi.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa to on anndini yam ngol e fassaruuye maagol, nden kam mi hokkan on dokke e caahuuji e tedduŋgal ɗuuɗŋgal. Anndineeɗam koyɗol am e fassaruuye maagol kadi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu kɔ‘m, tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa mɔ er-am, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in zɔnamɔ mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ-aa in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu kɔ‘m, tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa mɔ er-am, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in zɔnamɔ mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ-aa in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kencɛte ɗa shiwəa ɗa ba'a ghena nya mbe yɛ ne, kateve ŋayɛ wəshi gəmə kwele kwele ba'a zləvə nya wəba 'ya. Gezete ɗa mə shiwəa ɗa ba'a ghena nya mbe gɛ!»
Tupurri: Day hayga nday sii lwa'gen we go ne ndi de naage wer äen no, ndi haç ge feçeçre yañ wo ne nday debañ, ndi haç ge mandekoë wo yañ ne nday, ndi haç ge kluuri yañ ne nday. Diñ wersen so, sii wee lwa'gen go ne ndi de naage wer äe no.

Francais: Pour la seconde fois, les enchanteurs dirent au roi : « Que le roi nous communique ce qu’il a rêvé, et nous pourrons lui en donner la signification. »
Anglais: They answered again, “Let the king tell the dream to his servants, and we will explain its interpretation [to you].”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi hot dita sesi ma ma'na lo ala: Mulla, ɗekaŋ duway na'ta goy tam sa sunda vaŋu, nala numa ma daŋgi cawa'a.
Bulu: Beyem bete bese be nga yalan éyoñe baa na: Njô bôt a tame ñhe kate bebo bisaé bôé biyeyeme biôé, a bia ki bia ye kate wo atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: A mbiɗakaŋ di sar mucuw naŋ ma ni: «Buy, anja ki ɓa mi ngi musuwun ɗike da ndra gawla ɗikeye, ɓa i ɓukuw mbiɗeˀvra naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fahin ɓe mbi'i: “Barkaama, yeccu maccuɓe ma koyɗol man tawon, nden min passitiran ngol.”
Fulfulde_DC: Fahin ɓe mbi'i: “Barkaama, yeccu maccuɓe ma koyɗol man tawon, nden min passitiran ngol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Wannu a̧ tɔ̧ zu kɔ‘i ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Wannu a̧ tɔ̧ zu kɔ‘i ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Kakwa bake zhigə ne, ma ke hɛ sha meghe: «Meghe yawe, gezete n'yɛ shiwəa shɛ, ghen'yɛ ka mene slene ta ŋa, yitea gezete ŋa ghena nya mbe ghen'yɛ gi!»
Tupurri: Saara raw fer waçaçre ne wañ ma de äog pa gano: Daga wañ mo sii mbe lwa'gen ne weere joçoçre äen wo, ni wuur naa wer äe yañ go.

Francais: Le roi s’écria : « Je vois bien que vous essayez de gagner du temps, parce que vous constatez que ma décision est fermement prise.
Anglais: The king replied, “I know for certain that you are bargaining for time, because you have seen that my command [to you] is firm  and  irrevocable.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla hot sli ditiya di'e: Nan wi goy gasi ala nigi min ba liyna, kay nigi wi dita ta nan cola'ta.
Bulu: Njô bôt nye na: Ma yeme foʼo na mia yi na éyoñ é lôt abui amu mia yem e jam me maneya tyik.
Guiziga: Buy a ɓa taŋ: «I si na le gisiŋ, kum mupuraka ɓi ya ɓi micicakaŋ kaŋ tuwa na, ki wuɗam ɓa ki zikam haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo wi'i: “Jonta mi anndi fakat, on ɗon paasita ngam on anndi ko ndarnumi.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo wi'i: “Jonta mi anndi fakat, on ɗon paasita ngam on anndi ko ndarnumi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu kifa nú ha̧ wa woyo ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi iŋa nɛ mbetɛ ɛnɛ ba nɛ ŋgimbi, wen ɛnɛ zɔka mi ha̧a̧ nú kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu kifa nú ha̧ wa woyo ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi iŋa nɛ mbetɛ ɛnɛ ba nɛ ŋgimbi, wen ɛnɛ zɔka mi ha̧a̧ nú kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe zhɛnete: «Kaganda ne, nahe 'ya keɗepe və yaza yɛ, va nya nakɛ wəsə nya tarete 'ya yɛ.
Tupurri: Wañ fer waçaç waçaçre tigriñ day gano: Ndi de koge kidolgi ga nday kië na diñ ngeel ma yoorge go wer maga nday go de ko fen maga ndi bag jag äe le go äil äi mono.

Francais: Mais si vous ne me révélez pas ce que j’ai rêvé, la sentence sera la même pour tous. Vous vous êtes concertés pour ne prononcer devant moi que des propos mensongers et trompeurs, en attendant que la situation ait changé. Eh bien, non ; dites-moi ce que j’ai rêvé, et je saurai ainsi que vous êtes capables de m’en donner la signification. »
Anglais: If you will not reveal to me the [content of the] dream, there is but one sentence for you; for you have [already] prepared lying and corrupt words [and you have agreed together] to speak [them] before me [hoping to delay your execution] until the situation is changed. Therefore, tell me the dream [first], and then I will know [with confidence] that you can give me its interpretation.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May la nigi ɗekan duway na'taɗi, kita na'ta ma jungiya; wulini tuwgi ka kotiya kay dan yoboy ma sinna hiɗi ma waana, kay cub ta-ta a liyn kala. Kay na'ta ɗekangi duwayta, nala nan ma wi ala nigi nagay kay da' cawa' goyo.
Bulu: Ve nge mi bo te kate ma biyeyem bite, wôna melep ma ye bo avale da e be mia bese, amu mi maneya kui tyiñe ya kobô minsos a meduʼan mfaʼa wom, mi yangeʼe ke na éyoñ é lôt. Ve me ma kômbô na mi, kate ma biyeyeme ma te yem, éyoñe te fe ma ye yeme na, mi ne kate ma atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Amma da ki ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra ngi musuwun ɗu ta na, i sa kutukum gar kumo ti bonoy misi purla. Kumo ki wuɗam ɓa ki gikiy slir, yo ɓa ki gikiy gilaw ngi kutuko gwatay mambuɗama. Na, ɓikiy ɓi ngi musuwun ɗu, ɓa i sina, kisa njikikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ gu.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To on anndinaay yam koyɗol am, kiita ngoota laatanto on fuu. On narri yeccugo yam bolle pewooje e rikiciije, ngam on ɗon numa teema haala man sannjan. Anndineeɗam koyɗol man, nden kam mi anndan on mbaawan fassitirgo ngol boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: To on anndinaay yam koyɗol am, kiita ngoota laatanto on fuu. On narri yeccugo yam bolle pewooje e rikiciije, ngam on ɗon numa teema haala man sannjan. Anndineeɗam koyɗol man, nden kam mi anndan on mbaawan fassitirgo ngol boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧‘m na, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, ɛnɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de ndela sɛn ti'm ɔr nɛ‘m ha̧ ŋgimbi mɛ yak, ɓɛɛ kpɔk  ha̧a̧nú  kɔ‘m'i tɛ tik kana zu'nɛ́. Kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ zu'i ha̧‘m; hegɔ mi tɛ iŋ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧‘m na, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, ɛnɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de ndela sɛn ti'm ɔr nɛ‘m ha̧ ŋgimbi mɛ yak, ɓɛɛ kpɔk  ha̧a̧nú  kɔ‘m'i tɛ tik kana zu'nɛ́. Kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ zu'i ha̧‘m; hegɔ mi tɛ iŋ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama keɗema yɛ kencɛte ɗa shiwəa ɗa ne, ɗa nya kwetɛŋe nde tenza te gheyɛ. Nahe yɛ ketsahwe kezha sla ɗa tseŋwə ba'a kezha ghwete, nda zamte geva və. Yawa, gezete ɗa mə shiwəa ɗa gɛ! Ma tsagha, kateɗepete 'ya wərə yɛ kancɛte ɗa ghena nya mbe.»
Tupurri: Hayga nday kañ nen äi we ti lwa'gen gaa no, ree sen caa ge nday äuy. Nday go de gragge ma waçë waçaçre gete' wo de ma jaçë ndi ne ndi, ma gorge ga ëiggi äi fer yañ cooge. Diñ wersen sii wee lwa'gen ne ndi, ni ndi ko yañ so ga nday yañ mbay de kaçaç ge ma naa wer äe go ne ndi.

Francais: Les enchanteurs reprirent : « Majesté, aucun être humain au monde ne peut faire ce que tu exiges. D’ailleurs, aucun roi, même grand ou puissant, n’a jamais demandé une chose pareille à un devin, à un magicien ou à un enchanteur.
Anglais: The Chaldeans answered the king and said, “There is not a man on earth who can tell the king this matter, for no king, lord or ruler has ever asked such a thing as this of any magician or enchanter or Chaldean.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Kaldeena hot dit tam mulla ala: Va ma naŋ mulla job kalam kayni sa mara hay nagata kep kaw ma as dum cawam goyo mayɗi. Kay mige, la mul marige kaw, la nam ŋolo, dono'o kaw, slen ma ki kayn nala nam bay jobom tam sa wi gul-liyna hiɗi sa wi caw mislekŋa hiɗi sa Kaldeena tuwa.
Bulu: Beyem be nga yalane na: A njô bôt, teke môte ya si nyô a ne bo e jam wo sili; nalé fe na: Njô bôt éziñ, toʼo a nʼéwôlô abui, nge ngu, a ngenane te tame sili mvimviʼi, mbo majik nge nnem avale jam wo sili di.
Guiziga: Mizli Babiloŋhoy tuwa, a ɓaka buyo: «Kumani, ar duniya keɗeɗe, ko mbur anta loŋ ngi mbiɗa ɓi ka buy macufuɗa na ta. Asi mike, ko buyo naŋ madiɗa, yo naŋ gidaŋ haɗaka wanaka gar na, a cufuɗ gwat kahana ɗaˀ avu misi cucukoy, muɓula musuɗukoy ati mizli Babiloŋhoyo ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en njaabi laamiiɗo: “Walaa neɗɗo haa duniyaaru fuu waawata anndingo ma ɗum, barkaama. Walaa laamiiɗo, no o mawniri, no o mardi baawɗe fuu, meeɗi ƴamugo irin maajum haa laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en njaabi laamiiɗo: “Walaa neɗɗo haa duniyaaru fuu waawata anndingo ma ɗum, barkaama. Walaa laamiiɗo, no o mawniri, no o mardi baawɗe fuu, meeɗi ƴamugo irin maajum haa laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ŋma bíí kpɔk zu nu’ɛ nɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu ko wannu, bo na. Ŋma wannu nɛ ɔ gasa in ɔ ŋgaya nɛ aka pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana in o be Kaldee bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ŋma bíí kpɔk zu nu’ɛ nɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu ko wannu, bo na. Ŋma wannu nɛ ɔ gasa in ɔ ŋgaya nɛ aka pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana in o be Kaldee bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ka kelɛŋə zhɛnete nda: «Meghe yawe, wəndə shɛ te hɛɗi lema kamenete wəsə nya 'yɛwe nya na we. Kwa nza ŋkɛ meghe shɛ, ya gheŋkɛ nza wəbake keɗema bereteke, kegha ka'yɛwe wəsə nya kala nya va nde ŋa zlera, va nde mene ghwɛ keɗema va nde va kelɛŋə we.
Tupurri: Jar Kalden kal wo ferge ne wañ gano: Jobo ti tamsir la bay de kaçaçge ma sii fen maga wañ wiin mo wa. Diñ wersen ga wañ po kluu de eegre kañ poçoçre te mo ma kay ti boñ ne je ko wer feçeçre po, ne je ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñ po noga ne je Kalde po ti gaa mono.

Francais: Ce que tu exiges est excessif : personne ne peut te donner la réponse, sinon les dieux, mais ils n’habitent pas dans le monde des hommes. »
Anglais: Furthermore, what the king demands is an unusual  and  difficult thing indeed! No one except the gods can reveal it to the king, and their dwelling is not with [mortal] flesh.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay va ma naŋ mulla jobom kayni nam lop ŋolo suw asa, sa mara'a ma as ɗek kayni vokaŋ naŋ mulla mayɗi, say lawayna sa musta visi may jar sumunɗina tuta.
Bulu: Jame njô bôt a sili e ne ayaé; teke môt éziñ a ne nguleya kate wo de ve bezambe: Ba be bôte ki be nji tabe vôme wua.
Guiziga: Gwat ka mucufuɗa na buy, naŋ tuwaˀ haɗa. Sey i kulihey ta na, mbur mekelem anta ɓa a mbuɗuw di ta, asi taŋ, t'anta ati mizli titirahay ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ko ƴamɗa, barkaama, saɗi masin. Walaa baawɗo anndingo ma ɗum, sonaa ɗowanteeɓe. Ammaa joonde maɓɓe wonaay caka yimɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ko ƴamɗa, barkaama, saɗi masin. Walaa baawɗo anndingo ma ɗum, sonaa ɗowanteeɓe. Ammaa joonde maɓɓe wonaay caka yimɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Akamɔ nɛ wannu aka'i yaka zale, ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ zu'i ha̧ wannu bo na; nɛ́ o sɔ̧ nɛ duk kɔ‘i mgbara bíí na a̧ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbara-a ɓɛɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Akamɔ nɛ wannu aka'i yaka zale, ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ zu'i ha̧ wannu bo na; nɛ́ o sɔ̧ nɛ duk kɔ‘i mgbara bíí na a̧ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbara-a ɓɛɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe wəsə nya 'yɛwe nya meghe kenza dzawe, wəndə shɛ kagezete nda ŋkɛ ke meghe we, nda yɛ shala. Ama kenza hɛ hwa mbeli we.»
Tupurri: Fen maga wañ wiin diñ fen ma de gaali, jobo boñ dra' kaçaç ma waçaçge äe ne wañ gaa, ni se diñ baa maga ngeel lagge äaara bay yoo jar tabay wo la wa mono.

Francais: Alors le roi entra dans une très violente colère et ordonna de mettre à mort tous les sages  de Babylone.
Anglais: Because of this the king was indignant and extremely furious and gave a command to destroy all the wise men of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ kayni mulla muɗ ɦiy ŋolo hiɗi purcakka suw asa. Nam vul hagata kay ci sum sa yalla sa hay Babilon kaf goyo.
Bulu: Eyoñe te ñhe njô bôt a nga dañe wôʼôlun, ve ve atiñe na, be mane wôé beyeme bese ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy a ji mevel, a zuɓ himaˀ fõh fõh, a ɓa mizli, ɓa a kiɗaka misi sin ngi Babiloŋhoyo vagay vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden laamiiɗo tikki masin, o umri mbarugo hikma'en Baabila fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden laamiiɗo tikki masin, o umri mbarugo hikma'en Baabila fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ see wannu ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt wen zu kifa-nú‘i; ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kum o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ yinɛ lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ see wannu ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt wen zu kifa-nú‘i; ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kum o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ yinɛ lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa wənəa meghe hwepete geva kwele kwele, pa gezete nda ke mbeli kezha mpə pɛtɛa ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone.
Tupurri: De sen mokay äil wañ raw ceege äe, äil äe raw soçoçge debañ. Se raw haç jag ga id jar ko ree ma Babilon wo go äuy.

Francais: Cette décision fut publiée, et les sages allaient être exécutés. On chercha donc aussi Daniel et ses compagnons pour les faire mourir.
Anglais: So the decree went out that the wise men were to be killed; and they looked for Daniel and his companions to put them to death.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala ɗota kayni kali goyo, a nisi ma ci sa yalla kaf goyo, nisi gar Daniel hiɗi nuriyomna kaw kay cisi goyo.
Bulu: Ane ntyiʼane ya wôé beyeme bese ô nga kateban vôm ase; be nga jeñe fe Daniel a bemvôé bé na be wôé be.
Guiziga: Mingiɓi naŋ a njik le. A wuɗ a ngizlaka misi sineye gweˀe, a supoko Daniyel ati ngama naŋhaya, ɓa a kiɗaka taŋ ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Umroore mbarugo ɓe anndinaama. Ɓe tefi Daniyel e sooba'en muuɗum ngam mbarugo ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Umroore mbarugo ɓe anndinaama. Ɓe tefi Daniyel e sooba'en muuɗum ngam mbarugo ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa hee mbéá‘e, wa tɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kii Daniɛl in o gbama-yari kɔ‘i mɛ gbɛ yinɛ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa hee mbéá‘e, wa tɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kii Daniɛl in o gbama-yari kɔ‘i mɛ gbɛ yinɛ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli zlapete nda wəsə nya tarete meghe ke mbeli pɛtɛ. Tagha gɛ, katempə ka ntsehwele ntsehwele mbeli. Pa mbeli zeleke Daniyɛl ba'a ka mcɛhɛnyɛ kezha mpə hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ dus waçaçre sen go, aè hay go mañ ma id jar ma de ko reen wo go, day aè hay kië Danyel wo de kaçaçre äen wo, ma id rage go lay.

Francais: Daniel s’adressa avec prudence et sagesse au capitaine Ariok, chef des gardes du roi, qui s’était mis en route pour aller mettre à mort les sages de Babylone.
Anglais: Then Daniel replied with discretion and wisdom to Arioch, the captain of the king’s  bodyguard, who had gone out to execute the wise men of Babylon;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta Daniel di yoboyn ma yali, ma ŋali kaw tam Aryok, ma ŋolla vi sojen sa ŋom mulla, ma kali goyo kay ci sum sa yalla hay nagata vi Babilon kaf goyna.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Daniel a nga kobô Aryok, évete bezimbi be njô bôt, nyô a nga yiane wôé beyeme ya Babilôn, a nga kobô nye a ntyel a fek
Guiziga: Ariyok, madiɗa ngi gawla ngi buyoyo, a bi le nga ngizla misi sinmijileŋ ngi Babiloŋhoyo. Joˀ Daniyel a kiɗam slir ati naŋ ti wer, ti ˀay mezle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daniyel wolwani Ariyok, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo, gurtiiɗo ngam mbarugo hikma'en Baabila. O wolwani mo bee hakkiilo e bee hikma,
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daniyel wolwani Ariyok, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo, gurtiiɗo ngam mbarugo hikma'en Baabila. O wolwani mo bee hakkiilo e bee hikma,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen nɛ mboozu in nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ Ariɔk wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ gboo so mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen nɛ mboozu in nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ Ariɔk wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ gboo so mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Daniyɛl gezete nda ghena le ntsehwele ba'a le mehele ke Ariyok, wəndə nya te ghəa ka sewajɛ nya kwa hweŋkwa kezha mpə ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone.
Tupurri: Mo so no Danyel kal fer waçaçre de ëeñ lay de geçeçge ma de el lay ne Ariyog wañ jar gor ti wañn wo, diñ je maga hay kal go ma id jar ma de ko ree ma Babilon wo go mono.

Francais: Il lui demanda pourquoi le roi avait prononcé une sentence si dure. Ariok lui exposa l’affaire.
Anglais: he said to Arioch, the king’s captain, “Why is the decree from the king so harsh  and  urgent?” Then Arioch explained the matter to Daniel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Daniel sli ditiya job tam Aryok soje ma ŋolla vi mulla ala: Mulla vul vun-ma-gatna ma dono ŋol ki kayn nala kay mige? Aryok vi sem lawta goy mi Daniel.
Bulu: a jô nye na: Amu jé ntyiʼane njô bôt ô ne abime ngule di? Nde aryok a nga kate Daniel jam e né.
Guiziga: A zla, a ɓa Ariyok madiɗa ngi soje ngi buyoyo na: «Buy a cici ɓi mutuwaˀ kahana vuna vur mike?» Ariyok a ɓa ɓi nah da Daniyele.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o wi'i: “Ngam ɗume umroore laamiiɗo saati bana nii?” Ariyok wi'i mo haala man.
Fulfulde_DC: o wi'i: “Ngam ɗume umroore laamiiɗo saati bana nii?” Ariyok wi'i mo haala man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ aka Ariɔk gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu'e: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ dee ha̧ wannu mɛ ha̧ ŋga heembea hegɔ‘i ge?» Ariɔk wee ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ Daniɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ aka Ariɔk gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu'e: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ dee ha̧ wannu mɛ ha̧ ŋga heembea hegɔ‘i ge?» Ariɔk wee ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ Daniɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha Ariyok, wəndə nya te ghəa ka sewajɛa meghe: «Va wa tarete wəsə nya dzawe nya meghe wa?» Tagha gɛ, pa Ariyok gezete nda ghena shɛ ke Daniyɛl.
Tupurri: Se kal waçaç waçaçre day riñ Ariyog je kluu jar gor ti wañn wo gano: Wer mayse ga ree se ma jag wañn de haçaç dosen no la? Ariyog raw bag blam ree sen ne Danyele.

Francais: Aussitôt Daniel se rendit chez le roi pour le prier de lui accorder un délai, afin qu’il puisse lui communiquer la signification de son rêve.
Anglais: So Daniel went in and asked the king to appoint a date  and  give him time, so that he might reveal to the king the interpretation  of the dream .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Daniel kali kat mulla, Daniel siɗaw mulla kay nam ma hinim liyn neeɗa kay nam ma dum caw duwayt goyo.
Bulu: Awolo te ebien, nde Daniel a nga ke be njô bôt asu ya yeʼelane nye na, a ve nye éyoñ, a ne zu kate nye biyeyem a atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Daniyel a ci ng'avu buyo, a tumbuloŋ ɓa a vulaŋ hin neˀ, a dirba nah, a sa ɓaŋ mbiɗeˀvra ngi musuwuno.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel yehi haa laamiiɗo, tori mo wakkati seɗɗa haa o fassitirana mo koyɗol maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel yehi haa laamiiɗo, tori mo wakkati seɗɗa haa o fassitirana mo koyɗol maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ tɛ wannu mɛ ak a̧ mɛ e be ŋgimbi ha'i wen kia gba̧a̧ zu kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ tɛ wannu mɛ ak a̧ mɛ e be ŋgimbi ha'i wen kia gba̧a̧ zu kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Taghanyɛ ne, cape Daniyɛl kalə sha meghe kezha səkwə ŋkɛ kave nda və ɓɛhwɛ, yitea gezete nda ghena nya mbe shiwəa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Day Danyel raw woge se wañ day kemn nen maga aà mo haç naw ne se nen maga se naa wer lwa'gen go ne wañ.

Francais: De retour chez lui, Daniel raconta toute l’affaire à ses compagnons Hanania, Michaël et Azaria ;
Anglais: Then Daniel returned to his house and discussed the matter with Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah, his companions,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni Daniel kali vo hay ziyna valamu, nam vul labara tam Hananiya, Mikayel hiɗi Azariya, sa nuriyomna,
Bulu: Eyoñ a bulane nda jé, nde Daniel a kate bemvôé bé Anania, Mikaél a Azaria jame te;
Guiziga: Dar Daniyel aru ngi hay naŋ, a ɓa ɓi naŋ da Hananiya, Mikayel waɗ Azariya, ngama naŋhay tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daniyel hooti, yecci ɗum sooba'en muuɗum Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya,
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daniyel hooti, yecci ɗum sooba'en muuɗum Hananiya e Miisayel e Azariya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ o gbama-yari kɔ‘i Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ o gbama-yari kɔ‘i Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria,
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Daniyɛl zhɛneghe geva kajɛghɛ. Pa ŋkɛ gezete nda ghena shɛ ke Hananiya, Mishayɛl ba'a Azariya nyi kaka mcɛhɛnyɛ.
Tupurri: Blam sen Danyel kal rawge liñ ni äe, raw bag blam ree sen ne Hananiya, Mikayel wo de Asariya, kaçaçre äen wo

Francais: il les invita à implorer la bienveillance du Dieu du ciel au sujet de ce rêve mystérieux, afin de ne pas être exécutés avec les autres sages de Babylone.
Anglais: in order that they might seek compassion from the God of heaven regarding this secret, so that Daniel and his companions would not be executed with the rest of the wise men of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nisi ma job slugota vi Lawn ma wuralawna a nam ma ɗeksi ŋayayta kayni goy kirsiya, kay Daniel hiɗi nuriyomna ma fi cita-goyta hiɗi sum segen sa yalla sa ka hay Babilonɗi.
Bulu: nde fe a jô be na, be sili mvame Zambe ya yôbe na, a kulane be nsolane biyeyem ôte, ndemben ba ye bo te wôéban ba be beyeme mam bevoʼo ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: A ɓa taŋ ɓa a tumbuloko Buymuŋ vur ɓi ngi gwat mufuna wuluk ngi mbur hana, ɓa a ga taŋ mezleŋ, vur taŋ mamicam jom ati misi sinmijileŋ ngi Babiloŋhoyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam haa ɓe toro Allah mo asama, o hinno ɓe, o waŋginana ɓe sirri maajum, ngam taa ɓe mbarda Daniyel e sooba'en muuɗum bee hikma'en Baabila woɗɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: ngam haa ɓe toro Allah mo asama, o hinno ɓe, o waŋginana ɓe sirri maajum, ngam taa ɓe mbarda Daniyel e sooba'en muuɗum bee hikma'en Baabila woɗɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen mbaŋa tɛ-wa ha̧ wa mɛ ai nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ yiwese zu hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i, wen ká‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ fe in wa gu nɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen mbaŋa tɛ-wa ha̧ wa mɛ ai nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ yiwese zu hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i, wen ká‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ fe in wa gu nɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha hɛ: «Səkwə ɓəmə Shala nya pelɛ ghweme kezha ncɛ ɓəmə shiwə nya tewəfərə nya ŋkɛ laka zeɗe helia ŋkɛ. Ma tsagha ne, katempə ɓəmə mbeli zlaɓe le kweci ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone we.»
Tupurri: nen maga aà mo joñ wo kam kam ne Baa ma ciñn ti fen ma de yoñre seno, nen maga aè mo id Danyel wo de kaçaçre äen wo de te jar ko ree ma Babilon wo go wa.

Francais: Et le mystère fut révélé à Daniel pendant la nuit, au cours d’une vision. Alors Daniel se mit à louer le Dieu du ciel
Anglais: Then the secret was revealed to Daniel in a vision of the night, and Daniel blessed the God of heaven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta kayni ŋayayta na'ta vulis kir Daniel hay li ma van ɗek tuwam kiramu hay henjeta. Nala Daniel subur Lawna ma hay wuralawna.
Bulu: Ane nsolane jam ô nga kulubane be Daniel e biyeyem a alu. Daniel nye ve taté na a kañe Zambe ya yôp,
Guiziga: Akẽh na, ngi duvuɗo, gwat mufuna wuluk ngi mbur tuwa, a njik avu Daniyele, a pura ti kleŋ. Joˀ a ga sise da Buymuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Allah waŋginani Daniyel sirri man bee jemma nder wahayu. Ngam maajum Daniyel maŋgti Allah mo asama,
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Allah waŋginani Daniyel sirri man bee jemma nder wahayu. Ngam maajum Daniyel maŋgti Allah mo asama,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ zɛ, Sɔ̧ usa mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i ha̧ Daniɛl tɛ hɔɔ-zu, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl zɔn Sɔ̧ yiwese tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ zɛ, Sɔ̧ usa mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i ha̧ Daniɛl tɛ hɔɔ-zu, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl zɔn Sɔ̧ yiwese tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa shiwə nya tewəfərəa shɛ ncɛte nda geva ke Daniyɛl heviɗi. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Daniyɛl tsahekɛ Shala nya pelɛ ghweme.
Tupurri: Mo so no aè raw naa nen fen ma de yoñren go ne Danyel nen lwa'ge de suñ. Danyel raw togoë Baa ma ciñ no.

Francais: en ces termes : « Remercions Dieu en tout temps, car la sagesse et la puissance lui appartiennent.
Anglais: Daniel answered, “Blessed be the name of God forever and ever, For wisdom and power belong to Him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel sli ditiya nam di'e: Suburta tam semda vi Lawna, hay vatɗit pa ta-ta hay vatɗita.
Bulu: nye na: jôé Zambe da yian ékañaʼa, ataté nnôm éto a kui nnôm éto! Fek a ngu bi nʼémbié.
Guiziga: Dar Daniyel a zla a ɓi: «Anja i gaka sise da Buymisemuŋ ndrehhe, hã ngi sete! Asi sinmijileŋ waɗ gidaŋ, inga naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: wi'i: “Yettoore laatano innde Allah foroy haa abada! Ngam o mari hikma e baawɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: wi'i: “Yettoore laatano innde Allah foroy haa abada! Ngam o mari hikma e baawɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Nin Sɔ̧ a̧ hu̧r ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo, wen iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai nɛ ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Nin Sɔ̧ a̧ hu̧r ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo, wen iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai nɛ ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Daniyɛl gezete: «Tsahe ɓəmə Shala kevə kevə. Kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe ntsehwele ba'a berete kenza kaŋa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Danyel kal waçaç waçaçre day gano: Ëu Baa mo hay de bosa' ti ma tum!

Francais: Il est le maître du temps et de l’Histoire, il renverse les rois ou les établit. C’est lui qui accorde la sagesse aux sages, qui donne le discernement aux intelligents,
Anglais: It is He who changes the times and the seasons; He removes kings and establishes kings. He gives wisdom to the wise And [greater] knowledge to those who have understanding!
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Talam namu yalda hiɗi donota ka'a. Namu mi ma muɗ liyna hiɗi buura, ma cuk muliyan gaa'a, ma tun muliyana, ma vul yalda tam sa yalla, ma vul yamda-wida tam nisi sa ka hiɗi wida-yalla.
Bulu: A ne njôô ya biyoñ, a nyô ya mam ma bobane biyoñ, aval a vaa bejô bôt, nde fe a telé be; e Nye a ve mimfefeʼe fek a ñyemane mam, e be ba be ne mintyetyeñ.
Guiziga: I naŋ mambuɗa hiney ati gwat ngi giheye, i naŋ maputukuso buyoyo, i naŋ maca buyoyo, a vul sinmijileŋ da misi sinmijileŋhey, yo a vul sli wala ngi gwat da misina sli wala ngi gwatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko waylititta wakkatiiji e saa'iije, kaŋko ɓornata laamiiɓe laamu, kaŋko ɓortata ɓe, kaŋko hokkata hikma haa hikma'en e anndal haa annduɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko waylititta wakkatiiji e saa'iije, kaŋko ɓornata laamiiɓe laamu, kaŋko ɓortata ɓe, kaŋko hokkata hikma haa hikma'en e anndal haa annduɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o ŋgimbi mɛ kpai ŋmaa; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbo o wannu tɛ wan yinɛ, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba o bíí e tɛ wan; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o ŋgimbi mɛ kpai ŋmaa; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbo o wannu tɛ wan yinɛ, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba o bíí e tɛ wan; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde mbeɗe yɛ və ba'a wəshi nyi kemene geva. Gheŋkɛ nde fə ka meghe sawa te meghe ba'a nde ve ka meghe mbe meghe. Gheŋkɛ nde ve nda ntsehwele ke ka ntsehwele ntsehwele ba'a ɗepe wəsə ke ka ɗepe wəshi.
Tupurri: Koge reen wo de eegre wo diñ ma äe. Coor wurn wo de naw wo na diñ se, Srog wañre wo go gesiñ na diñ se, Day lag wañre wo ti paale na diñ se lay. A haç koge ree ne jar ma de ko ree wo, A haç koge ne jar ma de tin wo.

Francais: et qui révèle les secrets les plus mystérieux. Il sait ce qui se cache dans les ténèbres, car la lumière brille à ses côtés.
Anglais: It is He who reveals the profound and hidden things; He knows what is in the darkness, And the light dwells with Him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Namu mi ma pat dir slen ma zulu ma ŋayayna kaw goyna, namu wi slen ma ka hay jufunda, tam namu haraŋa ka'a.
Bulu: Nye a kulane mam me nʼédok a nsolan; a yem e mam me ne e dibi été, a éfufup ja bômane nye.
Guiziga: Gwat miyaŋŋahay ati miɗum ɗumoyo, i naŋ manjika taŋ. Gwat miɗum ar luvuŋ, a si na le, asi li naŋ misi ara na, i li minjaha.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko waŋginta lugguɗum e sirriijum, kaŋko woni annduɗo ko nyukki nder nyiɓre, annoora ɗon wondi bee maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko waŋginta lugguɗum e sirriijum, kaŋko woni annduɗo ko nyukki nder nyiɓre, annoora ɗon wondi bee maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba mɔ nɛ‘i iŋ na in mɔ nɛ ɔ hu̧sa̧ gbonɛ. A̧ iŋa mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ tum, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ duk in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba mɔ nɛ‘i iŋ na in mɔ nɛ ɔ hu̧sa̧ gbonɛ. A̧ iŋa mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ tum, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ duk in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde ncɛ wəshi nyi dzawe dzawe nyi tewəfərə. Nahe ŋkɛ keɗepe wəsə nya tewəfərə mbe ŋkwesle, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaɓele waŋe dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Ndar wer fen ma kuëum ma de yoñre go na diñ se. Go de da' wer ne mo ma nen suñgu na diñ se, Day poëagn le na see äe.

Francais: Vers toi, Dieu de mes ancêtres, montent ma reconnaissance et mes louanges : tu m’as rempli de sagesse et de force. Tu m’as fait connaître ce que nous t’avons demandé, en nous révélant ce qui préoccupe le roi. »
Anglais: I thank You and praise You, O God of my fathers, For You have given me wisdom and power; Even now You have made known to me what we requested of You, For You have made known to us [the solution to] the king’s matter.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ Lawna vi sumiyanu, nan tiyaŋ seŋu, suburaŋ kaw, kay yalla hiɗi donota ma naŋ vulanawa, kay naŋ ɗekanawa kay va ma vulawa kiranu, numa siɗawaŋ kalamu, kay naŋ ɗekmaawa kay lawta mi mulla.
Bulu: A Zambe ya bʼésaa bam, ma kañe wo a ve wo akéva, amu fek a ngu ô veya ma, amu ô boya na, me yem e jam bi nga sili wo, a ô kulaneya bia e jam da tyelé njô bôte nleme yôp.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ ɗuwoy, i guw dudok, yo i hunumuw, asi ki vuliy sinmijileŋ le waɗ gidaŋ. Wurenna, gwat ndra mucufuɗaka na, ki bigiy di le, ti ka minjika ndra gwat maga weleleˀ da buy na.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Allah kaakiraaɓe am, mi maŋgti ma, mi yetti ma, ngam a hokki yam hikma e baawɗe. A waŋginani yam jonta ko min tori ma, a anndini min koyɗol laamiiɗo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Allah kaakiraaɓe am, mi maŋgti ma, mi yetti ma, ngam a hokki yam hikma e baawɗe. A waŋginani yam jonta ko min tori ma, a anndini min koyɗol laamiiɗo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ gasi nɛ ɛnɛ mbɛt, Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m, wen ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai ha̧‘m. Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ n’ɛɛ aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa mbɛt h’ɛ́ɛ́, tɛ dea-a h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ nɛ sakali wannu.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ gasi nɛ ɛnɛ mbɛt, Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m, wen ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai ha̧‘m. Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ n’ɛɛ aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa mbɛt h’ɛ́ɛ́, tɛ dea-a h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ nɛ sakali wannu.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma gha, gha Shala ta ka shihɛ n'yɛ ne, katsa ŋa hana 'ya ba'a katsahe ŋa 'ya. Nahe na kendeke ɗa ntsehwele ba'a berete. Nahe na kencɛte ɗa wəsə nya 'yɛwete ghen'yɛ va gha, nahe na kefave n'yɛ wəsə nya keyirə meghe.»
Tupurri: Baa mani paçaçre äin wo, Ndi mañ ti äo ciñ, ndi joñ suse' mo, Wer koge ree wo de eegre maga ndo haç me mono. Gahaçyla, ndo kañ nen äi go ti fen maga Wuur hay wiin do äo mono, Day ndo naa nen ree mani wañn go ne wuuri!

Francais: Là-dessus, Daniel se rendit chez Ariok, à qui le roi avait ordonné de tuer les sages de Babylone. Sitôt arrivé, il lui dit : « Ne fais pas mourir les sages de Babylone ! Introduis-moi auprès du roi et je lui indiquerai la signification de son rêve. »
Anglais: So Daniel went to Arioch, whom the king had appointed to destroy the wise men of Babylon; he went and said this to him: “Do not execute the wise men of Babylon! Bring me before the king, and I will reveal to the king the interpretation [of his dream].”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni Daniel kal kat Aryok ma mulla vulum hagata kay ci sum sa yalla hay Babilon kaf goyna. Nam kali talamu dum ala: Naŋ ma ci sum sa yalla hay Babilon goyɗi, gan diran tam mulla, nan min dum caw duwayt goyo.
Bulu: Mvus éte nje Daniel a zu ke be Aryok, e môte njô bôt a nga bendé na, a wôé beyeme ya Babilôn, a jô nye na: Te bo na beyeme ya Babilôn be wôéban. Kele ma e be njô bôt, me kate nye atinane ya biyeyeme bié.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Daniyel a ci ng'avi Ariyok, mbur buy muvulaŋ slra ngi ngizla misi sinmijileŋ ngi Babiloŋhoy tuwa. Joˀ Daniyel a ɓaŋ: «Ki ngizla misi sinmijileŋ ngi Babiloŋhoyo ta, ci ti ya ngi hay buyo, ɓa i njikaŋ ɓi ngi musuwun naŋ na.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man Daniyel yehi haa Ariyok mo laamiiɗo umruno ɗum mbarugo hikma'en Baabila, wi'i mo: “Taa mbar hikma'en Baabila. Yahram haa laamiiɗo haa mi fassitirana mo koyɗol maako.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man Daniyel yehi haa Ariyok mo laamiiɗo umruno ɗum mbarugo hikma'en Baabila, wi'i mo: “Taa mbar hikma'en Baabila. Yahram haa laamiiɗo haa mi fassitirana mo koyɗol maako.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl yee tua ɗoŋ Ariɔk wi nɛ wannu ha̧a̧ so heembea ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ; ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kúm o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn nú Babilɔŋ na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m nɛnɛ tɛ wannu ha̧‘m tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu kɔ-wa ha̧ wa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl yee tua ɗoŋ Ariɔk wi nɛ wannu ha̧a̧ so heembea ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ; ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kúm o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn nú Babilɔŋ na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m nɛnɛ tɛ wannu ha̧‘m tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu kɔ-wa ha̧ wa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, cape Daniyɛl kalə sha Ariyok nya ndeke nda hweŋkwa meghe kezha mpə ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone. Sema ta ŋkɛ ne, ma ke shɛ: «Mpəma ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone na gɛ ma! Keleghe ɗa kadzeki sha meghe, katencɛ nda ghena nya mbe shiwəa ŋkɛ 'ya.»
Tupurri: Blam äe Danyel raw woge see Ariyog maga wañ hay haç jag ne hen ga aà mo id jar ko ree ma Babilon wo go mono. AÀ kal woge day wiin do kay nono gano: Taw jar ko ree ma Babilon wo go wa. Wo de äi pel wañ day ni ndi naa wer lwa'gen yañ go ne wañ.

Francais: Sans tarder, Ariok amena Daniel chez le roi et dit à celui-ci : « Majesté, parmi les déportés de Juda, j’ai trouvé un homme capable de t’indiquer la signification de ton rêve. »
Anglais: Then Arioch hurriedly brought Daniel before the king and said this to him: “I have found a man among the exiles of Judah who can explain to the king the interpretation [of the dream].”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Aryok tuɗ Daniel gosoyo tam mulla, ka dum ala: Nan fi sa kepe jar sum sa yawsi ay goy hay Yuda pana, nam as daŋ caw duwayt goyo.
Bulu: Nde Aryok a jiʼa kee Daniel e be njô bôt a jô nye na: E be minkôme ya Yuda été, me yeneya môt a ye kate njô bôt atinane ya biyeyeme bié.
Guiziga: Ariyok a ci ti Daniyele kutum ngi hay buyo, a ɓaŋ: «Kumani, i lumo mbur le a wuzla mizli mijoko taŋ ti ruwuy Zuda na. A sa ɓuw mbiɗeˀvra ngi musuwun ɗike.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Law Ariyok yahri Daniyel yeeso laamiiɗo, wi'i: “Barkaama, mi tawi goɗɗo caka dahaaɓe  iwɓe Yahuuda, o fassitirante koyɗol ma.”
Fulfulde_DC: Law Ariyok yahri Daniyel yeeso laamiiɗo, wi'i: “Barkaama, mi tawi goɗɗo caka dahaaɓe  iwɓe Yahuuda, o fassitirante koyɗol ma.”
