KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ariɔk mgbɔɔ Daniɛl nɛnɛ tɛ wannu nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wannu, mi kpaa ŋma bíí mgbara o be Juda n’ɛɛ kaia so nɛ bara-biro, nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ariɔk mgbɔɔ Daniɛl nɛnɛ tɛ wannu nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wannu, mi kpaa ŋma bíí mgbara o be Juda n’ɛɛ kaia so nɛ bara-biro, nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Taghanyɛ ne, pa Ariyok keleghe Daniyɛl kadzeki sha meghe, ma ke shɛ: «Meghe yawe, ma hwa mbeli nyi fəke na se mbe Zhəwda ne, nahe 'ya kentsate wəndə nya kenza kancɛte ŋa ghena nya mbe shiwəa ŋa.»
Tupurri: Ariyog raw woge de Danyel deparday pel wañ day riñn do kay nono gano: Ndi yañ de da' jobo yoo jar maga aè hoo ra le ti sir Juda wo la ma naa wer lwa'gen go ne wañ.

Francais: Le roi s’adressa à Daniel, appelé aussi Beltassar, et lui demanda : « Es-tu vraiment capable de me révéler ce que j’ai rêvé et de m’en donner la signification ? »
Anglais: The king said to Daniel, whose [Babylonian] name was Belteshazzar, “Are you able to reveal to me the [content of the] dream which I have seen and its interpretation?”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla sli ditiya di tam Daniel ma nisi yum Belsasar: Daniel, naŋ nagay kay ɗekan kay duwayta, kay da' cawa' goyo kaw su?
Bulu: Njô bôt nye Daniel a mbe jôé afe na Beltsazar na: Ye ô ne foʼo nguleya bo na me yem biyeyeme ma te yem atinane yʼété?
Guiziga: Buy a zla a ɓa Daniyel mazilaka Beltasar tuwa: «Musuwun migiy na, ki bigiy di gu kwa, yo ki ɓiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ gu kwa?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo ƴami Daniyel, bi'eteeɗo Beltesacar: “A waawan anndingo yam koyɗol ngol koyɗumi e maana maagol na?”
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo ƴami Daniyel, bi'eteeɗo Beltesacar: “A waawan anndingo yam koyɗol ngol koyɗumi e maana maagol na?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ wa sa so'e Bɛltasar: «Mɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu n'am ɔɔ in gba̧a̧-a̧ mbɛt nde?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ wa sa so'e Bɛltasar: «Mɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu n'am ɔɔ in gba̧a̧-a̧ mbɛt nde?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe 'yɛwete va Daniyɛl nya nza kwete sləa ŋkɛ kaBɛltasar: «Kaganda nza na kagezete shiwəa ɗa ba'a kancɛte ɗa ghena nya mbe na?»
Tupurri: Wañ kal waçaç waçaçre day wii Danyel maga aè hay ëege äe ga Belsatsar gano: Ndo yañ de kaçaçge ma kañ nen äi ti lwa'ge maga ndi lwa'n de naage wer äen yawla?

Francais: Daniel lui répondit : « Aucun sage, aucun magicien, aucun devin, aucun astrologue n’est en mesure de révéler au roi le mystère dont il parle.
Anglais: Daniel answered the king and said, “Regarding the mystery about which the king has inquired, neither the wise men, enchanters, magicians, nor astrologers are able to answer the king,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel hot dit tam mulla ala: Ŋayayta ta naŋ mulla min huma' cawa'ta kayni, sum sa yalla as fa' cawa'ɗi, sa wi caw mislekŋa, sa wi gul-liyna hiɗi sa tun gireyta kaf as ɗeka' kiraŋɗi;
Bulu: Daniel a nga yalane nye na: Befas ateté, bebo majik a mimvimviʼi be se nguleya kate njô bôt nsolane jam a kômbô yem.
Guiziga: Daniyel a mbiɗa da buyo: «Gwat ka masla wala naŋ ta hana na, misi sinmijileŋhey, muɓula musuɗukoy, misi cucukoy, malla mipi daˀasaya, ko pal maɓuw di, yo manjukuw ɓi naŋ gu anta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel jaabi laamiiɗo: “Barkaama, sirri ko ƴamɗa maana muuɗum, hikma'en e laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e annduɓe haala koode mbaawataa waŋginango ma ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel jaabi laamiiɗo: “Barkaama, sirri ko ƴamɗa maana muuɗum, hikma'en e laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e annduɓe haala koode mbaawataa waŋginango ma ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wan-gbana, o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi in o wi-zɔk-mɔ nyɛm mɛ we ɗoŋ hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wan-gbana, o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi in o wi-zɔk-mɔ nyɛm mɛ we ɗoŋ hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Daniyɛl zhɛnete nda: «Meghe yawe, wəndə shɛ hwa ka ntsehwele ntsehwele, hwa ka ŋa zlera, hwa ka mene ghwɛ, hwa ka ɗepe newe nza ta yɛ saseregwa kagezete nda shiwə nya tewəfərə ta ŋkɛ ke meghe we.
Tupurri: Danyel raw fer waçaçre pel wañ ni day gano: Fen ma de yoñre maga wañ wiin mono, je kañ nen wañ ti äe bay diñ jar ko reen wo, jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñn wo, jar ko wer feçeçren wo de jar kañ halgen wo wa,

Francais: Mais il y a dans le ciel un Dieu qui révèle les mystères. C’est lui qui fait connaître au roi Nabucodonosor ce qui arrivera dans l’avenir. Eh bien, voici la vision que tu as eue durant ton sommeil :
Anglais: but there is a God in heaven who reveals secrets, and He has shown King Nebuchadnezzar what will take place in the latter days (end of days). This was your dream and the vision [that appeared] in your mind while on your bed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: may Lawna mara ka kep hay wuralawna ma ɗek caw ŋayayta goyo, namu ma as ɗek kiraŋ naŋu mulla Nebukadnesar slen ma min li'e hay buur ma vokŋa. Kayni ti duwayta ta daŋu hiɗi va ma vul tuwam kiraŋu, hay li ma naŋ ka buri gaa kay va ma buura vaŋu:
Bulu: Ve Zambe a ne yôp, Nye a kulane minsolane mi mam, nye a bo na ô yeme jam da ye bobane melu ma zu. Biyeyem ô nga yem ô too ôyo mbie bi:
Guiziga: Amma Buymuŋ ada, a njik gwat mufuna wuluk ngi mbur, yo gwat masa gi ti mbuŋ na, i naŋ mabuguw di da ka buy madiɗa Nabukodonozoro. Musuwun ɗik ati gwat ka mupura ti kleŋ, ti ka mutup na, n'ani.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa woodi Allah mo asama, kaŋko waŋginta sirriiji. O holli ma, yaa laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor, ko laatoto yeeso ɗo. Koyɗol ngol koyɗuɗa e wahayuuji ɗi ngi'ɗa dow be'itte ma, ndaa ɗum:
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa woodi Allah mo asama, kaŋko waŋginta sirriiji. O holli ma, yaa laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor, ko laatoto yeeso ɗo. Koyɗol ngol koyɗuɗa e wahayuuji ɗi ngi'ɗa dow be'itte ma, ndaa ɗum:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ŋma Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ yiwese nɛ ba hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan; nɛ́ a̧‘i a̧ usa mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr. Gba̧a̧ zu n’ɛnɛ ɔa in mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka ŋgimbi ɔɔ ya k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ŋma Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ yiwese nɛ ba hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan; nɛ́ a̧‘i a̧ usa mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr. Gba̧a̧ zu n’ɛnɛ ɔa in mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka ŋgimbi ɔɔ ya k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Ama Shala nya kencɛ wəshi nyi tewəfərə ya pelɛ ghweme. Gheŋkɛ nde ncɛ nda wəsə nya ketemene geva te kwete hɛ ke meghe Nabəkodonozor. Wa nya wəsə nya nakɛ na te shiwə vəa ŋkwa nya nza na yitea hɛ nya:
Tupurri: ama Baa yañ le ciñ boñ, aà ndar nen feçeçre ma de yoñre wo go day se hay naa nen fen maga joñ ge yañ wo ti wur ma peln wo go ne wañ Nebukanetsare. Lwa'ge äon wo de feçeçre maga hay mbuë wo nen äo ti fen suuli äo wo do kay nono:

Francais: Lorsque tu t’es couché, tu t’es mis à penser à l’avenir. Alors celui qui révèle les mystères t’a montré ce qui arrivera.
Anglais: As for you, O king, as you were lying on your bed thoughts came into your mind about what will take place in the future; and He who reveals secrets has shown you what will occur.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ mulla, hay li ma naŋ ka buri gaa kay va ma buura vaŋu, varta ta co kaŋga law kay slen ma min li'e hay liyn ma vokayna. Nam ma ɗek ŋayayta ɗekaŋawa kay slen ma min li voko.
Bulu: A monti njô bôt, éyoñ ô nga bômbô si, ô nga taté na wo simesane mame ya melu ma zu. Nde nyô a kulane minsolane mi mam, a nga liti wo jam da ye boban.
Guiziga: Aw buy ɗu, ti ka mutup na, ki ra wuluk ar gwatay masa gam ti mbuŋ. Minjika gwat maslaam wala tahaya, a njukuw gwat masa gam tumbuŋ le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i a ɗon waali, barkaama, a numi ko tammi laataago. Baŋginoowo sirriiji anndini ma ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i a ɗon waali, barkaama, a numi ko tammi laataago. Baŋginoowo sirriiji anndini ma ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ɔɔ nɛ nu gɔn gado k’ɛ́nɛ́, taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kura duk tɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ wi-ba-mɔ e zan usi mɔ nɛ tɛ de nɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ɔɔ nɛ nu gɔn gado k’ɛ́nɛ́, taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kura duk tɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ wi-ba-mɔ e zan usi mɔ nɛ tɛ de nɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Meghe yawe, ma kwa nza na meɓelahe ne, nahe na kese kazəzə wəsə nya ketemene geva te kwete hɛ. Tagha gɛ, pa nde ncɛ wəshi nyi tewəfərə ncɛte ŋa wəsə nya ketemene geva.
Tupurri: Ti fen suuli äo, wañ, ndo hay ëiggi ti feçeçre maga joñ ge wo wo wurpo ti naw ma pel wo mono day je maga ndar nen feçeçre ma de yoñre wo go raw kañ nen äo go ti fen maga joñ ge wo wurpo mono.

Francais: Pour ma part, ce mystère m’a été révélé, non pas parce que je serais plus sage que n’importe qui d’autre, mais pour que quelqu’un puisse te communiquer la signification de ton rêve et te faire connaître ce qui inquiète ton esprit.
Anglais: But as for me, this secret has not been revealed to me because my wisdom is greater than that of any other living man, but in order to make the interpretation known to the king, and so that you may understand [fully] the thoughts of your mind.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La ŋayay na'ta ɗekawa kiranu, kayn min di ala yalla vanu suw sum sa irin kafe naɗi, may kayni kay dir duwayta ma diys goy taŋ naŋ mulla, kay naŋ ma wi varta vi dikaŋu kaw.
Bulu: Nge nsolane jame te ô nga kulebane be ma, nalé a nji boban amu na, me bili fek ja dañe nyô ya bôte bese be vee, vʼamu na, môt éziñ a kate wo atinane ya biyeyem, a na, ô yem asimesane ya e nleme wôé.
Guiziga: Na ya, gwat mufuna wuluk ngi mbur na, a njikikiy di le. Anta vur ya ti sinmijileŋ fineˀ mizli gar ta, amma vur ɓa i njukuw ɓi naŋ da ka buyo, waɗ ɓa ki si na wuluk ngi mevel ɗike.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waŋginani yam sirri man, naa ngam mi ɓurdi yimɓe woɗɓe fuu hikma, ammaa ngam mi fassitirane, barkaama, haa a faama numooji ɓernde ma.
Fulfulde_DC: O waŋginani yam sirri man, naa ngam mi ɓurdi yimɓe woɗɓe fuu hikma, ammaa ngam mi fassitirane, barkaama, haa a faama numooji ɓernde ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War kɔ‘m, bo nɛ wen nɛ̀ iŋamɔ kɔ‘m gana ko o dɔka bíí sa Sɔ̧ usi nɛ ndaa mɔ'ɛ ha̧‘m na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ha'i mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧ wannu, in ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-wi nɛ tɛ-wi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War kɔ‘m, bo nɛ wen nɛ̀ iŋamɔ kɔ‘m gana ko o dɔka bíí sa Sɔ̧ usi nɛ ndaa mɔ'ɛ ha̧‘m na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ha'i mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧ wannu, in ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-wi nɛ tɛ-wi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma 'ya le ŋa ɗa ne, nahe ghena nya mbe shiwə nya tewəfərə ta ŋa kencɛte ɗa geva. Ndagwara kenza 'ya ntsehwele ma ke kwete wəndə we, ama kezha ncɛte ghena nya mbe shiwəa ŋa mbeli ba'a kezha ɗepete wəsə nya keyirə ŋa na.
Tupurri: Hayba ga aè naa wer fen ma de yoñre sen go ne ndi so laybla' no, sen na bay diñ ga koge ree äi de dañ ma jar maga wo tenen mo ti' äuy wa. AÀma aà naa nen äe go maga aè mo naa wer lwa'gen go ne wañ day ndo mo da' wer go ne ëiggi maga wo le äil äo mono.

Francais: Voici donc ce que tu as vu : Devant toi se dressait une grande, très grande statue, d’une splendeur éblouissante et d’un aspect terrifiant.
Anglais: “You, O king, were looking, and behold, [there was] a single great statue; this image, which was large and of unsurpassed splendor, stood before you, and its appearance was awesome  and  terrifying.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Awa mulla, va vul tuwam kiraŋu, naŋ wi va ma sli tuw sana ma ŋolo, va ma sli tuw sana namna ŋol yo, wileta valamu laŋ ɦuyumu kaw. Nam ka coli kulo vokaŋu, nam ɗuw ir valam pa'.
Bulu: A Monti njô bôt jam ô nga yen nde di: O nga yen étua beta éveʼela é tele wo ôsu é too aval étôtok ja wôé mis, é too fe ékowoñ.
Guiziga: Aw buy ɗu, ka so na, ki ra pur hiri zleˀe, keɗ na, gwat madiɗa miciɗa ti ciɗ deŋ a mbuŋ ɗike. Gwat miciɗa nah vuna, naŋ madiɗa haɗa, yo a wucuɗ wilik wilik. Naŋ deŋ a mbuŋ ɗike, deŋ naŋ a muɗ didaka haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder koyɗol ma, barkaama, a yi'i suura makka. Ka maapinndiiha, ɗelko maaka ɓuri semmbe. Ka dari yeeso ma, jaati maaka kulniika.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder koyɗol ma, barkaama, a yi'i suura makka. Ka maapinndiiha, ɗelko maaka ɓuri semmbe. Ka dari yeeso ma, jaati maaka kulniika.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Wannu, mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka tɛ ɔɔ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Ɛnɛ zɔka gasa ɓoo-bíí nɛ yor ti'nɛ́ tok nɛnɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bo so nɛ mɔ ha'i mɛ zɔk na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Wannu, mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka tɛ ɔɔ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Ɛnɛ zɔka gasa ɓoo-bíí nɛ yor ti'nɛ́ tok nɛnɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bo so nɛ mɔ ha'i mɛ zɔk na.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya wəsə nya nakɛ na nya: Nahe pa ta wəndə kese te kema ta ŋa. Nahe pa ta wəndəa shɛ kenza kewəbanyɛ ba'a kese kaɓele tsape tsape. Nahe nza ta ŋkɛ kese kawəsə keve nda ghazlənə ke mbeli.
Tupurri: Wañ, mopo mbuë nen äo, diñ fodo mopo kluu ta'a. Fodo sen hay kluu debañ lay, hay sagge sara lay. AÀ hay de oole pel äo deñ deele day nen äe hay joñ heçeçne lay.

Francais: La tête de la statue était en or pur, sa poitrine et ses bras en argent, son ventre et ses cuisses en bronze,
Anglais: As for this  statue, its head  was made  of fine gold, its breast and its arms of silver, its belly and its thighs of bronze,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Va ma sli tuw sana namna yalam ma kulona mi or ma bay-rigasna, war-digamu hiɗi gilaŋatamu mi doorona, hayamu hiɗi furamu mi wayn ma slawi may.
Bulu: Nlô ya éveʼela te ô mbe nya or, nkuk a mo bi too argent, abum a mebé ki mvot;
Guiziga: Hirnga naŋ, i mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, didak ati hirbazla, i mipa taŋ ti ɓiri bara, kwacay ati tuwalaya, i mipa taŋ ti ɓiri gaza,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hoore suura ka'a waɗaama bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, wiɓɓere maaka e juuɗe maaka bee cardi, reedu maaka e dawɗe maaka bee njamndi mboɗeeri,
Fulfulde_DC: Hoore suura ka'a waɗaama bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, wiɓɓere maaka e juuɗe maaka bee cardi, reedu maaka e dawɗe maaka bee njamndi mboɗeeri,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu ɓoo-bíí‘i nɛ́ de sa̧a̧ lɔr, yí-ŋguɗi-a in o ɓaa-a nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, zaŋ-aa in o ku-a nɛ́ ndɛrɛ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu ɓoo-bíí‘i nɛ́ de sa̧a̧ lɔr, yí-ŋguɗi-a in o ɓaa-a nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, zaŋ-aa in o ku-a nɛ́ ndɛrɛ,
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ghəa pa ta wəndəa shɛ kenza kamze kwa tere tere ganyɛ, hate ta ŋkɛ ba'a yɛ dzeve ta ŋkɛ kamze kwa tɛawetɛa, hwəa ŋkɛ ba'a yɛ basa ta ŋkɛ kamze kwa ghwə ghwə,
Tupurri: Ti fodo sen hay diñ boo biñni ma bay sir nene, jag jiili äe wo de do äe hay wo diñ boo solay, äil äe wo de kuçni äe hay wo diñ boo dobe,

Francais: ses jambes en fer, et ses pieds moitié en fer et moitié en terre cuite.
Anglais: its legs of iron, its feet partly of iron and partly of clay [pottery].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gayamu mi kawaya, selemu galam kawaya, galam naga'a.
Bulu: mebo me too étyé, éfase mekule mebo jia é too étyé, ji évoʼo ki ndiʼane tyia.
Guiziga: saraya, i mipa taŋ ti ɓiri ho gar, sar ngi ɗuv a ruwuyo, cah i mipa ti ɓiri ho gar, cah numuŋ kwana, i mindira ti hohoy muzluma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: korle maaka bee njamndi ɓaleeri, yeɓre teppe maaka njamndi e yeɓre boo loope.
Fulfulde_DC: korle maaka bee njamndi ɓaleeri, yeɓre teppe maaka njamndi e yeɓre boo loope.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o ti-bee-a nɛ́ boi, reeta o naŋ-a nɛ́ boi, ɓɛɛ ɓii reeta-a nɛ́ dɔɔ gii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o ti-bee-a nɛ́ boi, reeta o naŋ-a nɛ́ boi, ɓɛɛ ɓii reeta-a nɛ́ dɔɔ gii.
Kapsiki_DC: yɛ jajɛghwa ta ŋkɛ kalɛ. Ma yɛ seɗa ta ŋkɛ ne, kalɛ kwete bela ta nci, karekɛ kwete.
Tupurri: Koyor äe wo diñ boo, faale äaale äe wo plañ diñ boo, plañ diñ paçy.

Francais: Tu as contemplé cette statue jusqu’au moment où une pierre s’est détachée de la montagne  sans intervention humaine ; elle est venue frapper les pieds en fer et en terre cuite de la statue, et les a fracassés.
Anglais: As you were looking, a  stone was cut out without [human] hands, and it struck the statue on its feet of iron and clay and crushed them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma naŋ ka ɗuwumu, hiɗiyn kepe patay goyo, may hiɗi ɓam saɗi. Va ma sli tuw sana nam vum hay selemu ma kawayna hiɗi naga dirginna; muɗum goy butuwu.
Bulu: Ô nga nyeʼe ô lôô éveʼela te, akekui éyoñe akok e nga famé e nkôle yôp, môt éziñ momo, a jimbi mekule mebo mʼétyé a ndiʼane tyia mʼéveʼelaʼa te, a tyaʼa me.
Guiziga: Ki ra pura zleˀe, amma rak ti nah, ɗugur a gidigilo ti muwã manja mbur a wusaŋ. Sar naŋhay mipa taŋ, cah ti ɓiri ho gar waɗ cah ti hohoy muzluma tuwa, a waha taŋ kuɗ kuɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i a ɗon laara, hayre hoɓɓiti feere maare – walaa juŋngo yerɓi nde. Nde tappi teppe suura ɗe njamndi bee loope go, nde nami ɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i a ɗon laara, hayre hoɓɓiti feere maare – walaa juŋngo yerɓi nde. Nde tappi teppe suura ɗe njamndi bee loope go, nde nami ɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ ɓɔna fara zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋma ta ai nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ yo naŋ ɓoo-bíí nɛ naŋ-a duka so nɛ boi in dɔɔ gii'i gbin.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ ɓɔna fara zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋma ta ai nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ yo naŋ ɓoo-bíí nɛ naŋ-a duka so nɛ boi in dɔɔ gii'i gbin.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mba na kanewe pa ta wəndəa shɛ ne, pa kwete pelɛ felaŋenyɛ kaɗema wəndə kekwaɗakɛ sawa pelɛ ghweme. Pa nde menyɛ te yɛ seɗa ta ŋkɛ nyi kalɛ ba'a karekɛ. Tagha gɛ, kwerɗike nde həmte hɛ.
Tupurri: Ndo hay de kañ nen äo ta' koge, kola huuli po yaçaç mbe le de see äe tu bay ga jobo äo'n le wa lay, raw le'ge ne faale äaale fodo maga wo plañ boo, plañ paçy ti day raw nañ nen äaara go.

Francais: Alors, d’un seul coup, le fer et la terre cuite, ainsi que le bronze, l’argent et l’or, furent réduits en poussière que le vent emporta, comme des brins de paille lorsqu’on vanne les céréales en été . Aucune trace n’en subsista. Quant à la pierre qui avait frappé la statue, elle devint une grande montagne remplissant toute la terre.
Anglais: Then the iron, the clay, the bronze, the silver, and the gold were crushed together and became like the chaff from the summer threshing floors; and the wind carried them away so that not a trace of them could be found. And the stone that struck the statue became a great mountain and filled the whole earth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta kawayna, naga-dirginna, wayna, doorota hiɗi ora tapay kaf guri goyo, muɗi ki burana ma simeɗna dolom goy hay muɗakŋ pa hay cayda nala. Simeɗn dolomu, sa may fum baŋalam noŋɗi. May hiɗiyna ma vi va ma sli tuw sana hay gayamna muɗi goy hiɗiyta ta ŋolo, nam hob nagata kafe.
Bulu: Nde éyoñe jijia étyé, ndiʼane tyia mvot argent a or bi nga veñesane mbuluk, ñwô évuñulu é nga mialan ane bivio bia yele vôme ba tyaʼa bidi. Nde éveʼela ése é nga mane jañ jôm te liʼi. Vʼakoʼo e nga jimbi éveʼela, e nga veñesane beta nkô a yiane si ése.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, ɓiri ho gar, hohoy muzluma, ɓiri gaza ati ɓiri bara waɗ ɓiri tapasl tapasl tuwa, himiɗ a kil taŋ jom arleˀe kaɓa himiɗ ngi sifi makil ti cekwesl ngi daw a məlaŋ. Ko li naŋ a ndir ta. Ɗugur muwaha gwat miciɗa tuwa, a tiri muwã madiɗa, a naha hirwuyo wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana non koo ɗume fuu fusi: Njamndi e loope e njamndi mboɗeeri e cardi e kaŋŋeeri. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati bana nyaande dow laarre  wakkati codol, henndu saŋkiti ɗum, walaa ko lutti. Ammaa hayre fusnde suura go, mawni, laati hooseere mawnde, nde heewi duniyaaru fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana non koo ɗume fuu fusi: Njamndi e loope e njamndi mboɗeeri e cardi e kaŋŋeeri. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati bana nyaande dow laarre  wakkati codol, henndu saŋkiti ɗum, walaa ko lutti. Ammaa hayre fusnde suura go, mawni, laati hooseere mawnde, nde heewi duniyaaru fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Boi, gii, ndɛrɛ, bu-mbɔi in lɔr lɛŋ gbina a nu, ɓɛɛ kifi nɛ pumyulu-mɔ hee sɛn fara-gusi-alkamaari ga. Búk kaia mɔ‘i lɛŋ yaknɛ, wi zɔk oi-aa na. War ko ta nɛ yoo mboo-bíí gbin'i kifa kɔ‘i nɛ gasa kaya nɛ kpee zu nu lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Boi, gii, ndɛrɛ, bu-mbɔi in lɔr lɛŋ gbina a nu, ɓɛɛ kifi nɛ pumyulu-mɔ hee sɛn fara-gusi-alkamaari ga. Búk kaia mɔ‘i lɛŋ yaknɛ, wi zɔk oi-aa na. War ko ta nɛ yoo mboo-bíí gbin'i kifa kɔ‘i nɛ gasa kaya nɛ kpee zu nu lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwetɛŋe seɗa ne, pa nde həmte lɛ, rekɛ, mze kwa ghwə ghwə, mze kwa tɛawetɛa ba'a mze kwa tere tere kakeləwə. Pa hɛ zhɛrenji kala slɛsli nya dzeyi yitea lane heghele. Pa sefə fəhwe hɛ, kaɗema mbeli kazhɛne kanakɛ hɛ. Ama pa pelɛ nya kehəmte pa ta wəndəa shɛ zhɛrenyɛ kaghweme nya wəba ba'a hərəkəhwe hɛɗi lema.
Tupurri: Mo so no, boo no, paçy no, boo dob no, boo solayn wo de boo biñnin dwas wo go kol wo go do hoole maga pud ti yaage ti hisi nono. Leege raw rawge de äaara day aè da' fuëgi äaara gaa so hase. AÀma huuli maga hay le' ne fodon ti kal kolge diñ huuli ma kluu ka'a, yaçaç tamsir go äuy.

Francais: « Tel fut le rêve du roi. Maintenant en voici la signification :
Anglais: “This was the dream; now we will tell the king its interpretation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti duwayta ta daŋga. Numa min daŋgi cawa' goyo, mulla.
Bulu: Biyeyem ô nga yeme le, a njô bôt. Atinane yʼété ki nde di:
Guiziga: Musuwun ɗik i hana so. Wurenna i ra ɓuw mbiɗeˀvra naŋ a mbuŋ ka buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum woni koyɗol ma, barkaama, jonta haa min passitirane ngol.
Fulfulde_DC: Kanjum woni koyɗol ma, barkaama, jonta haa min passitirane ngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Zu nɛ wannu ɔa'i nɛ mɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ kinii'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Zu nɛ wannu ɔa'i nɛ mɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ kinii'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Meghe yawe, nya ya kashiwəa ŋa. Ma tsetsenya gɛ ne, wa nya ghena nya mbe shiwəa shɛ nya:
Tupurri: Mokay diñ lwa'ge no day wuur naa wer äe yañ go pel wañ la.

Francais: Tu es le plus grand de tous les rois. Le Dieu du ciel t’a donné la royauté, la puissance, la force et l’honneur ;
Anglais: You, O king, are the king of [earthly] kings, to whom the God of heaven has given the kingdom, the power, the strength and the glory;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Awa mulla, naŋu mi mulla vi muliyana, kay Lawna ma wuralawna vulaŋ mulda gaŋeraŋa, donota hiɗi gajijita.
Bulu: A njô bôt, ô ne njôô ya bejôô, amu Zambe ya yôp a veya wo njôan, duma, ngu a étôtok;
Guiziga: Aw buy ɗu, ki buy madiɗa ngi buyoy gar. Ka, zumabuy, gidaŋ ngi wi mizli waɗ dudoko, Buymuŋ a vuluw taŋ le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: An, barkaama, a laamiiɗo laamlaamɓe. Allah mo asama hokki ma laamu e baawɗe e semmbe e tedduŋgal.
Fulfulde_DC: An, barkaama, a laamiiɗo laamlaamɓe. Allah mo asama hokki ma laamu e baawɗe e semmbe e tedduŋgal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu, ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ gasa zu o dɔka wannu lɛŋ; nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan, ŋgayamɔ in gasamɔ ha̧ a̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu, ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ gasa zu o dɔka wannu lɛŋ; nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan, ŋgayamɔ in gasamɔ ha̧ a̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Meghe yawe, gha ya kameghea ka meghea kɛfi. Nahe Shala nya pelɛ ghweme kendeke ŋa meghe, kwele, berete ba'a zləvə.
Tupurri: Wañ, ndo diñ wañ ma wañren wo werga Baa ma ciñn haç tway ne ndo, haç kluu, eegre wo de togoëge ne ndo.

Francais: il a placé sous ton autorité les êtres humains, les animaux et les oiseaux : tu en es le maître, partout où ils demeurent. Eh bien, la tête en or, c’est toi !
Anglais: and wherever the sons of men dwell, and the beasts of the field, and the birds of the heavens, He has given them into your hand and has made you ruler over them all. You [king of Babylon] are the head of gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyn pet ma gurona vi sumuna ka lakay haya, muuriyan ma hay fulda hiɗi layayn ma dukalawn kaf, nam tunaŋ mul kisi kafe; yamda ta ora mi naŋu.
Bulu: a futiya bôt, betit a anoñ éjôé jôé si: E vôm ase be né, wo ô ne masa wop. Ajô te a njô bôt, wo ô ne nlô or!
Guiziga: Mizli, gwat ngi ɓuhoy waɗ ɗiyuw mazlikiɗamaya, ko da taŋ amaka gar na, Buymuŋ a cufuw le ki madiɗa, yo i ka mawa taŋ gar. Hirnga mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl na, i ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo toy fuu o marni ma yimɓe e dabbaaji ladde e colli asama. O laamini ma dow tagle ɗe'e fuu. An woni hoore kaŋŋeeri go.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo toy fuu o marni ma yimɓe e dabbaaji ladde e colli asama. O laamini ma dow tagle ɗe'e fuu. An woni hoore kaŋŋeeri go.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o bíí, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, o nɔ̧́í̧ yiwese sɛn ge fara ge, Sɔ̧ ee wa lɛŋ er'nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɔ wan zu wa. Ɓɛɛ zu bíí nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr'i nɛ ɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o bíí, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, o nɔ̧́í̧ yiwese sɛn ge fara ge, Sɔ̧ ee wa lɛŋ er'nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɔ wan zu wa. Ɓɛɛ zu bíí nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr'i nɛ ɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ keveyi mbeli, wəshi keseɗa ba'a yɛ 'yɛ, te yayata ŋkwa nya nza hɛ mbe dzeve ta ŋa. Nahe ŋkɛ keveyi ŋa kande sleke hɛ. Gha ya kaghə mze kwa tere tere nya gɛ!
Tupurri: A haç weere jar tabay wo, nayre ma ti sir wo de dweere ma ciñ wo go ne ndo äi coo do äuy ti ngeel ma honla äuy, day hay ndo go ti äaara waçaç ree äaara äuy, ti maga diñ boo biñni na diñ ndo.

Francais: Un autre royaume, moins puissant que le tien, s’élèvera après toi. Ensuite un troisième royaume, représenté par le bronze, s’étendra à toute la terre.
Anglais: After you will arise another kingdom (Medo-Persia) inferior to you, and then a third kingdom of bronze (Greece under Alexander the Great), which will rule over all the earth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May bugolaŋ naŋu, mul tara'a ma day kulo'o, na' kiɗay suw faŋ naŋga, bugolda mulda ta sem ɦidit lo, na'a ma lin mi wayna, na' ma kol kay nagat kuɗulu.
Bulu: Mvuse jôé éjôé éfe ja ye tebe te dañe ngu anʼéjôé; wôna mvuse valé éjôé lale ja ye tebe nje ja ye bo mvot a dañe si ése.
Guiziga: A dirba ɗike, zumabuy mekelem a sa bawa, a ndila ngi ɗike ta. A dirba nah mana, zumabuy mekelem ma, mimakir naŋ, i mipa ti ɓiri gaza. Naŋ a sa wa hirwuyo kurzluˀ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maaɗa laamu feere waran, ngu mawnataa bana ngu maaɗa. Nden laamu tataɓu, ngu njamndi mboɗeeri, laamanto duniyaaru fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maaɗa laamu feere waran, ngu mawnataa bana ngu maaɗa. Nden laamu tataɓu, ngu njamndi mboɗeeri, laamanto duniyaaru fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ŋma mbe wan tɛ kur nɛ beka nyɛm ŋmaa in k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ i̧i̧ wi’ɛi, ŋma taar wan tɛ hɔ nɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu nu lɛŋ; ndɛrɛ usi nɛ wi’ɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ŋma mbe wan tɛ kur nɛ beka nyɛm ŋmaa in k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ i̧i̧ wi’ɛi, ŋma taar wan tɛ hɔ nɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu nu lɛŋ; ndɛrɛ usi nɛ wi’ɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋa ne, katese kwete meghe nya dewə berete ma ke ŋa ŋa. Zhɛne ne, kwa mahekene ta meghe nya ncɛ mze kwa ghwə ghwə nde tehərə ŋkwa nya te hɛɗi lema.
Tupurri: Blam äo mono, wañ po kol ge yañ day sir äen joñ ge klee de dañ äo no. Ma de swa' kol ge yañ sen joñ ge do boo dob nono day waçaç ge ree tamsir yañ go äuy.

Francais: Un quatrième royaume, dur comme le fer, lui succédera. Comme le fer écrase, pulvérise et broie tout, ce royaume écrasera et broiera les royaumes précédents .
Anglais: Then a fourth kingdom (Rome) will be strong as iron, for iron breaks to pieces and shatters all things; and like iron which crushes things in pieces, it will break and crush all these [others].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla ta sem fiɗita ma co lo, na' ma li hirliŋi ki kawayn nala; ki kawayn gur slen goyo tom goy kafe nala, nam ma gur slena tom goy kaf, ki kawayn to slen goy kaf nala kaw.
Bulu: Ejôé nyini ja ye tebe é too ngu anʼétyé; avalʼétyé ja fit, ja miat a koʼo jôm ése, avale te éjôé te ja ye fit a koʼo bijôé bi ne je ôsu.
Guiziga: Waɗ mana, zumabuy mumufaɗ naŋ, migidaŋ kaɓa ɓiri ho gar, a sa bawa ma. A sa musukuɗo zumabuy numuŋhoyo, a zliɗa taŋ hirnga mber mber kaɓa ɓiri mamusukuɗo gwatay, a zliɗa hirnga taŋ mber mber na ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamu nayaɓu maran semmbe bana njamndi ɓaleeri. Bana no njamndi ɓaleeri namirta e fusirta koo ɗume fuu, laamu ngu'u boo naman e nattinan laamuuji goɗɗi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamu nayaɓu maran semmbe bana njamndi ɓaleeri. Bana no njamndi ɓaleeri namirta e fusirta koo ɗume fuu, laamu ngu'u boo naman e nattinan laamuuji goɗɗi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Naar wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga; a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o kuti wan yinɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi to nɛ mɔ gbin a nu’ɛ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Naar wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga; a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o kuti wan yinɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi to nɛ mɔ gbin a nu’ɛ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, katese kwa wəfaɗe ta meghe nya ntɛaŋentɛa kala lɛ. Kala nya mpə wəshi pɛtɛ, nya ghazle pɛtɛa wəshi ba'a nya hə pɛtɛa wəshi lɛ ne, katempə ba'a katehə pɛtɛa kweci ka meghea kɛfi ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ma de naa kol ge yañ grañ do boo nono. Do maga boo nañ nen feçeçre go day mbug ra go äuy no mono, se nañ ge nen feçeçre yañ go, mbug gi feçeçre yañ go äuy doga boo mbug feçeçre wo go äuy nono.

Francais: Enfin, ainsi que tu l’as constaté, les pieds et les orteils de la statue étaient faits en partie de terre cuite et en partie de fer : cela signifie que ce royaume manquera d’unité. Il y aura en lui quelque chose de la solidité du fer, puisque tu as vu le fer mêlé à la terre cuite.
Anglais: And as you saw the feet and toes, partly of potter’s clay and partly of iron, it will be a divided kingdom; but there will be in it some of the durability  and  strength of iron, just as you saw the iron mixed with common clay.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki selemu hiɗi cita-selemu ma naŋ wumna nala, galam kawaya galam naga-dirginna kaw, mul na'ta ma ɓurawa; may va mara ma hin haya, donota vi kawayna ir ka haya, kay mige naŋ wi kawayna rigasay hiɗi naga-dirginna.
Bulu: Wôna, aval ô nga yene mekule mebo a anyu ya mebo, éfase jia ndiʼane tyia, ji évoʼo ki étyé, nde éjôé te ja ye salé zañ; ve jôm éziñe ya ngul étyé ja ye bo été amu ñyenan ô nga yen étyé mbundaʼan a ndiʼane tyia.
Guiziga: Ki pura saray ati muzuŋ haŋhaya le. Cah numuŋ i mipa ti ɓiri ho gar, cah mekeleme kwana, i mindira ti hohoy muzluma. I zumabuy muwuɗuka le. Ka mupura ɓiri jom ati hohoy muzluma na, gidaŋ ngi ɓiri a sa so ada ara ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A yi'i teppe, kooli maaje, yeɓre ɗi njamndi yeɓre boo ɗi loope. Laamu man senndoto geɓe geɓe. Ngu maran semmbe bana njamndi ɓaleeri, ngam a yi'i njamndi jillindiri bee loope.
Fulfulde_DC: A yi'i teppe, kooli maaje, yeɓre ɗi njamndi yeɓre boo ɗi loope. Laamu man senndoto geɓe geɓe. Ngu maran semmbe bana njamndi ɓaleeri, ngam a yi'i njamndi jillindiri bee loope.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O naŋ in o waza-naŋ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ‘i dee reeta-wa nɛ boi in ɓii reeta-wa nɛ dɔɔ gii'i usi nɛ wan nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo. Tɛ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ zɔka'e boi in gii a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt; hegɔ, wan'i tɛ duk kana nɛ be ŋgai tikiɗi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O naŋ in o waza-naŋ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ‘i dee reeta-wa nɛ boi in ɓii reeta-wa nɛ dɔɔ gii'i usi nɛ wan nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo. Tɛ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ zɔka'e boi in gii a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt; hegɔ, wan'i tɛ duk kana nɛ be ŋgai tikiɗi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kenakɛ yɛ seɗa ba'a ŋwalea seɗa kalɛ kwete bela ba'a karekɛ kwete. Ma ɗe ŋkɛ kageze ne, katenza ŋkɛ kahɛɗia meghe nya kenehe nehe mbe. Katenza berete ta lɛ mbe kwete bela ta ŋkɛ, va nya nakɛ na lɛ megweɗə mbe rekɛ.
Tupurri: Day do maga ndo hay ko faale äaalen wo de weere äaalen wo plañ diñ paçy booge, plañ diñ boo mono, sir wañ sen joñ ge yañ de caa äili. AÀ ne fen po joñ ge yañ äil äe ni de eegre do boo nono, sen diñ boo maga ndo hay kon de neege see paçyn mono.

Francais: Mais les orteils où le fer et la terre cuite étaient mélangés montrent qu’une partie de ce royaume sera forte et une autre partie fragile ;
Anglais: As the [ten] toes of the feet were partly of iron and partly of clay, so some of the kingdom will be strong, and  another  part of it will be brittle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki cita-selemu ma naŋ wumna galam kawaya galam naga-dirginna nala, mul na'ta gala' ma li dono'o, gala' ma li maŋaya.
Bulu: A mbôlô anyu ya mebo e mbe éfase jia étyé, ji évoʼo ki ndiʼane tyia, éjôé te ja ye bo ngu éfase jia, a éfas évoʼo ki teke tabe.
Guiziga: Vur muzuŋ saray mipa taŋ cah ti ɓiri ho gar waɗ cah ti hohoy muzluma na, zuma buyo cah numuŋ a sa tiri gidaŋ, cah numuŋ kwana, a sa tiri hĩhĩy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kooli teppe yeɓre njamndi, yeɓre boo loope, bana wi'ugo: Yeɓre woore maran semmbe, ammaa yeɓre woɗnde marataa semmbe.
Fulfulde_DC: Kooli teppe yeɓre njamndi, yeɓre boo loope, bana wi'ugo: Yeɓre woore maran semmbe, ammaa yeɓre woɗnde marataa semmbe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o waza-naŋ nɛ duk nɛ boi in gii'i, mɔ‘i usi nɛ kɛ̧a̧-a̧ ko wan nɛ tɛ kɛ̧ fara yiitoo: ŋma tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa beka ŋgai kɔ‘i na hee gii ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o waza-naŋ nɛ duk nɛ boi in gii'i, mɔ‘i usi nɛ kɛ̧a̧-a̧ ko wan nɛ tɛ kɛ̧ fara yiitoo: ŋma tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa beka ŋgai kɔ‘i na hee gii ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ŋwalea seɗa nyi nza kwete bela ta nci kalɛ ba'a karekɛ kwete ne, ncɛ yancɛ hɛ tsema tsema tenza kwete bela ta hɛɗia meghe bereteke ba'a tenza kwete kadewə berete.
Tupurri: Day wer maga weere äaalen hay wo plañ diñ boo, plañ diñ paçy mono, sir wañ sen joñ ge plañ de eegre, plañ de gayri.

Francais: ils indiquent aussi que des rois s’allieront par des mariages, mais ces alliances ne seront pas solides, pas plus que l’alliage du fer et de la terre cuite .
Anglais: And as you saw the iron mixed with common clay, so they will combine with one another in the seed of men; but they will not merge [for such diverse things or ideologies cannot unite], even as iron does not mix with clay.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kawayn ma naŋ wumna rigasay hiɗi naga-dirginna nala, cawa' kayni ala nisi ma tap tuwsiya hiɗi bonota vi sumuna, may nir na'ta kepe nisi may tapay kepɗi, ki kawayna hiɗi naga-dirginna as rigasɗi nala kaw.
Bulu: O nga yene étyé mbundaʼan a ndiʼane tyia amu bejô bôte ya bijôé bite ba ye bo bilat a zene ya meluk. Ve bilate bite bia ye bo teke tabe, avale fe étyé ba ndiʼane tyia be se nguleya fulan.
Guiziga: Ki pur ɓiri milahaɗ ati hohoy muzluma na le, i zuma buyoy masa jumom ti zuɓa ngwasay, amma jumoˀay taŋ nah vuna, naŋ anta ti gidaŋ ta. Taŋ kaɓa ɓiri mujom ati hohoy muzluma tewle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A yi'i no njamndi jillindiri bee loope ngam laamiiɓe geɓe fuu te'indiran, ammaa ɓe kawtataa, kal-kal bana njamndi hawtataa bee loope.
Fulfulde_DC: A yi'i no njamndi jillindiri bee loope ngam laamiiɓe geɓe fuu te'indiran, ammaa ɓe kawtataa, kal-kal bana njamndi hawtataa bee loope.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ zɔka boi nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ gii; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o wannu nɔ‘i tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa tɛ̀ báá ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i beka ye ŋmaa nɛ de-a na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi in gii ye ŋmaa duk kpɔk na’ɛ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ zɔka boi nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ gii; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o wannu nɔ‘i tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa tɛ̀ báá ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i beka ye ŋmaa nɛ de-a na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi in gii ye ŋmaa duk kpɔk na’ɛ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kenakɛ lɛ megweɗə le rekɛ, va nya nza hɛ katejikə geva. Ama katenza kwete wəndəa ŋkɛ jikə vare kwete we, tsagha ɗema lɛ kajikə geva le rekɛ.
Tupurri: Ndo hay ko boo de neege see paçy na wer maga aà tay ge wo jag yañ ti dage naare ti holañ äaara, ane aà tay ge wo see kaçaçra gaa doga boo tay nen go de paçy gaa no lay no.

Francais: A l’époque de ces rois-là, le Dieu du ciel établira un royaume qui ne sera jamais détruit et dont la souveraineté ne passera jamais à une autre nation. Ce royaume écrasera tous les royaumes précédents et mettra fin à leur existence, puis il subsistera éternellement ;
Anglais: In the days of those [final ten] kings the God of heaven will set up a kingdom that will never be destroyed, nor will its sovereignty be left for another people; but it will crush and put an end to all these kingdoms, and it will stand forever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyna vi muliyan nisina, Lawn ma wuralawna ma day yam mul tara kulo kepe, mul na'ta ma ɓulak goy noŋɗi, mulda na'ta jaf-sum sara ma kol ka'ɗi, mul hen lakŋi na' ma gurum goyo, tom goy kafe, mul na'ta ma mus ta-ta hay vatɗita.
Bulu: Melu ya bejô bôte bete, Zambe ya yôp a ye telé éjôé ja ye bo teke tyamban, a éjôé te ja ye bo teke éjôé yʼayoñ afe si, ja ye fit a bo bijôé bite momo; a ébien ja ye tabe nnôm éto:
Guiziga: Dambala ar vi ngi buy tayna vuna, Buymuŋ a sa bo ti zumabuy masa kiɗ ta wãˀ, yo zumabuy nah kwana anta sa ndir da mizli mekelemey ta. A sa kiɗa zumabuy mekelemeye, a waha taŋ mber mber, joˀ naŋ a sa ndir ngi wãˀ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i laamiiɓe ɓe'e, Allah mo asama darnan laamu feere ngu halkataa haa foroy. Walaa ummaatoore woɗnde hoosata laamu man. Ngu nattinan laamuuji goɗɗi fuu, ammaa kaŋgu ngu duumoto.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i laamiiɓe ɓe'e, Allah mo asama darnan laamu feere ngu halkataa haa foroy. Walaa ummaatoore woɗnde hoosata laamu man. Ngu nattinan laamuuji goɗɗi fuu, ammaa kaŋgu ngu duumoto.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi ko o wannu nɔ‘i, Sɔ̧ yiwese tɛ e ŋma damti nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, nɛ ŋma gɔni dukbíí beka ba na; a̧ tɛ gan zu o dɔka wan nɔ‘i, gbin nɛ ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi ko o wannu nɔ‘i, Sɔ̧ yiwese tɛ e ŋma damti nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, nɛ ŋma gɔni dukbíí beka ba na; a̧ tɛ gan zu o dɔka wan nɔ‘i, gbin nɛ ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te vəa ka meghea kɛfia shɛhɛ ne, kateve kwete hɛɗia meghe nya keɗema kateza tɛape Shala nya pelɛ ghweme. Katedzembe dzeve ta kwete hwelefe berete ta hɛɗia meghea shɛ we. Katehə ba'a kateza sebe ŋkɛ te pɛtɛa hɛɗia meghea shɛhɛ. Ama katenza ŋkɛ kaghala ghala.
Tupurri: Ti kal mani wañre sen ge wo mono, Baa ma ciñn a ge yañ de sir wañ po maga aè älagn ge go gaa has yañ, day sir wañ sen kol ge go do wer jar ma tigriñ wo gaè. Wañ äen nañ ge nen sir wañre ma se deñn wo go äuy, yee ge nen äaara go day se de see äe joñ ge yañ ma tum.

Francais: c’est ce qu’annonce la pierre que tu as vue se détacher de la montagne sans intervention humaine, pour venir broyer le fer, le bronze, la terre cuite, l’argent et l’or de la statue . Le grand Dieu t’a fait connaître ainsi ce qui arrivera par la suite. Ton rêve est une authentique révélation, et son interprétation est digne de confiance. »
Anglais: Just as you saw that a stone was cut out of the mountain without hands and that it crushed the iron, the bronze, the clay, the silver and the gold, the great God has revealed to the king what will take place in the future; so the dream is true and its interpretation is trustworthy.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki naŋ wi hiɗiyn kep patay goy hay hiɗiyt pa, may hiɗi ɓam saɗi, nam gur kawayn goyo, gur wayt goyo, naga-dirginna, doorota hiɗi or kaw. Lawn ma ŋolla ɗekawa kir mulla slen ma min li'e hay liyn ma vokŋa, duwayta kayni gasiya, cawa' ma di-goyna nagay a sa vi hayamu.
Bulu: Ajô te nde ô nga yen akok e koʼo nkôle yôp môt éziñ momo, a e nga koʼo étyé mvot ndiʼane tyia, argent a or. Zambe a nʼanen a boya njô bôte na, a yeme jam da ye bobane melu ma zu. Biyeyeme biôé bi ne bebela a nkulane yʼété ô ne wu ya buni.
Guiziga: naŋ kaɓa ka mupura ɗugur midiɗo manja mbur a wusa, a waha ɓiri ho gar, ɓiri gaza, hohoy muzluma, ɓiri bara waɗ ɓiri tapasl tapasla, kuɗ kuɗ na. Buymisemuŋ madiɗa, a buguw gwatay masa gam ti mbuŋ le da ka buyo. Musuwuno, naŋ kaslsla, yo mbiɗeˀvra naŋ kwana, i ngi tiɓi a mevele.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum ngi'ɗa no hayre hoɓɓitiri – walaa juŋngo yerɓi nde— nami njamndi ɓaleeri e mboɗeeri e loope e cardi e kaŋŋeeri. Allah mawɗo waŋginani ma ko tammi laataago, barkaama. Koyɗol man tabiti, maana maagol boo laaɓi.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum ngi'ɗa no hayre hoɓɓitiri – walaa juŋngo yerɓi nde— nami njamndi ɓaleeri e mboɗeeri e loope e cardi e kaŋŋeeri. Allah mawɗo waŋginani ma ko tammi laataago, barkaama. Koyɗol man tabiti, maana maagol boo laaɓi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: kana hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ ta fara kura-a nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ gbin nɛ boi, ndɛrɛ, gii, bu-mbɔi in lɔr a nu'i ga. Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa dee ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ. Zu'i bó nɛ́ ɔrmɔ na; gba̧a̧ zu'i mbɛt nɛ kpasamɔ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: kana hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ ta fara kura-a nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ gbin nɛ boi, ndɛrɛ, gii, bu-mbɔi in lɔr a nu'i ga. Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa dee ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ. Zu'i bó nɛ́ ɔrmɔ na; gba̧a̧ zu'i mbɛt nɛ kpasamɔ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kenakɛ pelɛ nya kefelaŋenyɛ kaɗema wəndə kekwaɗakɛ sawa pelɛ ghweme. Nahe nde kempəmte lɛ, mze kwa ghwə ghwə, rekɛ, mze kwa tɛawetɛa ba'a mze kwa tere tere ta pa ta wəndəa shɛ. Shala nya wəba nde ncɛte nda wəsə nya ketemene geva ke meghe. Nahe shiwəa shɛ kenza kakaganda, nahe ŋkɛ kehi kave nda ghə mbeli ke ghena nya mbe.»
Tupurri: Sen na diñ huuli maga ndo hay kon ga yaçaç mbe le de see äe ti huuli tu bay ga jobo äo'n le wa lay mono, diñ huuli se ga hay nañ nen boo no, boo dob no, paçy wo de boo solayn wo de boo biñnin wo go mono. Baa ma kluun kañ nen wañ go ti fen maga a ge le blam wañ mono. Lwa'gen cwaçy day naage wer äe diñ fen maga aè nen kañ ëiggi ti äe.

Francais: Alors le roi Nabucodonosor se jeta le visage contre terre, rendit hommage à Daniel et ordonna qu’on lui présente des sacrifices et des offrandes de parfums.
Anglais: Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell face downward and paid respect to Daniel [as a great prophet of the highest God], and gave orders for an offering and fragrant incense to be presented to him [in honor of his God].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala mulla Nebukadnesar girif gaa'a, nam dab vokom gaa'a vok Daniel, nam vul hagata kay nisi ma li ɗifini tam Daniel, lum ɗifin ma hiɗi urdina kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe te njô bôte Nébukatnétzar a nga ku asu e butu si, ve kute meboñ asu Daniel, a bendé na be ve nye bityiʼa beôlobinda.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa a huruk huruk a ruwuy, a ɗuva hirnga da Daniyele, a ɓa mizli, a vulakaŋ gwat ngi mikulihey ati urdihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor hippi haa yeeso Daniyel, sujidani mo. Nden o umri waddango mo dokke nyaamdu e uurle.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor hippi haa yeeso Daniyel, sujidani mo. Nden o umri waddango mo dokke nyaamdu e uurle.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr guu yí nu ti Daniɛl zɔn nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr guu yí nu ti Daniɛl zɔn nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa meghe Nabəkodonozor gwəɗəŋə ntiŋə ghə mbe hɛɗi kezha hawe va Daniyɛl. Pa ŋkɛ gezete kezha fə nda wəshi ba'a 'wərdə mbeli ke Daniyɛl.
Tupurri: Mo so no wañ Nebukanetsar raw le' mondra gesiñ pel Danyele, day se raw haç jag ga aè mo joñ siigi jag wo ne hene, aè mo roë fen foçoçre no wo ne hen lay.

Francais: Puis il dit à Daniel : « Votre Dieu est vraiment le plus grand de tous les dieux, et le maître des rois. Lui seul révèle les mystères, puisque tu as été capable de me dévoiler ce mystère-ci. »
Anglais: The king answered Daniel and said, “Most certainly your God is the God of gods and the Lord of kings and a revealer of mysteries, since you have been able to reveal this mystery!”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla sli ditiya di tam Daniel: Hay gasita, Lawna vigiya mi Lawna vi lawayna, mi Ma-Vatɗina vi muliyana, nam pat goy dir slen ma ŋayayna, kay mige naŋ pat dir ŋayayta na'ta goyo.
Bulu: Njô bôt nye Daniel na: Bebela na, Zambe wônan a ne Zambe ya bezambe, a Masa ya bejô bôt a, a kulane minsolane mi mam, vôme wo te bo nguleya kulane nsolane jame wu.
Guiziga: Buy a ɓa Daniyele na: «Gisiŋ, Buymisemuŋ kumo, i madiɗa fineˀ kuliheye, i madiɗa ar buyoyo, yo i minjika gwat maslaam wala tahay. Ka minjikiy gwat mufuna wuluk ngi mbur nah na, vurˀe.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo wi'i Daniyel: “Fakat, Allah mooɗon woni ɗowanteeɗo ɓurɗo ɗowanteeɓe fuu, o jawmiraawo laamiiɓe, o baŋginoowo sirriiji, ngam a heɓi baawɗe waŋgingo sirri koyɗol ngo'ol.”
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo wi'i Daniyel: “Fakat, Allah mooɗon woni ɗowanteeɗo ɓurɗo ɗowanteeɓe fuu, o jawmiraawo laamiiɓe, o baŋginoowo sirriiji, ngam a heɓi baawɗe waŋgingo sirri koyɗol ngo'ol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ Sɔ̧ ko o sɔ̧. A̧ nɛ wan ko o wannu, wi-ba-hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan, wen mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ Sɔ̧ ko o sɔ̧. A̧ nɛ wan ko o wannu, wi-ba-hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan, wen mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, ma ke sha Daniyɛl: «Kaganda ne, Shala ta ŋayɛ ya kaShala ta yɛ shala, kaNde sleke ka meghea kɛfi ba'a kande ncɛ wəshi nyi tewəfərə. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, nahe na kencɛte ɗa wəsə nya tewəfərə nya.»
Tupurri: Wañ kal waçaç waçaçre ne Danyel day riñn gano: Kidolgi Baa äayn diñ Baa ma baan wo, aà diñ Wañkluu wañren wo. AÀ yañ mbe ndar nen feçeçre ma de yoñre wo go, werga ndo da' wer go ne fen ma de yoñre sen mono.

Francais: Ensuite le roi accorda à Daniel de grands honneurs et lui remit de nombreux et importants cadeaux. Il le nomma gouverneur de la province de Babylone et chef suprême des sages de Babylone.
Anglais: Then the king promoted Daniel [to an exalted position] and gave him many great gifts, and he made him ruler over the entire province of Babylon and chief governor over all the wise men of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni mulla muɗ Daniel goy sa ma ŋolo, nam vulum farayn ŋolo. Nam vulum ŋolda kay nagata vi Babilon kaf, tunum mi ma ŋolla kay sa yalla vi Babilon kaf kaw.
Bulu: Nde njô bôt a nga nene Daniel a faʼé nye abui a biwôlô bi biôm. A nga telé nye njôô ya éfuse si ya Babilôn a telé fe nye évete nnene ya beyem bese ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, buy a ga ɗongor da Daniyele, a vulaŋ gwat madiɗahay haɗi ngataraŋ, a vulaŋ hirwuy vay buy miwi li miwa a Babiloŋ gar, waɗ a tiri di madiɗa ngi misi sin mijileŋ ngi Babiloŋhoy gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o teddini Daniyel, o saahi mo dokke mawɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O waɗi mo ngomna dow taƴre Baabila e ardiiɗo mawɗo dow hikma'en Baabila fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o teddini Daniyel, o saahi mo dokke mawɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O waɗi mo ngomna dow taƴre Baabila e ardiiɗo mawɗo dow hikma'en Baabila fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu baa Daniɛl e nɛ gasawi, a̧ ha̧a̧ o zɔm demɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ zu o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn zu nu Babilɔŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu baa Daniɛl e nɛ gasawi, a̧ ha̧a̧ o zɔm demɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ zu o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn zu nu Babilɔŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛne ne, pa meghe veyi Daniyɛl kawəndə kwele ba'a fəke nda wəshi gəmə nyi ganji ganji kwele kwele. Pa ŋkɛ veyi ŋkɛ kaŋgwamna nya mbe sla ta hɛɗia Babilone ba'a kawəndə nya te ghəa ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone.
Tupurri: Blam äe wañ raw haç kluu ne Danyele, haç horog mani jar eegren wo ne hen debañ. Se kal hayge äe waçaç ree prog ma Babilon no, hayn diñ wañ ma ti taw ma waçaç ree jar ko ree ma Babilon wo äuy.

Francais: Sur une demande de Daniel, le roi confia à Chadrac, Méchak et Abed-Négo des postes dans l’administration de la province de Babylone. Quant à Daniel, il devint conseiller à la cour royale.
Anglais: And Daniel made a request of the king, and he appointed Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-nego over the affairs of the province of Babylon, while Daniel was at the court of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel siɗaw mulla kay mulla ma vul ŋomda vi nagata vi Babilon hay ɓam Sadrak, Mesak hiɗi Abed-Nego. Daniel kay tuwamu ka musi goboy kat mulla may.
Bulu: Daniel a nga yeʼelane njô bôte na a ve Sadrak, Mésak a Abéd-Négo mevôme ya saé éfuse si ya Babilôn. Ve Daniel a mbe mbôndé mefek e nda njô bôt.
Guiziga: Daniyele, a cufuɗ gwat avu buyo, joˀ buy a vula slra ngi ngomna da Sadrak, Mesak, ati Abet-Nego, a hirwuy vay buy miwi li miwa a Babiloŋ. Amma a cufa Daniyele, a mizlingre naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dow ƴamol Daniyel, laamiiɗo waɗi Sadarak e Meesak e Abed-Nego ardiiɓe mawɓe dow taƴre Baabila. Ammaa Daniyel bee hoore muuɗum jooɗi haa laamorde.
Fulfulde_DC: Dow ƴamol Daniyel, laamiiɗo waɗi Sadarak e Meesak e Abed-Nego ardiiɓe mawɓe dow taƴre Baabila. Ammaa Daniyel bee hoore muuɗum jooɗi haa laamorde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl aka wannu ha̧ a̧ mɛ e Sadrak, Mesak, in Abɛd-Nɛgo mɛ duk zu zika-nù Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ̀ zù ɓɔn kɔ‘i in wannu kɔ̧ kira kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl aka wannu ha̧ a̧ mɛ e Sadrak, Mesak, in Abɛd-Nɛgo mɛ duk zu zika-nù Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ̀ zù ɓɔn kɔ‘i in wannu kɔ̧ kira kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Daniyɛl 'yɛwete va meghe kezha ve nda slene nya mbe sla ta hɛɗia Babilone ŋkɛ ke Shadrak, Mɛshak ba'a Abɛd-Nɛgo. Ma Daniyɛl le ŋa ŋkɛ ne, nahe ŋkɛ kenza kande ncɛ ntsehwele kwa degha ta meghe.
Tupurri: Danyel raw kem wañ ga aà mo haç ree prog ma Babilonn ne Sadrag, Mesag wo de Abed-Nego do. Danyel hay äen äi feele mani wañ no.

Francais: Le premier rêve de Nabucodonosor
Anglais: The King’s Forgotten Dream
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel ɗek caw duwayt goyo mi Nebukadnesar
Bulu: Biyeyeme njô bôt a nga Taté yem

Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koyɗol Nabukodonosor
Fulfulde_DC: Koyɗol Nabukodonosor

Kapsiki_DC: Kwa ghate ta shiwəa Nabəkodonozor
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon lwa'a, Danyel naa wer äe go

Anglais: The Secret Is Revealed to Daniel

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ usa zu in gba̧a̧ zu ko wannu ha̧ Daniɛl

Francais: La statue aux pieds fragiles
Anglais: The King’s Dream

Francais: Le roi Nabucodonosor fit construire une statue d’or, de trente mètres de haut et de trois mètres de large, et il ordonna qu’on la dresse sur la plaine de Doura, dans la province de Babylone.
Anglais: Nebuchadnezzar the king made a  gold [-plated] image, whose height [including the pedestal] was sixty cubits (ninety feet) and its width six cubits (nine feet). He set it up on the plain of Dura in the province of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Nebukadnesar in va ma sli tuw sana, nam inim hiɗi ora, fiyokom ma kulona ir goldoŋ dok-karkiya, buɗukŋa valamu ir goldoŋ karkiya. Nam inimu hay lokŋa vi Doura, hay nagata vi Babilon.
Bulu: Njô bôte Nébukatnétzar a nga bo éveʼela or é too ôyabe yôp méta mewôm mela, ndam méta éla a telé je e njeʼese Dura, éfuse si ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa a pi kuli ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl. Gil naŋ nga muŋ, metir kukur makir, sliprik naŋ, metir makir. Joˀ a ɓa mizli a ng'aka kaˀ ar li micay ngi Dura, hirwuy ngir li Babiloŋ miwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor umri waɗugo suura kaŋŋeeri. Towirka maaka, baakin meetir cappanɗe tati, njaajirka maaka boo baakin meetir tati. O darni ka haa waadiwol Duura nder lesdi Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor umri waɗugo suura kaŋŋeeri. Towirka maaka, baakin meetir cappanɗe tati, njaajirka maaka boo baakin meetir tati. O darni ka haa waadiwol Duura nder lesdi Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mboo bíí nɛ lɔr, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba e ŋgɔn sɛn bɔkɔ-nu Dura, tɛ nu Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mboo bíí nɛ lɔr, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba e ŋgɔn sɛn bɔkɔ-nu Dura, tɛ nu Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe Nabəkodonozor vɛsəte pa ta wəndə le mze kwa tere tere: mɛtre mahekenemsə dzeme ta ŋkɛ yitea ghweme ba'a mɛtre mahekene bezlea ŋkɛ. Pa ŋkɛ sleteyi ŋkɛ te ŋwela ta Dəwra, mbe sla ta hɛɗia Babilone.
Tupurri: Wañ Nebukanetsar raw joñ fodo mopo de boo biñni, geçeçre äe ciñ meder do swa'a, diy äe meder swa' lay. Se raw kañge äe äil log ma Dura ti prog ma Babilon no.

Francais: Ensuite il envoya des messagers convoquer les satrapes, les préfets, les gouverneurs, les conseillers, les trésoriers, les juges, les magistrats  et tous les autres fonctionnaires des provinces. Ils devaient venir pour l’inauguration de la statue que le roi avait fait dresser.
Anglais: Then Nebuchadnezzar the king sent  word  to assemble the  satraps, the prefects and the governors, the counselors, the treasurers, the judges, the magistrates  and  lawyers and all the chief officials of the provinces to come to the dedication of the image that King Nebuchadnezzar had set up.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Nebukadnesar yi sa ŋarmanna, sa ŋom-slena, sa guvernera, sa ɗiger-lawta, sa ŋom gurjuta, sa wi gatta, sa ka kitata, hiɗi sum sa ŋulona kuɗ nagat kafe, kay nisi ma co hay yuldeta vi malta vi vun va ma sli tuw-sana, ma nam inimna.
Bulu: Ane a nga bañete bivet, benya bôtô, bejôô, betyiʼi mejô, bebaʼale akum, bebôndé mefek, bekobô mejô a bejôô bese ya biwôʼô bijôé na, be zu tabe beta ékôane ya telé éveʼela njô bôt a nga bo ngume ntelan.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa, a slin ng'avi mizli micawwahay, miji kaway, buy miwi lihey, mukuta vuhoy, miji birtetehey, migi kiitahay, buyoy waɗ migi slra ngir li buy miwi li miwa gar, ɓa a soko nga gi muguzlum ngi kuli naŋ mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o umri mooɓtugo lawan'en e jawro'en  e ngomna'en e sarwooɓe e pataka'en e hiitooɓe e alkaali'en maako fuu haa juulde ngam fuɗɗugo rewugo suura man.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o umri mooɓtugo lawan'en e jawro'en  e ngomna'en e sarwooɓe e pataka'en e hiitooɓe e alkaali'en maako fuu haa juulde ngam fuɗɗugo rewugo suura man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr pi̧i̧ tom wen mɔi̧a o wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita in o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de gbaŋa mboo-mɔ n'aa baa e ŋgɔn'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr pi̧i̧ tom wen mɔi̧a o wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita in o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de gbaŋa mboo-mɔ n'aa baa e ŋgɔn'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa ghwenakɛ mbeli kaheka mbeli nyi te ghə, mbelia jama, ka ŋgwamna, ka ncɛ ntsehwele, ka kese slibə, ka meha ghwə, ka ɗepe wəshi mahalegə ba'a pɛtɛa ka mene slene nyi dzeyi te ghəa sla ta hɛɗi, yitea se hɛ kamene gəsəkəa pa ta wəndə nya sleteyi nya meghe Nabəkodonozor.
Tupurri: Wañ Nebukanetsar raw äo' soole wer Satrapn wo, jar ko wer horogn wo, jar waçaç ree progren wo, jar bag yañn wo, jar ëaw solayn wo, jar yer jag liñgin wo, jar car kiidan wo de jar kluuri joñre ma ti progren wo äuy maga aà mo a wo ti tï¡ï¡gi wer goñge fodo maga wañ Nebukanetsar hay kañ ta' mono.

Francais: Tous ces hauts fonctionnaires se rassemblèrent donc et prirent place devant la statue, pour la cérémonie d’inauguration.
Anglais: Then the satraps, the prefects, the governors, the counselors, the treasurers, the judges, the magistrates  and  lawyers, and all the chief officials of the provinces gathered together for the dedication of the image that King Nebuchadnezzar had set up; and they stood before it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sa ŋarmanna, sa ŋom-slena, sa guvernera, sa ɗiger-lawta, sa ŋom gurjuta, sa wi gatta, sa ka kitata hiɗi sum sa ŋulona kuɗ nagat kaf, tok tuwsiya kay mal vun va ma sli tuw-sana ma mulla Nebukadnesar inim kulona. Nisi zlar goy vok va ma sli tuw-sana namna.
Bulu: Ajô te beta biwôlô bebo bisaé bete bese be nga sulan a tabe ôsu éveʼela asu abôʼô ya telé je ngume ntelan.
Guiziga: Joˀ madiɗa ngi mizli micawwahay, miji kaway, buy miwi lihey, buy miwi lihey, mukuta vuhoy, miji zlilihey, migi kiitahay, buyoy waɗ migi slra ngir li buy miwi li miwa gar, a kusom ngi gi muguzlum ngi kuli Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl tuwa. A cicam dedeŋ a ciki kuli vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden mawɓe ɓe'e fuu ngari, ɓe ndari yeeso suura man.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden mawɓe ɓe'e fuu ngari, ɓe ndari yeeso suura man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita, o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu'i lɛŋ mɔi̧a tɛnɛ wen dee gbaŋa mboo-mɔ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa e ŋgɔn'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita, o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu'i lɛŋ mɔi̧a tɛnɛ wen dee gbaŋa mboo-mɔ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa e ŋgɔn'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa pɛtɛa ka mene slene nyi jama jama shɛhɛ tsenete geva ba'a ghereŋenji kwa kema ta pa ta wəndəa shɛ kezha gəsəkə.
Tupurri: Mo so no Satrapn wo, jar ko wer horogn wo, jar waçaç ree progren wo, jar bag yañn wo, jar ëaw solayn wo, jar yer jag liñgin wo, jar car kiidan wo de jar kluuri joñre ma ti progren wo äuy kal wo le tayge ma tï¡ï¡ wer goñ fodo maga wañ Nebukanetsar hay kañ ta' mono. Saara raw wo lagge pel fodo maga Nebukanetsar hay kañn ta' mono.

Francais: Le maître de cérémonie cria d’une voix puissante : « Gens de tous peuples, de toutes nations et de toutes langues, écoutez l’ordre que voici :
Anglais: Then the herald loudly proclaimed, “You are commanded, O peoples, nations, and  speakers of every  language,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ma siwelda vi mulla siwel hiɗi delem kulo'o ala: Dit kayni vuli tigiya, nigi sumuna, jaf-sumuna, sumun kuɗ vunna kafe!
Bulu: Môt a wulu tebe yʼékôan a nga yôtane tyiñe ngule na: Mia bôt mevale mese, a minkobô mise, vôʼôlaʼan abendé di na:
Guiziga: Buy ɓi ngi muguzlumo, a til mi ti gidaŋ, a ɓi: «Kum mizli gar, kum sukwi ngi mizli miwal walay, kum maɓam ti mi wal walay, cinam ɓi maɓukum di ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Goynoowo ɓaŋgti sawtu, hooli, wi'i: “Onon yimɓe iwɓe haa ummaatooje e asli e ɗemɗe fuu, nane umroore!
Fulfulde_DC: Goynoowo ɓaŋgti sawtu, hooli, wi'i: “Onon yimɓe iwɓe haa ummaatooje e asli e ɗemɗe fuu, nane umroore!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-he-mbea tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ hee ger: «Ɛnɛ o dukbíí lɛŋ, in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-he-mbea tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ hee ger: «Ɛnɛ o dukbíí lɛŋ, in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke wəndə nya te ghəa gəsəkə zlapete ghena: «Gheyɛ pɛtɛa hwelefefi nyi kese te pɛtɛa hɛɗi ba'a nyi kegeze pɛtɛa ghena, fa mə ghena nya:
Tupurri: Je 'wad äayn raw ngar jag go kloñ gano: Nday jar no, wer ma honla äuy, nday ma ti jag ma honla äuy, mokay diñ fen maga aè waçaçn wo ne nday mono:

Francais: “Dès que vous entendrez jouer de la trompette, de la flûte, de la cithare, de la sambuque, du psaltérion, de la cornemuse et de tous les genres d’instruments de musique, vous vous inclinerez jusqu’à terre pour adorer la statue d’or que le roi Nabucodonosor a fait dresser.
Anglais: that at the moment you hear the sound of the horn, pipe, lyre, trigon (four-stringed harp), dulcimer, bagpipe, and all kinds of music, you are to fall down and worship the golden image that King Nebuchadnezzar has set up.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nigi hum del gozona, zlekemna, dil-ŋolla, parwayna, dil gurayna, ɦuura hiɗi del sle ma li nullawa kafe, nigi ma dab vokgi gaa'a, kay girif va ma sli tuw-sana ma ora ma mulla Nebukadnesar inimna.
Bulu: Eyoñ mia ye wôʼô tyiñe toñ, mfañ, mvet, ntyam ateba, ndeñge, éloñ, biôm ba bôm mevale mese, mia ye kumbu si a kañ éveʼela or nje Nébukatnétzar njô bôt a maneya telé.
Guiziga: ‹ˀAy ngi tulum, ngi bozloro, ngi garaya, ngi gujuvur, ngi kããku, ngi fugum ati ngi gwat ngi dunguroy gar na, da kum misa cinam le cin na, ki hurukom huruk huruk, yo ki huruk hurukam a mbuŋ kuli mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, buy ɓi micica deŋ tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i on nani hoolo luwe e ciide e garayaaji e moolooji e hooduuji e algaytaaji e kuuje gimruɗe goɗɗe, tugge koppi yeeso suura kaŋŋeeri ka laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor darni, cujidane ka.

Francais: Si quelqu’un refuse de s’incliner et de l’adorer, on le jettera immédiatement dans la fournaise où brûle un feu intense.” »

Guiziga: Ko wa gar misa huruk ta, yo misa huruk huruk a mbuŋ naŋ ta na, a sa hizigaka wurenna ng'ar vu munjulili.›»

Francais: Ainsi donc, dès que les gens de tous peuples, nations et langues entendirent jouer de la trompette, de la flûte, de la cithare, de la sambuque, du psaltérion et de tous les genres d’instruments de musique, ils s’inclinèrent jusqu’à terre et adorèrent la statue d’or que le roi Nabucodonosor avait fait dresser.
Anglais: So when the people heard the sound of the horn, pipe, lyre, trigon, dulcimer, bagpipe and all kinds of music, all the peoples, nations, and  speakers of every  language fell down and worshiped the golden image that Nebuchadnezzar the king had set up.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ kayni, hay li ma sumun kaf hum tiyna vi gozona, zlekemna, dil-ŋolla, parwayna, dil gurayna, ɦuura hiɗi del sle ma li nullawa kafe, sumun kafe, jaf-sumun kafe, sumun kuɗ vunna kaf girif gaa'a dab voksi gaa'a vok va ma sli tuw sana ma Nebukadnesar inimna.
Bulu: Ajô te awolo bôte bese be nga wôʼô tyiñe toñ, mfañ, mvet ntyam ateba, ndeñge, biôm ba bôm mevale mese, be nga kumbu si a kañ éveʼela or Nébukatnétzar njô bôt a nga telé.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, mizli gar, sukwihey ati mizli maɓam mi wal walay gar micinaka ˀay ngi tulum, ngi bozloro, ngi garaya, ngi gujuvur, ngi kããku ati ngi gwat ngi dunguroy gar cin sina, a hurukom huruk huruk, a huruk hurukam a mbuŋ kuli ngi Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa ɓi micica tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum, nde yimɓe iwɓe haa ummaatooje e asli e ɗemɗe fuu nani hoolo kuuje gimruɗe go, ɓe tuggi koppi, ɓe cujidani suura kaŋŋeeri ka laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor darni.

Tupurri: Diñ wersen so, de maga jarn wo äuy wo wo laa ro coçoç, manbaçaçre, tidili, dilna, mandilna, jawlañ wo de ro fen joçoç ma honla äuy mono, jarn äuy, wer jar äuy de jar ma ti jag ma honla äuy raw wo leë mondra day goñ wo fodo ma de joñge de boo biñni maga wañ Nebukanetsar hay kañ ta' mono.

Francais: Aussitôt après, quelques Babyloniens vinrent accuser les Juifs.
Anglais: At that time certain Chaldeans came forward and brought [malicious] accusations against the Jews.

Francais: Sa Majesté le roi lui-même a donné l’ordre suivant : “Tout homme devra s’incliner jusqu’à terre pour adorer la statue d’or, dès qu’il entendra jouer de la trompette, de la flûte, de la cithare, de la sambuque, du psaltérion, de la cornemuse et de tous les genres d’instruments de musique.

Francais: Eh bien, Majesté, les Juifs Chadrac, Méchak et Abed-Négo, à qui tu as confié des postes dans l’administration de la province de Babylone, n’ont pas tenu compte de ton ordre : ils refusent de servir tes dieux  et d’adorer la statue d’or que tu as fait dresser. »
Anglais: There are certain Jews whom you have appointed over the administration of the province of Babylon,  namely  Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-nego. These men, O king, pay no attention to you; they do not serve your gods or worship the golden image which you have set up.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yudiyan sara ka'a sa naŋ vulsi ŋomda vi nagat Babilon hay ɓisiya, nisi kayni Sadrak, Mesak hiɗi Abed-Nego. Sum nisina may hum kuɗ gatta vaŋ naŋ mullaɗi, nisi may sun lawayna vaŋɗi, va ma sli tuw-sana ma ora ma naŋ kotomna nisi may girifimɗi.
Bulu: Ve Beyude bʼéziñ ô nga ve bisaé éfas éjôé ya Babilôn: Sadrak, Mésak a Abéd-Négo, bôte bete be nji bisi abendé dôé, a njô bôt, be nji saane bezambe bôé, nge kañ éveʼela or ô maneya telé.
Guiziga: Na kumani, ti Sadrak, Mesak ati Abet-Nego, gawla Yudehey, ka muvula taŋ Babiloŋ ɓa a waka tuwa, a kam slimiɗ ar mingiɓi ɗike ta. Tˀanta cinam mi da kuli ɗikeye ta, t'anta hurkom a mbuŋ gwat mipa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ka ɓi micica deŋ na ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Yahuudu'en Sadarak e Meesak e Abed-Nego ɓe a waɗi ɓe ardiiɓe mawɓe dow taƴre lesdi Baabila, kamɓe ɓe paalaay umroore nde a umri, barkaama. Ɓe teddinaay ɗowanteeɗo ma, ɓe cujidanaay suura kaŋŋeeri ka ndarnuɗa boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Yahuudu'en Sadarak e Meesak e Abed-Nego ɓe a waɗi ɓe ardiiɓe mawɓe dow taƴre lesdi Baabila, kamɓe ɓe paalaay umroore nde a umri, barkaama. Ɓe teddinaay ɗowanteeɗo ma, ɓe cujidanaay suura kaŋŋeeri ka ndarnuɗa boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɔ́k, Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, o be Juif n’ɛnɛ kaia a zu o tom sɛn nu Babilɔŋ'ɛ kɔ̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ na; wa kɔ̧ gasa o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mboo-mɔ n’ɛnɛ baa e ŋgɔn na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɔ́k, Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, o be Juif n’ɛnɛ kaia a zu o tom sɛn nu Babilɔŋ'ɛ kɔ̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ na; wa kɔ̧ gasa o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mboo-mɔ n’ɛnɛ baa e ŋgɔn na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Yawa, meghe yawe, nahe Shadrak, Mɛshak, Abɛd-Nɛgo nyi kaka Zhəwif, nyi ndeke nda slene na ke hɛ mbe sla ta hɛɗia Babilone, keɗema ɓela ghena nya gezete na. Nahe hɛ keɗema mene nda slene ke yɛ shala ta ŋa ba'a keɗema hawe va pa ta wəndə nya le mze kwa tere tere nya sleteyi na.»
Tupurri: Day jar Jwif po maga ndo hay haç waçaçre prog ma Babilon ne hara do, laa wo hoo sug ti jag äo maga ndo haçn mo gaa hase wañ, aà wo diñ Sadrag, Mesag wo de Abed-Nego. AÀ laa wo joñ peele ne baa äon wo gaa, bay wo goñ fodo ma de joñge de boo biñni ga ndo hay kañn ta' mo wa lay.

Francais: Très en colère, Nabucodonosor ordonna qu’on lui amène Chadrac, Méchak et Abed-Négo. Lorsqu’ils furent présents,
Anglais: Then Nebuchadnezzar in a furious rage gave a command to bring Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-nego; and these men were brought before the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Kay na'ta Nebukadnesar hay ɦiyda hiɗi purcakka, vul hagata kay nisi maram Sadrak, Mesak hiɗi Abed-Nego, nala nisi marsi vok mulla.
Bulu: Ane Nébukatnétzar a nga wôʼô mbia ôlun a bendé na be zuu nye Sadrak, Mésak a Abéd-Négo. Eyoñ be soya be a telé be ôsu njô bôt,
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor a ji mevel fõh fõh, a ɓa mizli, a soko ti Sadrak, Mesak ati Abet-Nego. A ram taŋ nga mbuŋ buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo tikki masin, umri waddugo worɓe tato go yeeso muuɗum. Ɓe ngaddi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo tikki masin, umri waddugo worɓe tato go yeeso muuɗum. Ɓe ngaddi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɗaŋa nyɛmna ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt; hegɔ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɗaŋa nyɛmna ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt; hegɔ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
