Francais: Un jour, le roi Baltazar offrit un grand banquet à ses hauts fonctionnaires, au nombre de mille, et il se mit à boire du vin en leur présence.
Anglais: Belshazzar the king [who was a descendant of Nebuchadnezzar] gave a great feast for a thousand of his nobles, and he was drinking his wine in the presence of the thousand [guests].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Belsasar li yuldeta ŋolda kay sa ŋulona valamu hiɗi sum sa gu' guna, nam ci dolayna kir sum sa gu' guna kaw.
Bulu: Môs éziñ njô bôte Beltsazar a nga bo beta dina asu biwôlô bebo bisaé bié, be mbe toyini, ane a nga nyu woon be too.
Guiziga: Ngi pas numuŋ ada na, buy Baltazar a gi muguzlum madiɗa da mizli hirnga naŋhay durmuku. Naŋ vuna ara si mbaazla a wuzla taŋ ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Belsaccar  ewni mawɓe muuɗum ujineere, waɗani ɓe nyaamduuji, o yardi inaboojam bee maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Belsaccar  ewni mawɓe muuɗum ujineere, waɗani ɓe nyaamduuji, o yardi inaboojam bee maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Baltazar dee gasa gbaŋa ha̧ o gasawi nu kɔ‘i nɛ mɔi̧a tɛ bíí booro, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn ti wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Baltazar dee gasa gbaŋa ha̧ o gasawi nu kɔ‘i nɛ mɔi̧a tɛ bíí booro, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn ti wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ ne, pa meghe Baltazar takɛ nda gajamendə ke mbelia jama nyi yite slibə. Ntake ŋkɛ kasa tɛ kwa kema ta nci.
Tupurri: Wañ Belsatsar raw joñ few reege ma kluu ne jar kluuri joñre äe ma ndarn wo. Se raw joo yii pel jar se ma ndarn wo no.

Francais: Sous l’influence de l’alcool, il ordonna qu’on apporte les coupes d’or et d’argent que son père Nabucodonosor avait prises au temple de Jérusalem . Il voulait s’en servir pour boire en compagnie de ses hauts fonctionnaires, de ses femmes et de ses épouses de second rang.
Anglais: Belshazzar, as he tasted the wine, gave a command to bring in the gold and silver vessels which his  father Nebuchadnezzar had taken out of the  temple which was in Jerusalem, so that the king and his nobles, his wives and his  concubines might drink from them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Belsasar jugo dolayn jugona, nam vul hagata kay nisi mar tasana ma ora hiɗi ma doorona ma bulumu Nebukadnesar yawamis goy hay Tempella hay Yerusalem pana, kay mulla hiɗi sa ŋulona valamu hiɗi boyna valamu, hiɗi boy sa sunumna kaw min ci hayamu.
Bulu: Eyoñ a maneya nyu woon, nde a jô na be zuu nye bilaé bi mvot a silba ésaa wé Nébukatnétzar a nga nyoñ e nda Zambe ya Yérusalém. A nga kômbô belane bie, asu ya nyu, baa be biwôlô bebo bisaé bié, binga bé a bibone bié.
Guiziga: Ti naŋ masi mbaazla tuwa na, a ɓa mizli ɓa a sakaŋ ti gazlanga ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ngi ɓiri bara, cine naŋ Nabukodonozor mihilo taŋ ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ a Zeruzalem na. Buy ati mizli hirnga naŋhay waɗ mangasl naŋhay ati ngwas migi slra naŋhay a sa sam taŋ mbaazla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i ɓe ɗon njara, o umri waddoygo njardukoy cardi e kaŋŋeeri koy baaba maako Nabukodonosor hoocuno nder haykaliiru haa Urusaliima haa o yara nder maakoy, kaŋko e mawɓe maako e rewɓe maako e sulaaɓe maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i ɓe ɗon njara, o umri waddoygo njardukoy cardi e kaŋŋeeri koy baaba maako Nabukodonosor hoocuno nder haykaliiru haa Urusaliima haa o yara nder maakoy, kaŋko e mawɓe maako e rewɓe maako e sulaaɓe maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Baltazar nɔɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i, a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kai o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, in nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa kai so yinɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Baltazar nɔɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i, a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kai o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, in nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa kai so yinɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa ghwəyi ŋkɛ ne, pa gezete kezha fəke wəshi kesa wəshi nyi le mze kwa tere tere ba'a mze kwa tɛawetɛa nyi fəte yitenyɛ Nabəkodonozor mbe ghɛa Shala nya mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm mbeli, yitea sa wəsə kesa ŋkɛ, mbelia jama nyi yite, ka meghwateshia ŋkɛ ba'a kweci mia ŋkɛ kwa hɛ.
Tupurri: De maga wañ baa jag go ti yii ba ba mono, se raw riñgi ga hoo kobre ma de joñge de boo biñnin wo le de ma de joñge de boo solay wo le, diñ kobre maga pan äe Nebukanetsar hay hoo ra le go äil tiñ Baa ma Jerusalemn mono. Belsatsar raw ga hoo ra le nen maga se wañ se joo äil äaara de jar kluuri joñre se wo, de naare se wo de ndere se wo.

Francais: On apporta donc les coupes d’or qui provenaient du temple de Jérusalem, la maison de Dieu, et le roi les utilisa pour boire en compagnie de tous ses invités.
Anglais: Then they brought in the gold  and  silver vessels that had been taken out of the temple, the house of God which was in Jerusalem; and the king and his nobles, his wives and his concubines drank from them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nisi mar tasana ma nisi yawamay goy hay Tempella, hay ziyda vi Lawna hay Yerusalem pana; mulla hiɗi sa ŋulona valamu hiɗi boyna valamu hiɗi boy sa sunumna ci hayamu.
Bulu: Nde ba ke soo bilaé bi mvot bi nga so nda Zambe, e Yérusalém, njô bôt ve zu belane bie ba be bôte bese a nga bañete.
Guiziga: Dar a soko ti gazlanga ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl mihiloko taŋ ar hay ngi Bumbumvuŋ a Zeruzalem tuwa. Joˀ buy ati mizli hirnga naŋhay waɗ mangasl naŋhay ati ngwas migi slra naŋhaya, a sam taŋ mbaazla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Law ɓe ngaddi njardukoy kaŋŋeeri koy ɓe koocoyino diga haykaliiru Allah haa Urusaliima go, ɓe fuu ɓe njari nder maakoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Law ɓe ngaddi njardukoy kaŋŋeeri koy ɓe koocoyino diga haykaliiru Allah haa Urusaliima go, ɓe fuu ɓe njari nder maakoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ wa kaia so yinɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm'i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wannu in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ wa kaia so yinɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm'i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wannu in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa mbeli fəke wəshi kesa wəshi nyi kese mbe ghɛa Shala nya mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Ntake meghe, mbelia jama nyi yite, ka meghwateshia ŋkɛ ba'a kweci mia ŋkɛ kasa wəshi kwa hɛ.
Tupurri: Mo so no aè raw hoo kobre ma de joñge de boo biñni maga aè hay hoo ra le go äil tiñ Baa, tiñ mani Baa ma Jerusalemn wo le, day wañ wo de jar kluuri joñre äen wo, de naare äen wo de ndere äen kal wo jooge äil äaara.

Francais: Après avoir bien bu, ils se mirent à chanter les louanges des dieux d’or et d’argent, de bronze et de fer, de bois et de pierre.
Anglais: They drank the wine and praised the gods of gold and silver, of bronze, iron, wood and stone.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ci vinna, subur lawayna ma ora, ma doorona, ma wayna, ma kawayna, ma guna hiɗi ma hiɗiyna.
Bulu: Eyoñe nyuan ô maneya, be ve zu taté na ba yia bia bezambe be or, argent, mvot, étyé, bilé a mekok .
Guiziga: A saka mbaazla, a hunumaka kuli taŋhay mipa taŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ti ɓiri bara, ti ɓiri gaza, ti ɓiri ho gar, ngi dum waɗ ngi ɗuguroyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njari inaboojam, ɓe maŋgti labbi kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri e leggal e hayre.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njari inaboojam, ɓe maŋgti labbi kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri e leggal e hayre.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ gasi nɛ o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, nɛ bu-mbɔi, nɛ ndɛrɛ, nɛ boi, nɛ te in nɛ ta.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ gasi nɛ o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, nɛ bu-mbɔi, nɛ ndɛrɛ, nɛ boi, nɛ te in nɛ ta.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta nya sahwe wəshi hɛ ne, ntake hɛ katsahe yɛ shala mze kwa tere tere, mze kwa tɛawetɛa, mze kwa ghwə ghwə, lɛ, sheghwə ba'a pelɛ.
Tupurri: Saara raw wo joo yii day togoë wo baa boo biñnin wo, baa boo solayn wo, baa boo dobn wo, baa boon wo, baa koon wo de baa huulin wo.

Francais: A ce moment précis, une main humaine apparut, à proximité du porte-lampes. Elle écrivit quelque chose sur la paroi blanchie à la chaux du palais royal. Lorsque le roi vit cette main qui écrivait,
Anglais: Suddenly the fingers of a man’s hand appeared and began writing opposite the lampstand on [a well-lit area of] the plaster of the wall of the king’s palace, and the king saw the part of the hand that did the writing.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta kayni, cita-ɓam sa'a ma goy kirsiya, nam ɗo kat gulmun ma koray haɓi hay ziyna vi mulla, ɗiger vok liyn ma tun fitilla. Mulla wi cita-ɓamta na'ta ta ka ɗo'o.
Bulu: Awolo te ebien, akule wo ve zu yené bebé ébeʼe belambe. De ve zu taté na da tili éfumulu mfine ya nda njô bôt.
Guiziga: A haŋhaŋ vuna si na, muzuŋ haŋ ngi mbur a puro gurjik, naŋ gweˀ avu li ɗuva lampe. A ra tuh gwat avu dalam babara ngi mugum ngi buy. Ti Buy mapura haŋ matoho gwat tuwa na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗon nii juŋngo goɗɗo waŋgi, kooli maago puɗɗi winndugo dow mahol laamorde ndanwinaaŋgol tiitotirŋgol bee jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji. Laamiiɗo yi'i juŋngo man saa'i ngo ɗon winnda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗon nii juŋngo goɗɗo waŋgi, kooli maago puɗɗi winndugo dow mahol laamorde ndanwinaaŋgol tiitotirŋgol bee jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji. Laamiiɗo yi'i juŋngo man saa'i ngo ɗon winnda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà wa zɔk wo, er bíí nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔr mɔ zaŋ ŋgeŋ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, ká̧ fara nɛ  dek-e-wee  duk sɛnɛ‘i. Wannu zɔka er nɛ yɔr mɔ‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà wa zɔk wo, er bíí nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔr mɔ zaŋ ŋgeŋ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, ká̧ fara nɛ  dek-e-wee  duk sɛnɛ‘i. Wannu zɔka er nɛ yɔr mɔ‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Taghanyɛ ne, pa dzeve ta wəndə ŋelɛ ncake nca vare wəsə kentare yɛ paterela. Ntake nde karafe wəsə dzeyi vare dewe nya tɛawetɛa ta ghɛ meghe. Ma kwa nakɛ dzevea shɛ meghe karafe wəsə ne,
Tupurri: De sen ni weere do jobo raw wo naa nene, raw wo yerge pel ngeel maga mo ma hag lampan de kañge ni see glig mani wañ ma de kor see de puy no. Nen wañ raw ko weere do se maga hay yerge mono.

Francais: il devint tout pâle et fut terrifié par ses pensées ; il perdit sa belle assurance et ses genoux s’entrechoquèrent.
Anglais: Then the king’s face grew pale, and his thoughts alarmed him; the joints  and  muscles of his hips  and  back weakened and his knees began knocking together.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta vok mulla muɗi jafam valamu, varta valamu muɗum nar ŋolo, sutayna vi cilwamu muɗi maŋaya, ŋulofomu muɗi ci kat tuwam bat-bat' kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe njô bôt a yen ane wo te wo tili, nye ve zu tabʼéyôé a ko woñ asimesane dé été; ateʼe ve bi nye angeteñ a meboñ.
Guiziga: a pusluɗaŋ mi ndararara, wuluk ara giraŋ, mitikinjaˀ wuɗak, yo poprokoyo kpar kpar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, hakkiilo maako jiiɓi, jokke maako tampi, koppi maako boo ndiwni.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, hakkiilo maako jiiɓi, jokke maako tampi, koppi maako boo ndiwni.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: yi wannu kpaia, zu-a zika, ku-a mɔka, ɓɛɛ o naŋ-a  mbali ŋmaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: yi wannu kpaia, zu-a zika, ku-a mɔka, ɓɛɛ o naŋ-a  mbali ŋmaa.

Tupurri: Mo so no, see wañ raw baëge go day nenterse äe raw dañge äe go, sag äe le'n go ceege lay, koyoçgre äe mbar wo see kaçaçra lay.

Francais: Il ordonna à grands cris de faire venir les sages de Babylone, magiciens, enchanteurs ou astrologues, et il leur dit : « Celui qui déchiffrera cette inscription et m’en donnera la signification sera revêtu d’habits d’apparat, on passera un collier d’or autour de son cou, et il sera un des principaux ministres du royaume . »
Anglais: The king called aloud to bring in the enchanters (Magi), the Chaldeans [who were master astrologers] and the diviners. The king said to the wise men of Babylon, “Whoever can read this writing and explain its interpretation to me shall be clothed with purple and have a chain of gold put around his neck, and have authority as the  third  ruler  in the kingdom.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla siwel hiɗi dono'o kay nisi maram sum sa wi caw mislekŋa, sa Kaldeena hiɗi sa tun gireyta; mulla sli ditiya di tam sa yalla hay Babilon: Dot tani sa ma jaŋa'awa, danti cawa'awa goyo, ma cukum sligar-purpella talamu, ma gum jaɓ ma ora kelemu, nam ma mus mi ma mul ɦidina hay mulda vanu.
Bulu: Njô bôt, ve zu bete tyiñe ngu na be loone beyeme ya Babilôn, bebo majik, befas ateté a mimvimviʼi, nde a jô be na: Môt a ye yeme lañe ntilane wu a kate ma atinane yʼété, ba ye jalé nye ngômesane melitan, ba ye jalé nye nsanga or tyiñ a éyoñe te a ye bo wua ya bengovina bʼôsu yʼéjôé.
Guiziga: Dar buy a widi ti gidaŋ, a ɓi ɓa muɓula musuɗukoy, mupura kulihey ati mupura wurzlaŋhay a soko. A ɓa mizli misi sinmijileŋ ngi Babiloŋ tayna: «Ko wa gar muslufa gwat mutoho hana le, yo a njika mbiɗeˀvra naŋ le na, a sa kakaŋ zana hirnga, a sa luwakaŋ virzle ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl asi ˀaya, yo naŋ vuna, a sa cifi madiɗa migi slra ar zuma buyo.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hooli ɓe ngadda waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en e annduɓe haala koode. Nde ɓe nasti, o wi'i hikma'en Baabila: “Mo waawi jaŋngugo binndol ngo'ol e fassitirgo ngol, mi ɓornan mo limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe, o heɓan koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande maako, o laatoto tataɓo nder laamu boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: O hooli ɓe ngadda waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en e annduɓe haala koode. Nde ɓe nasti, o wi'i hikma'en Baabila: “Mo waawi jaŋngugo binndol ngo'ol e fassitirgo ngol, mi ɓornan mo limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe, o heɓan koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande maako, o laatoto tataɓo nder laamu boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu pi̧i̧ tom ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ bee. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mɛ Babilɔŋ: «Wi nɛ tɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɛ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, wi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-a, wi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu pi̧i̧ tom ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ bee. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mɛ Babilɔŋ: «Wi nɛ tɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɛ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, wi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-a, wi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe zlapete le berete kezha fə nda ka kelɛŋə, ka mene ghwɛ ba'a ka ŋa zlera mbeli kadzeki. Laŋe meghe te ghena, ma ke sha ka ntsehwele ntsehwele nyi mbe Babilone: «Ma wəndə nya kejaŋgate rafe nya ba'a nya kegezete ɗa ghena nya mbe ne, kateseɗe nda karalame 'ya, kateve nda livə mze kwa tere tere 'ya kwa welɛ ba'a katenza ŋkɛ hwa ka mene slene nyi jama jama te hɛɗia meghe.»
Tupurri: Wañ raw ngarjag go kloñ ga ëe jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñn wo le de jar Kalden wo de jar kañ halgen wo. Wañ raw waçaç waçaçre day riñ jar ko ree ma Babilon wo gano: Je maga kee yerge sen we go day naa wer äe we go ne ndi no, ndi hee ge oçoçbe ma de seçeç burbur ne hen ti, ndi hee ge redew boo biñni ne hen soole day se joñ ge diñ je kluu ma de swa' ti sir wañ äin la.

Francais: Tous les sages au service du roi s’avancèrent, mais aucun d’eux ne put déchiffrer l’inscription pour en donner la signification au roi.
Anglais: Then all the king’s wise men came in, but they could not  read the writing or reveal to the king its interpretation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta sum sa yalla vi mulla cuk kalaf talam kaf; may nisi as kay jaŋ ɗot na'ta goyɗi, asay kay ɗeka' cawa' goy tam mullaɗi kaw.
Bulu: Beyem bese be mbe be saane njô bôt be nga zu, ve teke wua a nga bo nguleya lañe ntilane te nge kate njô bôt atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Misi sinmijileŋhey gar a soko, ko a slufaka gu ta, a ɓaka mbiɗeˀvra naŋ gu ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hikma'en laamiiɗo fuu ɓaditi, ammaa walaa koo gooto waawi jaŋngugo binndol man sakkomaa fassitirgo ngol.
Fulfulde_DC: Hikma'en laamiiɗo fuu ɓaditi, ammaa walaa koo gooto waawi jaŋngugo binndol man sakkomaa fassitirgo ngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ko wannu lɛŋ gara nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ so tɔra yɔramɔ‘i kà bó nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wannu na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ko wannu lɛŋ gara nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ so tɔra yɔramɔ‘i kà bó nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wannu na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa pɛtɛa ka ntsehwele ntsehwelea meghe dzeki, ama wəndə shɛ hwa hɛ kejaŋgate rafea shɛ keɗema kegezete nda ghena nya mbe ke meghe we.
Tupurri: Jar ëeñ mani wañn raw wo laa ge wo see wañ ama saara kaçaç ma kee yergen go gaa lay, laa wo naa wer äe go ne wañ gaa lay.

Francais: Baltazar en fut terrifié et devint encore plus pâle ; ses hauts fonctionnaires eux-mêmes étaient bouleversés.
Anglais: Then King Belshazzar was greatly perplexed, his face became even paler, and his nobles were bewildered  and  alarmed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala mulla Belsasar muɗi nar ŋolo; iram liweka, sa ŋulona valam kaw varta visi muɗi ɦayam-ɦayam'.
Bulu: Eyoñe te njô bôte Beltsazar a nga tuʼa dañe ko woñ; biwôlô bebo bisaé fe bi mbe feʼe ne vema.
Guiziga: Dar wuluk a gira buy Baltazara haɗi ma, a pusluɗaŋ mi ndararara, mizli hirnga naŋhaya, a roko lesl welele ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum hakkiilo laamiiɗo Belsaccar jiiɓi masin, yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, mawɓe maako boo cakli.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum hakkiilo laamiiɗo Belsaccar jiiɓi masin, yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, mawɓe maako boo cakli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu wannu Baltazar zika tɛ mɔ‘i nyɛmna, yi-a kpaia, ɓɛɛ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ yaa nɛ kíì mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu wannu Baltazar zika tɛ mɔ‘i nyɛmna, yi-a kpaia, ɓɛɛ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ yaa nɛ kíì mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Baltazar dakenyɛ kwele kwele ba'a pa kema ta ŋkɛ zhɛrenyɛ tɛarawe rawe ma zhɛkwa. Kwetɛ kwetɛŋe yɛ mehele mbelia jama nyi yite tazenji perə.
Tupurri: Ti sen mokay wañ Belsatsar kal ferge go dañ nenterse has pa, see äe baë go debañ lay jiili jar kluuri joñre äen caa wo go debañ lay.

Francais: La reine mère entendit les cris poussés par le roi et par ses hauts fonctionnaires. Elle entra dans la salle du banquet et déclara : « Longue vie au roi ! Il ne faut pas te laisser terrifier par tes pensées et en perdre toute couleur.
Anglais: Now the queen [mother], overhearing the [excited] words of the king and his nobles, came into the banquet area. The queen [mother] spoke and said, “O king, live forever! Do not be alarmed at your thoughts or let your face be changed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ dita vi mulla hiɗi sa ŋulona valamu, ca-mulda kal kalaf talam hay ziy ma yuldeta, na' sli ditiya di'e: Mulla musaŋ iri ta-ta musge. Hin varta vaŋu muɗaŋ narɗi, hin vokaŋ liwekɗi kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe nyia njô bôt a nga wôʼô miñyône njô bôt a biwôlô bebo bisaé bié, a nga nyiine nda dina a jô na: Enyiñe njô bôt é boʼo ayap! Asimesane dôé e boʼo te bo na ô ko woñ, nge dimili nyôle ya ékôbe jôé.
Guiziga: Maˀay micina widi ngi buy ati ngi mizli hirnga ngi buyoy tuwa na, a ci ng'ar hay ngi muguzlumo. Joˀ a ɓi: «Aw kumani ɗu! Anja ki ndir ngi sete! Anja wuluk a guruw ta, yo anja a pusluɗuw mi ndarara ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daada laamiiɗo nani hoolo maako e hoolo mawɓe maako, nasti suudu haa ɓe nyaamata, wi'i: “A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama! Taa hul, taa mbar jokke bana nii.
Fulfulde_DC: Daada laamiiɗo nani hoolo maako e hoolo mawɓe maako, nasti suudu haa ɓe nyaamata, wi'i: “A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama! Taa hul, taa mbar jokke bana nii.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, naa ko wannu yee tua fara nɛ wa de gbaŋa'i; tɛ zia ger wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki! Ká taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sakali na, in ká see'nɛ́ tu̧ na mbɛt!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, naa ko wannu yee tua fara nɛ wa de gbaŋa'i; tɛ zia ger wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki! Ká taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sakali na, in ká see'nɛ́ tu̧ na mbɛt!
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghekɛa meghe fate lewela nya tsate meghe ba'a ŋa mbelia jama nyi yite. Pa nde dzembe cɛ kezeme wəsə kezeme, ma ke sha meghe: «Meghe yawe, hɛyi ŋa Shala teghweme! Dakema na va yɛ zəzə ta ŋa ba'a nzama kema ta ŋa tɛarawe rawe ma.
Tupurri: Wer ngarge jag waçaçre wañ wo de jar kluuri joñre äen wo mono, man wañ raw kalge le äil tiñ reege few no, raw waçaç waçaçre do kay gano: Wañ mo hay mbe ciñ caw tum! Daga nenterse wañ mo dañ go wa. Ndo bay maga ndo baë see go wa!

Francais: Dans ton royaume, il y a un homme qui est animé de l’esprit des dieux saints. A l’époque de ton père, on a découvert en lui une clairvoyance, une intelligence et une sagesse pareilles à la sagesse des dieux . C’est pourquoi ton père, le roi Nabucodonosor, l’avait nommé chef des devins, magiciens, enchanteurs et astrologues.
Anglais: There is a man in your kingdom in whom is  a spirit of the holy gods; and in the days of your father, illumination, understanding and wisdom like the wisdom of the gods were found in him. And  King Nebuchadnezzar, your father—your father the king, appointed him chief of the magicians, enchanters, Chaldeans and diviners.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay nagata vaŋ tani sa mara ka kepe, ŋusta vi lawayn sa peldetna ka hayamu. Hay liyna vi buŋ kayni, haraŋa, wida-yalla hiɗi yalda (numa) fa' hayamu, ŋray ca hiɗi yalda vi lawayna. Kuɗ kayni buŋu Nebukadnesar tunum ŋolo kay sa li gul-yalda, sa wi-mislekŋa, sa Kaldeena, sa tun gireyta kaw.
Bulu: Amu môt a ne éjôé jôé été a too njalan a nsisime bezambe be nʼétyi. Melu ésoo a nga too be nga yene na a yeme fase mam, atyeñ a feʼe bia funane feʼe bezambe bi too be nye. Ajô te ésoo, njô bôte Nébukatnétzar a nga telé nye évete mimvimviʼi, bebo majik, befas ateté a mingengañ.
Guiziga: Ar zumabuy ɗike, mbur ada, sin ngi kuli mezlehey ada ar naŋ. Ti hin ngi cine ɗik mazum buy na, i puraka na, a sla wala ngi ɓi kwaŋ kwaŋ, naŋ ti slesle, yo naŋ ti sinmijileŋ kaɓa ngi kuli mezlehey. Cine ɗik Nabukodonozor a cufaŋ i madiɗa ngi muɓula musuɗukoy, ngi mupura kulihey, ngi misi cucukoy waɗ ngi mizli mupura wurzlaŋhay. Cine ɗik buy miga na, naŋ kanah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi goɗɗo nder lesdi ma, keewɗo ruuhu ɗowanteeɓe seniiɓe. Saa'i laamu baaba ma, o waŋgini anndal lugguŋgal e faamu e hikma bana ngal ɗowanteeɓe. Baaba ma Nabukodonosor waɗi mo hooreejo dow laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en e annduɓe haala koode fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi goɗɗo nder lesdi ma, keewɗo ruuhu ɗowanteeɓe seniiɓe. Saa'i laamu baaba ma, o waŋgini anndal lugguŋgal e faamu e hikma bana ngal ɗowanteeɓe. Baaba ma Nabukodonosor waɗi mo hooreejo dow laarooɓe e waɗooɓe hatti e Kaldiya'en e annduɓe haala koode fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma bíí nɛ  ɔmi  ko o sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ-a a̧a̧ tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧. Ŋgimbi-wan ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ zɔka'e wi’ɛi iŋa zɔka mɔ, a̧ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk hee ko o sɔ̧ ga. Hegɔ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ee a̧ nɛ gasawi ko o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma bíí nɛ  ɔmi  ko o sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ-a a̧a̧ tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧. Ŋgimbi-wan ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ zɔka'e wi’ɛi iŋa zɔka mɔ, a̧ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk hee ko o sɔ̧ ga. Hegɔ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ee a̧ nɛ gasawi ko o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te hɛɗia ŋa ne, wəndə nya nza sefəa yɛ shala mbe ya shɛ. Ma te vəa yiteyɛ ŋa ne, nahe mbeli kesləyi kelɛŋə, ɗepe wəsə ba'a ntsehwele kala ŋa yɛ shala mbe. Vatse veyi ŋkɛ yiteyɛ ŋa, meghe Nabəkodonozor kawəndə nya te ghəa ka mene ghwɛ, ka kelɛŋə, ka ɗepe nza ta yɛ saseregwa ba'a ka ŋa zlera.
Tupurri: Jobo yañ ti sir wañ äon la, je sen de Nenterse Baa ma bay ëagn wo ti. Le ti kal mani pan äon mono, aè hay da'n diñ je maga car äil feçeçren go, de ti ngeel lay day koge ree äen do mani baan wo nono. Ba äuy pa mono, wañ Nebukanetsar pan äo hay hayn diñ wañ jar ko wer feçeçren wo, wañ jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñn wo, wañ jar Kalden wo de jar kañ halgen wo. Hay joñ nono na diñ pan äo

Francais: Il possède un esprit exceptionnel, du discernement, de l’intelligence, et la capacité d’expliquer les rêves, de déchiffrer les énigmes et de résoudre les problèmes. Eh bien, qu’on fasse venir cet homme, ce Daniel à qui le roi avait donné le nom de Beltassar : il révélera la signification de cette inscription. »
Anglais: It was because an extraordinary spirit, knowledge and insight, the ability to interpret dreams, clarify riddles, and solve complex problems were found in this Daniel, whom the king named Belteshazzar. Now let Daniel be called and he will give the interpretation.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Daniel namna ma mulla kaam selem ala Belsasar kayni, numa fi hayamu ŋusta ta suw kafta, wida-ŋolda hiɗi yamda-wida, hiɗi varta-ŋolda kay di caw duwayt goyo, di caw jobta-ŋayayta, di caw lawta ta lop ŋolda goyo kaw; yaŋ Daniel aya, nam ma da' cawa' goyo.
Bulu: A bili nsisim wo selan mi mi bôte bevok, wu ya yeme yemelane mam, atyeñ a nguleya ve atinane ya biyeyem, a kulane mesoé me ba a kulane minsolane mi mam. Be tame loone môt ate, Daniel, nyô njô bôt a nga yôlé jôé na Beltsazar: a ye kulan atinane ya ntilane te.
Guiziga: Asi a puraka Daniyele na, a wuluk haɗa, a naŋ ti sin ngi gi gwata, a pura gwata kweŋ kweŋ ngi njika musuwunoy, a bo ti ɓi mumbuzahaya njoy, yo a ɗiya ɓi mutuwaˀa. Buy vuna, a caŋ slimiɗ mekelem, a zila Beltasar. Na ani wurenna, ngi zilo mbur Daniyel nah vuna, naŋ a sa njika mbiɗeˀvra ngi gwat mutoho hana.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O woodi ruuhu kayɗiniiŋgu e faamu e baawal fassitirgo koyɗi, heɓtugo annditanamji, fiistugo haalaaji caɗɗi boo. Ngam maajum nel ɗaɓɓitoygo Daniyel mo laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor inndi ɗum Beltesacar. Kaŋko o fassitirante binndol ngo'ol.”
Fulfulde_DC: O woodi ruuhu kayɗiniiŋgu e faamu e baawal fassitirgo koyɗi, heɓtugo annditanamji, fiistugo haalaaji caɗɗi boo. Ngam maajum nel ɗaɓɓitoygo Daniyel mo laamiiɗo Nabukodonosor inndi ɗum Beltesacar. Kaŋko o fassitirante binndol ngo'ol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl, nɛ̀ wannu gɔna so nin Bɛltasar ha̧ a̧, a̧a̧ so nɛ ɗuka taamɔ nyɛmna, a̧ nɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ. A̧ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu in sumgba ká bá nɛ̀ ɗafa-mgbara-mɔ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl, nɛ̀ wannu gɔna so nin Bɛltasar ha̧ a̧, a̧a̧ so nɛ ɗuka taamɔ nyɛmna, a̧ nɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ. A̧ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu in sumgba ká bá nɛ̀ ɗafa-mgbara-mɔ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Zəzə nya dzawe ya ve, nahe ŋkɛ keɗepe zeweve ta wəshi ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kenza kande ɗepe wəsə. Nahe ŋkɛ keɗepe geze ghena nya mbe yɛ shiwə, keɗepe ghena nyi dzawe dzawe ba'a keɗepe ntsehwelea ghena nyi ghyana ghyana. Hekake Daniyɛl nya ndeke nda slə meghe kaBɛltasar mbeli. Kategeze ŋa ghena nya mbe rafea shɛ ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: wer maga aè hay da' je se ga diñ Danyel maga aè ëen ga Belsatsar diñ je ma de ëeñ de dañ kaçaçra, de ko wer ne feçeçre wo, de ti, de ko faage ndar wer lwa'ge wo go de fañge fi feçeçre ma de gaali wo, day kiëgi wer feçeçre ma de gaali wo nen äe. Daga aè mo ëe Danyel le ni se naa wer yergen yañ go.

Francais: On conduisit donc Daniel devant le roi, qui lui demanda : « Es-tu bien Daniel, ce déporté judéen, que le roi mon père a ramené du pays de Juda ?
Anglais: Then Daniel was brought in before the king. And the king said to Daniel, “Are you that Daniel who is one of the sons of the exiles of Judah, whom my father the king brought from Judah?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta nisi mar Daniel kalaf vok mulla, mulla sli ditiya di tam Daniel: Naŋ damni mi Daniel ma kep jar sa daŋgayna, sa bunu mulla marsiyay hay Yuda pan su?
Bulu: Nde be nga zuu Daniel be njô bôt, nye ki ve sili nye na: Ye wo ô ne Daniel, nkôme mone Beyude ñwô njô bôt ésaa wom a nga soo wô si ya Yuda?
Guiziga: Dar a soko ti Daniyele nga mbuŋ buyo. Buy a zla a ɓaŋ: «Daniyel ngi wuzla mizli mijoko taŋ ti ruwuy Zuda, cine ɗu, buy muso di ti Zuda na, i ka gisiŋ kwa?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngaddi Daniyel yeeso laamiiɗo. O ƴami mo: “An woni Daniyel, gooto Yahuudu'en dahaaɓe ɓe baaba am waddi diga Yahuuda na?
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngaddi Daniyel yeeso laamiiɗo. O ƴami mo: “An woni Daniyel, gooto Yahuudu'en dahaaɓe ɓe baaba am waddi diga Yahuuda na?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ Daniɛl tɛnɛ ti wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu ak a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ ŋma be Juda nɛ wa sa'e Daniɛl nɛ dáà kɔ‘m kaia so piinɛ nɛ nu kɔ-wa nde?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ Daniɛl tɛnɛ ti wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu ak a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ ŋma be Juda nɛ wa sa'e Daniɛl nɛ dáà kɔ‘m kaia so piinɛ nɛ nu kɔ-wa nde?
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa mbeli keleghe Daniyɛl kadzeki sha meghe. Laŋe meghe te ghena, ma ke shɛ: «Gha ya kaDaniyɛl, nde Zhəwif nya keleke meghe, yiteyɛ ɗa, se mbe Zhəwda na?
Tupurri: AÈ raw age de Danyel pel wañ so. Wañ raw waçaç waçaçre day riñ Danyel gana: Mbe mo na diñ ndo Danyel se ma yoo jar maga aè hay hoo ra le dañgay ti sir Juda, ga pan äi wañ hay hoo ra le ti sir Juda mo yawla?

Francais: J’ai entendu dire que tu es animé de l’esprit des dieux  et que tu possèdes de la clairvoyance, de l’intelligence et une sagesse exceptionnelle.
Anglais: I have heard of you, that a spirit of the gods is in you, and that illumination, insight, and extraordinary wisdom have been found in you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan humi labara kaŋ ala naŋu ŋusta vi lawayn ka hayaŋu, haraŋa ka hayaŋu, yamda-wida hiɗi yalda ta ira' tayɗita ka hayaŋu kaw.
Bulu: Me wôʼôya na ô ne njalan a nsisime ya bezambe, a na, wo yeme fase mam, atyeñ a feʼe ja selane bôte bevoʼo bese.
Guiziga: Yi cin, a ɓam sin ngi kuli mezleheye ada ar ka, yo mizli a puraka na, ki pur kaˀ haɗa, ki pur kweŋ kweŋ, yo ka ti sinmijileŋ haɗa ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi nani ruuhu ɗowanteeɓe ɗon nder maaɗa. Mi nani boo a woodi anndal lugguŋgal e faamu e hikma kayɗiniika.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi nani ruuhu ɗowanteeɓe ɗon nder maaɗa. Mi nani boo a woodi anndal lugguŋgal e faamu e hikma kayɗiniika.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi zia'e  ɔmi  ko o sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ mɛ; wa'e mɛ iŋa zɔka mɔ, mɛ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nyɛmna a̧a̧ tɛ mɛ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi zia'e  ɔmi  ko o sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ mɛ; wa'e mɛ iŋa zɔka mɔ, mɛ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nyɛmna a̧a̧ tɛ mɛ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe 'ya kefate kageze mbeli sefəa yɛ shala ya mbe gha ba'a nahe mbeli kesləyi kelɛŋə, ɗepe wəsə ba'a ntsehwele nya dzawe mbe gha.
Tupurri: Ndi hay laa waçaçre ti äo ga ndo de Nenterse baa wo ti äo, ga aè da' mo diñ je maga car äil feçeçre wo go, de ti ngeel lay, de koge ree ma sara lay.

Francais: On vient de m’amener les sages et les magiciens pour qu’ils déchiffrent l’inscription que voici et m’en donnent la signification, mais ils n’en ont pas été capables.
Anglais: Now the wise men and the enchanters, were brought in before me so that they might read this writing and reveal its meaning to me, but they could not give the interpretation of the message.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi mar sum sa yalla hiɗi sa wi caw mislekŋa vokan tani, kay nisi ma jaŋ ɗot tani, kay danti cawa' goyo kaw; may nisi as kay da' cawa' goyɗi.
Bulu: Be ndôme soo ma beyem a bebo majik na, be lañe ntilane wu a ve ma atinane yʼété, ve be nji bo nguleya bo jame te.
Guiziga: Wureˀ ani aka, a sikiy ti misi sinmijileŋhey ati muɓula musuɗukoy ɓa a slufaka gwat mutoho hana, waɗ a ɓikiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ. Amma ko a ɓikiy di gu ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa, mi umri waddugo hikma'en e waɗooɓe hatti fuu yeeso am, haa ɓe njaŋnga binndol ngo'ol, ɓe passitiranammi ngol. Ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa, mi umri waddugo hikma'en e waɗooɓe hatti fuu yeeso am, haa ɓe njaŋnga binndol ngo'ol, ɓe passitiranammi ngol. Ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli fəke ɗa ka ntsehwele ntsehwele ba'a ka mene ghwɛ kezha jaŋga rafe nya ba'a kezha geze ɗa ghena nya mbe, ama kepesle hɛ yite we.
Tupurri: AÈ hay a we de jar ko reen wo de jar ndar wer feçeçre ma nen ngeel ma ciñn wo pel äi la nen maga aà mo kee wo yergen go ne ndi, mo naa wo wer äe go me. AÀma saara kaçaç ma naa wer yerge sen go ne ndi gaè.

Francais: Or j’ai appris que toi, tu es capable d’expliquer les énigmes et de résoudre les problèmes. Si tu parviens à déchiffrer cette inscription et à m’en donner la signification, tu seras revêtu d’habits d’apparat, on passera un collier d’or autour de ton cou, et tu seras l’un des principaux ministres du royaume . »
Anglais: But I personally have heard about you, that you are able to make interpretations and solve complex problems. Now if you are able to read the writing and reveal its interpretation to me, you shall be clothed with purple and have a chain of gold put around your neck, and you shall have authority as the third  ruler  in the kingdom.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nan humi ala naŋ di caw slen goyo, vat law ma zulla kaw; may wulin kayni la naŋ as jaŋ ɗot tani, la naŋ danti cawa' goyo kaw, nan ma cukaŋ sligar-purpella kataŋu, ma gaŋ jaɓta ta ora keleŋu, naŋ ma mus mi ma mul-ɦidina hay mulda vanu kaw.
Bulu: Ve be kateya me na, ô ne nguleya kulane mesoé me ba a kulane minsolane mi mam. Nge wo kui na ô lañe ntilane wu, a ve ma atinane yʼété, ba ye jalé wo mengômesane melitan, a jalé wo nsanga or e tyiñ , a wo ye bo wua ya minlô mi bôte yʼéjôé.
Guiziga: Na yi cin na, ki ɓa mbiɗeˀvra ngi gwataya, yo ki ɗiya ɓi mutuwaˀhaya gu. Wurenna so na, gwat mutoho hana, da ki slufa le gu, ki ɓiy mbiɗeˀvra naŋ le gu na, a sa kukuw zana hirnga, a sa luwukuw virzle ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl asi ˀaya, joˀ kisa cifi madiɗa migi slra ngi buy ar zumabuy ɗu.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi nani an a waawan fassitirgo e fiistugo haalaaji caɗɗi. To a waawi jaŋngugo binndol e fassitirgo ngol, mi ɓornete limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe, a heɓan koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande ma, a laatoto tataɓo nder laamu boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Mi nani an a waawan fassitirgo e fiistugo haalaaji caɗɗi. To a waawi jaŋngugo binndol e fassitirgo ngol, mi ɓornete limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe, a heɓan koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande ma, a laatoto tataɓo nder laamu boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi zia'e mɛ nyɛma tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ in ɗafa mgbara-a mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ nyɛma tɔra yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt, mi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-mɛ, mi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi zia'e mɛ nyɛma tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ in ɗafa mgbara-a mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ nyɛma tɔra yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt, mi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-mɛ, mi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe 'ya kefate wərə na kagezete ghena nya mbe wəshi nyi dzawe dzawe ba'a kaɗepete ntsehwelea ghena nyi ghyana ghyana. Ma kejaŋgate rafe nya na ba'a kegezete ɗa ghena nya mbe na ne, kateseɗe ŋa karalame 'ya, kateve ŋa livə mze kwa tere tere 'ya kwa welɛa ŋa ba'a katenza na hwa ka mene slene nyi jama jama te hɛɗia ɗa.»
Tupurri: Ndi hay laa ga ndo ndar wer feçeçre ma de gaalin wo go, ndo fañ fi äaara go. Patalam no, hayga ndo kaçaç yañ go ma kee yerge sen go, ma naa wer äe go ne ndi no, ndi hee ge oçoçbe ma de seçeç burbur ne ndo ti, ndi hee ge redew boo biñni ne ndo soole day ndo joñ ge diñ je kluu ma de swa' ti sir wañ äi no.

Francais: Daniel répondit au roi : « Tu peux garder pour toi tes cadeaux et tes présents, ou les donner à d’autres. Pourtant, je déchiffrerai l’inscription et je t’en expliquerai la signification.
Anglais: Then Daniel answered and said before the king, “Keep your gifts for yourself and give your rewards to someone else; however, I will read the writing to the king and reveal the interpretation to him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Daniel hot dit tam mulla: Sle ma vulda vaŋu naŋ ma ŋomom maŋu, vulaŋ sle namna mi sa mara'a, may ɗota nan ma jaŋaŋgi goyo, ɗekaŋgi cawa' goy lay.
Bulu: Daniel nye njô bôte na: A njô bôt, tame baʼale memvaka a bifaʼé asu dôé, nge ve bie bôte befe. Ve da, ma zu lañe ntilan a kate wo atinane yʼété.
Guiziga: Dar Daniyel a mbiɗa da buyo: «Gwat ngatara ɗikey na, anja a ndiram da ka vuna a muŋ, yo madiɗaka mavuliy di na, vula taŋ da mizli mekelemey! Amma, gwat mutoho, yi sa slufuw di buy, ɓa ki si na mbiɗeˀvra naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel jaabi laamiiɗo: “Jogita dokke ma, mbarjaari ma boo hokku ndi goɗɗo feere. Ammaa mi jaŋngante binndol ngo'ol, barkaama, mi fassitirante ngol.
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel jaabi laamiiɗo: “Jogita dokke ma, mbarjaari ma boo hokku ndi goɗɗo feere. Ammaa mi jaŋngante binndol ngo'ol, barkaama, mi fassitirante ngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu'e: «O ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i de ŋma mɔ tɛ‘m na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́; koo ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ. Nɛ ko yɔramɔ, mi tɛ tɔr ɓɛɛ mi wee ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu'e: «O ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i de ŋma mɔ tɛ‘m na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́; koo ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ. Nɛ ko yɔramɔ, mi tɛ tɔr ɓɛɛ mi wee ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Daniyɛl zhɛnete nda ke meghe: «Wərə na kasərəakɛ wəshi gəməa ŋa va gha keɗema kafəave nda hɛ ke kweci mbeli. Ma 'ya ne, katejaŋga ŋa rafe nya 'ya ba'a kategeze ŋa ghena nya mbe 'ya.
Tupurri: Danyel raw ferge pel wañ ni so gano: Ëaw mbo feçeçre äon wo ma äo, haç mandekoë äon wo ne je tigriñ. AÀ ne, ndi kee mbi yergen yañ go ne wañ day ndi naa mbi wer äe yañ go ne hene.

Francais: Majesté, le Dieu très-haut avait fait de ton père Nabucodonosor un grand roi, couvert de gloire et de dignité.
Anglais: O king, the Most High God gave Nebuchadnezzar your father a kingdom and greatness and glory and majesty;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Awa, mulla, Lawn ma Kulo-Jamna vul mulda, ŋolda, suburta hiɗi gajijita mi buŋu Nebukadnesar,
Bulu: Zambe a dañ ôyabe yôp, a nga bo ésoo Nébukatnétzar beta njô bôt, njalan a duma a éjijin.
Guiziga: Kumani! Buymisemuŋ mifineˀ gwat gara, a vula zumabuy, madiɗa, dudok waɗ buy le da cine ɗik Nabukodonozoro zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo hokki baaba ma Nabukodonosor laamu e maŋngu e tedduŋgal e daraja.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo hokki baaba ma Nabukodonosor laamu e maŋngu e tedduŋgal e daraja.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Sɔ̧ nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wannu, ha̧a̧ wan, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ ha̧ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Sɔ̧ nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wannu, ha̧a̧ wan, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ ha̧ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Meghe yawe, nahe Shala tehwə ghweme keveyi yiteyɛ ŋa Nabəkodonozor kameghe nya wəba, nya berete ba'a nya nza zləvə te.
Tupurri: Wañ, Baa ma ciñ haçaçn hay haç wañ, haç kluu, haç hooge sug ti wo de togoëge ne pan äo Nebukanetsare.

Francais: A cause de cette grandeur reçue de Dieu, les populations de tous pays, de toutes nations et de toutes langues tremblaient de peur devant lui. Il condamnait à mort qui il voulait, il laissait vivre qui il voulait ; il honorait ou humiliait qui il voulait.
Anglais: and because of the greatness that He gave him, all the peoples, nations, and  speakers of every  language trembled and feared him. Whomever he wished he killed, and whomever he wished he kept alive; whomever he wished he promoted and whomever he wished he humbled.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ ŋolda ta Lawn vulumtita, sumun kaf, jaf-sumun kaf, sumun hay vunna kaf, ka li nari, tuwsi ka visi vokom bat-bat', gige ma nam min cum mati, nam cumu, gige ma nam min hinim iriya, nam hinimu; gige ma nam min vulum ŋolda, nam vulumu, gige ma nam min kiɗam goyo, nam kiɗamu.
Bulu: Amu anen a nga nyoñe be Zambe ate nde bôte ya mesi mese, meyoñ mese, a minkobô mise be mbe be fôʼôbaʼan asu dé. A mbe a vaʼa mekua yʼawu e be môt ase a kômbô, a jôkéʼé ki môt ase émien a kômbô na a nyiñ; a mbe a neneʼe nge sili nyô émien a kômbô sili si.
Guiziga: Vur naŋ muvulaŋ madiɗa tuwa na, mizli gar, sukwihey ati mizli maɓam mi miwal wal gar na, a zluwunam kirkir a mbuŋ naŋ, asi ko wa gar, da naŋ muwuɗ le na, a kiɗa vagay, ko wa gar, da naŋ muwuɗ le na, a pula ti siifa, ko wa gar, da naŋ muwuɗ le na, a gaŋ ɗongor, ko wa gar, da naŋ muwuɗ le na, a maŋ nga ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe nder ummaatooje e asli e ɗemɗe fuu kuli mo, ndiwni yeeso maako ngam daliila maŋngu ngu o hokki mo. Mo o yiɗno mbarugo, o mbari. Mo o yiɗno hisnugo yoŋki mum, o hisni. Mo o yiɗno ɓaŋgtugo, o ɓaŋgti, mo o yiɗno leestingo boo, o leestini.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe nder ummaatooje e asli e ɗemɗe fuu kuli mo, ndiwni yeeso maako ngam daliila maŋngu ngu o hokki mo. Mo o yiɗno mbarugo, o mbari. Mo o yiɗno hisnugo yoŋki mum, o hisni. Mo o yiɗno ɓaŋgtugo, o ɓaŋgti, mo o yiɗno leestingo boo, o leestini.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧‘i dee so ha̧ o dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mɛ yu a̧. A̧ gbɛ so bíí hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga; ɓɛɛ a̧ ee o wi n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. A̧ ha̧ so gasi ha̧ o wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ foo o ŋma si ɗɔɔ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧‘i dee so ha̧ o dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mɛ yu a̧. A̧ gbɛ so bíí hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga; ɓɛɛ a̧ ee o wi n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. A̧ ha̧ so gasi ha̧ o wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ foo o ŋma si ɗɔɔ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tewəmbəreke kwele nya ndeke nda Shala ne, nahe pɛtɛa hɛɗi, pɛtɛa hwelefefi ba'a pɛtɛa ghena kese kabare bare va ghazlənə kwa kema ta ŋkɛ. Kapesle wəndə nya ɗe ŋkɛ ŋkɛ ba'a kasərə wəndə nya ɗe ŋkɛ ŋkɛ teghweme. Kave zləvə ŋkɛ te wəndə nya ɗe ŋkɛ ba'a kashifə wəndə nya ɗe ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Wer kluu maga aà hay haçn ne hen mono, jar wo äuy, wer jar wo äuy, jar ma ti jag ma honla äuy hay wo joñ heçeçne äe, hay wo daëge do äe. Wañ hay go id jar maga se hay da ga se id ra go mono, hay men jar maga se hay da ga se men ra tenen wo tenene. AÀ hay haç kluu ne jar maga se da kol rage go kluuri mono, day hay fer jar maga se da fer rage go gesiñ go gesiñ.

Francais: Mais il devint orgueilleux et plein d’arrogance ; alors il fut renversé de son trône royal et privé de sa gloire.
Anglais: But when his heart was lifted up and his spirit became so proud that he behaved arrogantly, he was deposed from his royal throne and his glory was taken away from him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May hay li ma dikamu sli ya' kulo'o, ŋusta valamu so'otiya, jigal tuwa'a kaw, nam zutis gaa'a hay zlamda-mulda valam pa, nisi yaw gajijita valam goy kalamu.
Bulu: Vʼa nga suʼulane bo mebun, njalan a nkobô ébiasé; ajô te Zambe a nga vaa nye éto njôane jé, a vaa nye duma.
Guiziga: Joˀ a huhum, hirnga naŋ a tiri gidaŋ haɗa. Dar a putukusokoŋ tir janga naŋ ngi buyo, a tiɓaka dudok naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓernde maako mawniti, saati haa o laati elewɗo. Ngam maajum Allah jippini mo diga leeso laamu maako, tedduŋgal maako ɓortaama.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓernde maako mawniti, saati haa o laati elewɗo. Ngam maajum Allah jippini mo diga leeso laamu maako, tedduŋgal maako ɓortaama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧naŋ gasa zu-a, nɛ see-aa ŋgaia gan zu a, wa gboo a̧ yinɛ tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-a kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧naŋ gasa zu-a, nɛ see-aa ŋgaia gan zu a, wa gboo a̧ yinɛ tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-a kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa zhɛrenyɛ kande kele ghə ba'a kande ntɛaŋentɛa ghə. Tagha gɛ, tseɗake ŋkɛ kelemte geva sawa te meghe ba'a rayɛ ŋkɛ zamte zləvəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ama de maga aà hay ma' jag jiili äe day ëig ëiggi ma kee see äe mono, aè raw srogge äe go ti paale wañ äe no day aè äo' fo äe go.

Francais: Il fut chassé d’entre les humains et réduit à vivre comme les bêtes : il eut sa demeure parmi les ânes sauvages, se nourrit d’herbe comme les bœufs, et son corps fut trempé par la rosée. Cela dura jusqu’au jour où il reconnut que le Dieu très-haut est le maître de toute royauté humaine et qu’il y élève qui il veut.
Anglais: He was also driven from mankind, and his mind was made like that of an animal, and his dwelling place was with the wild donkeys. He was given grass to eat like cattle, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven until he came to know [without any doubt] that the Most High God rules over the kingdom of mankind and He appoints it to whomever He wills.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan digiɗis goy jar sumun pa, dikamu muɗi ki dikga vi muura nala, liy ma musta valamu muɗi jar kurona ma fulla, nam muɗi ti hatna ki luwayn nala, tuwam ŋuruɓiya kuɗ maɗayn ma dukalawna kaw, ta-ta nam wi ala Lawn ma Kulo-Jamna, ti mul kay sum sa hay nagat kaf, nam as mus san hay mulda ki nam min nala kaw.
Bulu: Be nga titane nye vôme bôt be too a bo nye na a nyiñ ane betit; ba be bijakase ya fé be nga tabe vôme wua, a jaʼa bilok ane benyak, mfô a botéʼé nye nyô. A nga tabe nalé a kui môs a nga yeme na Zambe a dañ ôyabe yôp a ne Njôô ya bejô bôt a a telé môt émien a kômbô na a bo njô bôt.
Guiziga: A ɓulakaŋ ti wuzla mizli avra, wuluk naŋ a tiri kaɓa wuluk ngi gwat misahmihey, a cifi ti hay naŋ ati zungu ngi ɓuhoy. A zum giziŋ kaɓa sla, yo a ndir yorororo ar wulngar. A gi kanah hã ti naŋ misa sina, Buymisemuŋ Mimadiɗa miwãˀa, i madiɗa ar zumabuy ngi mizli titirahay, yo mbur naŋ muwuɗ le gar na, a cifi di buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O riiwaama diga caka yimɓe, ɓernde maako warti bana nde ndabbaawa. O wuurdi bee bamɗe ladde, o nyaami huɗo bana na'i, saawawre soofni ɓanndu maako. Nden o annditi no Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo mari baawɗe dow laamu yimɓe, o laaminan mo o yiɗi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: O riiwaama diga caka yimɓe, ɓernde maako warti bana nde ndabbaawa. O wuurdi bee bamɗe ladde, o nyaami huɗo bana na'i, saawawre soofni ɓanndu maako. Nden o annditi no Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo mari baawɗe dow laamu yimɓe, o laaminan mo o yiɗi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa foo a̧ yinɛ mgbara bíí. Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kifa duk hee ko saɗi ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk kpɔk in o tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ. A̧ nyɔŋ so nɛ zɔ̧ hee ndai ga, ɓɛɛ dɔmbɔrɔ do tɛ-a hɔ wese n'aa iŋa nɛnɛ‘e, mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔɔ-wan ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧ a̧ a̧ ba e tɛ wan.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa foo a̧ yinɛ mgbara bíí. Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kifa duk hee ko saɗi ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk kpɔk in o tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ. A̧ nyɔŋ so nɛ zɔ̧ hee ndai ga, ɓɛɛ dɔmbɔrɔ do tɛ-a hɔ wese n'aa iŋa nɛnɛ‘e, mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔɔ-wan ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧ a̧ a̧ ba e tɛ wan.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋkwase ŋkɛ ŋkamte geva shave hwa mbeli, pa zhɛrenyɛ kala wəshi keseɗa. Pa ŋkɛ nzanyɛ hwa kwara lɛmə gamba, ntake ŋkɛ kazeme gwəzə kala sla ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kese bətə mbe mɛnɛ, hwa'a te və nya ɗepete ŋkɛ Shala tehwə ghweme ya kande sleke mbeli pɛtɛ ba'a kave nda meghe ŋkɛ ke wəndə nya ɗe ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ raw niigi äe go yoo jar tabay wo, ëiggi äe kol go do ëiggi nayre wo nono day ngeel naw äen kol wo go yoo gerheçeçre ma yooway wo. AÀ hay haçge ne hen ma reege diñ fi do dere wo nono, meebe tañ see äe go haçaç se wo koge ëa so ga Baa ma ciñ haçaçn de waçaç ree wañ ma honla äuy ti holañ jar tabay wo la, day se hay wosela maga äil äe dan ti wañ.

Francais: Toi Baltazar, son fils, tu savais fort bien tout cela, et pourtant tu n’as pas adopté une attitude plus humble.
Anglais: And you, his  son, O Belshazzar, have not humbled your heart (mind), even though you knew all this.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May naŋu, Belsasar, goora valamu, naŋ wi kayni hiɗi iraŋ kaf, nir na'ta kep naŋ min hot yaŋ gaa'aɗi.
Bulu: Wo, Beltsazar, mone wé, wo ô too ô tukaʼa yeme mam mete mese, ve da na ô nji sili womiene si.
Guiziga: Naka, mangal naŋ Baltazara, ki si na gwat tayna le gar ngbaŋ, ko ki hin hirnga ta na si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa an, Belsaccar ɓiyiiko, a leestinaay hoore ma, koo nde a anndi ɗum fuu boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa an, Belsaccar ɓiyiiko, a leestinaay hoore ma, koo nde a anndi ɗum fuu boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, Baltazar, bem ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, mɛ́ mɔ́k see-mɛ si ɗɔɔ tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mɛ iŋa so'i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, Baltazar, bem ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, mɛ́ mɔ́k see-mɛ si ɗɔɔ tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mɛ iŋa so'i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma gha Baltazar, wəzege ta ŋkɛ ne, kese na kashifə ghəa ŋa, ya gha ɗepete wəshia shɛhɛ megela we.
Tupurri: Day ndo Belsatsar weel äen, ndo fer ti see äo gesiñ gaè. Ba mbe de maga ndo go de ko ree sen mo äuy,

Francais: Tu as défié le Dieu du ciel lorsque tu as fait apporter les coupes sacrées venant de son temple, et que vous vous en êtes servis pour boire du vin, toi, tes hauts fonctionnaires, tes femmes et tes épouses de second rang. De plus tu as chanté les louanges des dieux d’argent et d’or, de bronze et de fer, de bois et de pierre, des dieux qui ne voient rien, n’entendent rien et ne savent rien ; et tu as refusé de rendre gloire au Dieu qui tient dans sa main ta vie présente et ta destinée.
Anglais: And you have exalted yourself against the Lord of heaven, and the vessels of His house have been brought before you, and you and your nobles, your wives and your concubines have been drinking wine from them; and you have praised the gods of silver and gold, of bronze, iron, wood and stone, which do not see or hear or understand. But the God who holds in His hand your breath of life and your ways you have not honored  and  glorified [but have dishonored and defied].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May naŋ sli yaŋ kulo'o kat Ma-Vatɗina ma hay wuralawna, tasana ma yawamay goy hay ziyna vi Lawna pana naŋ hinsi maram vokaŋu, nigi ci vinnawa hayamu, naŋu hiɗi sa ŋulona vaŋu, boyna vaŋu hiɗi boy sa sunda vaŋu, naŋ subur lawayna ma doorona, ma ora, ma wayna, ma kawayna, ma guna, ma hiɗiyna kaw ma as ɗuwɗi, ma as humɗi, ma wida valam mayɗi. May Lawna ma sukka vaŋu hiɗi zewaŋ hay ɓalamna naŋ min slum yalam kuloɗi.
Bulu: O soñeya Zambe ya yôp éyoñ wo te loone bilaé bi nʼétyi bia so nda jé, a mbie mia te belane bie asu ya nyu bilam, womien, biwôlô bebo bisaé biôé, binga bôé a bibone biôé. Jam afe na wo te lomé bia bezambe be silba a or, mvot a étyé, bilé a mekok , bezambe be ne te yene jôm, te wôʼô jam, te yeme jôm; a wo te bene ve Zambe a bili ényiñe jôé a asuʼulane dôé e wo wé été duma.
Guiziga: Ki slikiɗ ngi zlira didak ati Buymuŋ, gazlanga ngir hay naŋ na, a hiloko taŋ nga mbuŋ ɗiki. Joˀ ka ati mizli hirnga ɗikey waɗ mangasl ɗikey, ati ngwas migi slra ɗikeye, kisam mbaazla ti taŋ. Ki hunum kuli mipa taŋ ti ɓiri bara, ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ti ɓiri gaza, ti ɓiri ho gar, miciɗa ngi dum, waɗ ngi ɗugur. Taŋ anta puram ta, a cinam ta, a sinam gwat ta. Amma Buymisemuŋ misi siifa ɗik asi haŋ naŋ, yo misi gwat ngi gi ɗikeye cek asi haŋ naŋ na, ki hunumaŋ ta jaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A mawniti dow Jawmiraawo mo asama. Ɓe ngaddani ma njardukoy koy a hooci diga haykaliiru maako. An e mawɓe ma e rewɓe ma e sulaaɓe ma, on njardi inaboojam bee maakoy, on maŋgti labbi kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri e leggal e hayre, ɗi ngi'ataa, ɗi nanataa, ɗi anndaa koo ɗume. Ammaa a teddinaay Allah jogiiɗo yoŋki ma e laabi ma fuu haa juŋngo muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: A mawniti dow Jawmiraawo mo asama. Ɓe ngaddani ma njardukoy koy a hooci diga haykaliiru maako. An e mawɓe ma e rewɓe ma e sulaaɓe ma, on njardi inaboojam bee maakoy, on maŋgti labbi kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri e leggal e hayre, ɗi ngi'ataa, ɗi nanataa, ɗi anndaa koo ɗume. Ammaa a teddinaay Allah jogiiɗo yoŋki ma e laabi ma fuu haa juŋngo muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN mɛ yiwese. Mɛ kaia o nyɛk kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ a ti mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ-mɛ, gasi nɛ nin o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi, te in ta nɛ zɔk mɔ na, zii mɔ na, in nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ mɛ́ gásí Sɔ̧ nɛ kasi  ɔmi  in o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ‘i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN mɛ yiwese. Mɛ kaia o nyɛk kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ a ti mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ-mɛ, gasi nɛ nin o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi, te in ta nɛ zɔk mɔ na, zii mɔ na, in nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ mɛ́ gásí Sɔ̧ nɛ kasi  ɔmi  in o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ‘i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kese kavereslə le Shala nya pelɛ ghweme, te və nya fəke wəshi kesa wəshi nyi kese mbe ghɛa Shala na. Nahe yɛ kese kasa tɛ kwa hɛ, gha, mbelia jama yitea gha, ka meghwateshia ŋa ba'a kweci mia ŋa. Nahe na ketsahekɛ yɛ shala mze kwa tɛawetɛa, mze kwa tere tere, mze kwa ghwə ghwə, lɛ, sheghwə ba'a pelɛ, shala nyi keɗema kanakɛ ŋkwa, kafa ghena keɗema nyi keɗepema wəshi. Nahe na kesema kave zləvə te Shala nya nza mpia ŋa ba'a pɛtɛa dzeghwa ta ŋa mbe dzeve ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: ndo raw yiñ pel de Wañkluu ma ciñ no. Ndo kal hoo kobre ma äi tiñ äen wo le go pel äo, day nday de jar kluuri joñre äon wo, de naare äo wo de ndere äon wo, nday joo yii go äil äaara. Ndo kal togoë baa boo solayn wo, baa boo biñnin wo, baa boo dobn wo, baa boon wo, baa koon wo, baa huuli maga bay wo ko nen wa, bay wo laa sug wa, bay wo ko mopo wa wo. Ndo togoë Baa maga tenen äon wo de faage äon wo äuy nen do äe mo gaè.

Francais: Alors Dieu a envoyé une main tracer cette inscription.
Anglais: Then the hand was sent from the presence [of the Most High God], and this inscription was written:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ na'ta kayni nam gi cita-ɓalamiya kay ɓir ɗot kayni.
Bulu: Ajô te Zambe a te lôme akule wo e tili ntilane wu.
Guiziga: Dar Buymisemuŋ kwana, a slino haŋ misa toho gwat hana na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum o neli juŋngo ngo'o, ngo winnda bolle ɗe'e.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum o neli juŋngo ngo'o, ngo winnda bolle ɗe'e.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧‘i a̧ toma er nɛ yɔra mɔ'ɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧‘i a̧ toma er nɛ yɔra mɔ'ɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Vatse ghweneke dzeve Shala kezha rafe wəshi nyi.
Tupurri: Diñ wersen so, se raw äo' jag dosen le krig yerge sen mono.

Francais: Voici ce qui est écrit : MENÉ, MENÉ, TEKEL et PARSIN.
Anglais: “This is the  inscription that was written, ‘ mene ,  mene ,  tekel ,  upharsin  [numbered, numbered, weighed, and divided].’
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dot tani ɗoy ala: Mene, mene, tekel hiɗi Parsin.
Bulu: Jam e ne ntilan nde di: Mené Mené, Tekel u Parsin.
Guiziga: Gwat mutohoko n'ani: MENE, MENE, TEKEL, U-PARSIŊ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko winnda: Mene, mene, tekel e parsiin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko winnda: Mene, mene, tekel e parsiin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Tɔra-a nɛ: MƐNE, MƐNE, TƐKƐL in PARSIN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Tɔra-a nɛ: MƐNE, MƐNE, TƐKƐL in PARSIN.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi wəshi nyi kerafete geva nyi: MENƐ, MENƐ, TEKƐL ba'a PARSIN.
Tupurri: Yerge maga aà krign gano: Mene, mene, Tekel Ufarsin.

Francais: Et en voici le sens : MENÉ signifie compté  : Dieu a fait les comptes au sujet de ton règne, et il y met fin ;
Anglais: This is the interpretation of the message: ‘ mene ’—God has numbered the days of your kingdom and put an end to it;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dit cani min ɗek ala: Mene: Lawn ŋa buura vi mulda vaŋawa, nam daba' ya'awa,
Bulu: Atinan e ne na: Mené a tinane na nlañan: Zambe a maneya lañ njôane wôé tañ a kui wô nné.
Guiziga: Mbiɗeˀvra naŋ: MENE, a mbiɗiavra ‹Muslufa.› Buymisemuŋ a sufa hin ngi zumabuy ɗike le, yo a tiɓa zuma buyo le avu ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa boo fassaruuye man: Mene yiɗi wi'go limgal, waato Allah limi balɗe laamu ma, timmini ɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa boo fassaruuye man: Mene yiɗi wi'go limgal, waato Allah limi balɗe laamu ma, timmini ɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: MƐNE nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi tɔra›; wen Sɔ̧ tɔra pɛ-wan kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ kaɗa kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: MƐNE nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi tɔra›; wen Sɔ̧ tɔra pɛ-wan kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ kaɗa kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ghena nya mbe nya: MENƐ, geze ta ŋkɛ, “keɓela ɓela”: nahe Shala keɓelate yɛ hɛa ŋa mbe meghe ba'a nahe ŋkɛ ketarete kiɗi ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ naage wer waçaçre sen wo: Mene na ga Baa kee joñge wañ äo no day se ndo' ti äe go.

Francais: TEKEL signifie pesé  : tu as été pesé sur une balance, et l’on a jugé que tu ne fais pas le poids ;
Anglais: ‘ tekel ’—you have been weighed on the scales [of righteousness] and found deficient;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: tekel: Naŋ tuni kay va ma ŋa nekŋa, naŋ hefteŋe,
Bulu: Tekel a tinane na: Mveʼan, be maneya veʼe wo kop a yene na ô nji bo adit;
Guiziga: TEKEL a mbiɗiavra ‹Miwa le ti kilo.› Ka i miwa le ti kilo, keɗ na, ki ndila ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tekel yiɗi wi'go poondol, waato o foondi ma dow awnorɗum, o tawi teddeeŋga ma he'aay.
Fulfulde_DC: Tekel yiɗi wi'go poondol, waato o foondi ma dow awnorɗum, o tawi teddeeŋga ma he'aay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: TƐKƐL nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi wea›; wen a̧ baa mɛ e zu mɔɔ-we-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ diti na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: TƐKƐL nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi wea›; wen a̧ baa mɛ e zu mɔɔ-we-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ diti na.
Kapsiki_DC: TEKƐL, geze ta ŋkɛ, “kedzeghe dzeghe”: nahe na kedzeghete geva te kiləwə ba'a nahe na kesləyi geva dewə.
Tupurri: Tekel na ga aè lam poçoçre äo ti klew day aè da' ndo go gofoñ.

Francais: PERÈS signifie divisé  : ton royaume a été divisé pour être donné aux Mèdes et aux Perses . »
Anglais: ‘ peres ’— your kingdom has been divided and given over to the Medes and  Persians.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Parsin: Mulda vaŋu ɓuraway goyo, vulis goy mi sa Medena hiɗi sa Persena.
Bulu: Perés a tinane na: Nkaban, njôane wôé ô ntoo nsalane zañ, asu ya veban e be beméde a Bepers.
Guiziga: PERES a mbiɗiavra ‹Muwuɗuka le.› Zuma buy ɗike, i muwuɗka le, a vulaka cah da Medihey, cah numuŋ kwana, da Persehey.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Parsiin  yiɗi wi'go cenndi, waato o senndi laamu ma, o hokki ngu Medi'en e Perezzi'en.”
Fulfulde_DC: Parsiin  yiɗi wi'go cenndi, waato o senndi laamu ma, o hokki ngu Medi'en e Perezzi'en.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: PƐRƐS mɛ nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi kɛ̧a̧›; wen wan kɔ-mɛ kɛ̧a̧ ha̧ o be Mɛdɛ in o be Pɛrsɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: PƐRƐS mɛ nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi kɛ̧a̧›; wen wan kɔ-mɛ kɛ̧a̧ ha̧ o be Mɛdɛ in o be Pɛrsɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: PERƐS, geze ta ŋkɛ, “kenehe nehe”: nahe meghea ŋa keneheve geva ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kendeke nda geva ke ka Mɛde ba'a ka Pɛrse.»
Tupurri: Ufarsin na ga aè caa ge äil sir wañ äon go day aè haçn ge go ne jar Mede wo de jar Perse wo.

Francais: Aussitôt, Baltazar ordonna à ses serviteurs de revêtir Daniel d’habits d’apparat et de lui passer un collier d’or autour du cou. Il fit aussi proclamer que Daniel devenait un des principaux ministres du royaume .
Anglais: Then Belshazzar gave the command, and Daniel was clothed with purple and a chain of gold was put around his neck, and a proclamation concerning him was issued [declaring] that he now had authority as the third  ruler  in the kingdom.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulini wulini Belsasar vul hagata kay cuk sligar purpella tam Daniel, gum jaɓ ma ora kelemu, siwel goy ala nam ma mus mi ma mul-ɦidina hay mulda valamu.
Bulu: Awolo te ebien, nde Beltsazar a nga jô bebo bisaé bé na be jalé Daniel mengômesan melitan a jalé nye nsanga or e tyiñ . A nga bo fe foé é katebane na, Daniel a ntoo wua ya betebʼôsu yʼéjôé be tele ôsu.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Baltazar a ɓa mizli, a kaka zana hirnga da Daniyele, a luwakaŋ virzle ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl asi ˀaya, yo a ɓa taŋ ɓa a tilam mi ti ɓi ngi Daniyel masa cifi madiɗa migi slra ar zuma buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Belsaccar umri ɓornugo Daniyel bee limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe e koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande mum. Nden o neli wooynugo: “Daniyel laati tataɓo nder laamu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Belsaccar umri ɓornugo Daniyel bee limce boɗeeje ɗigguɗe e koɗel kaŋŋeeri haa daande mum. Nden o neli wooynugo: “Daniyel laati tataɓo nder laamu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Baltazar ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ pi̧ de laa-wan tɛ Daniɛl in kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ e a̧ mɛ duk nɛ taar gasawi mgbara o dɔka-a tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Baltazar ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ pi̧ de laa-wan tɛ Daniɛl in kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ e a̧ mɛ duk nɛ taar gasawi mgbara o dɔka-a tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa Baltazar gezete kezha seɗe nda karalame mbeli ke Daniyɛl ba'a kezha seɗe nda livə mze kwa tere tere mbeli kwa welɛ. Pa ŋkɛ zlapete kezha nza Daniyɛl hwa ka mene slene nyi jama jama mbe hɛɗia meghe.
Tupurri: Do ni tu Belsatsar raw riñgi ga aè mo hee oçoçbe ma de seçeç burbur ne Danyel ti, ga hee redew boo biñni ne hen soole, ga aè mo 'waa äay go äuy ne jar ga aà joñ ge je kluu ma de swa' ti sir wañ no.

Francais: Au cours de la nuit suivante, Baltazar, roi de Babylone, fut tué
Anglais: During that same  night Belshazzar the [last] Chaldean king was slain [by troops of the  invading army].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay henjet na'ta kayni Belsasar mulla vi Kaldeena fi cita-goyta.
Bulu: Alu e nga tôñe valé, Beltsazar, njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga wôéban.
Guiziga: Kalla ngi hiikuɗ naŋ vuna si na, a kiɗaka Baltazara Buy Babiloŋ vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jemmaare man Belsaccar, laamiiɗo Kaldiya'en mbaraama.
Fulfulde_DC: Jemmaare man Belsaccar, laamiiɗo Kaldiya'en mbaraama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kale zaŋzɛ‘i, wa gbɛɛ Baltazar wannu ko o be Kaldee.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kale zaŋzɛ‘i, wa gbɛɛ Baltazar wannu ko o be Kaldee.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe viɗia shɛ ne, pa mbeli peslekɛ Baltazar, meghe nya mbe Babilone.
Tupurri: De suñ ni tu aè 'war Belsatsar wañ jar Kalden wo go.

Francais: Le banquet du roi Baltazar
Anglais: Belshazzar’s Feast
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yuldeta vi Belsasar, ni-gaata vi mulda vi Babilon
Bulu: E beta dina Baltazar
Guiziga: Buy Baltazar migi muguzlum madiɗa
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Binndi dow mahdi laamiiɗo Belsaccar
Fulfulde_DC: Binndi dow mahdi laamiiɗo Belsaccar
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbaŋa ko wannu Baltazar
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbaŋa ko wannu Baltazar
Kapsiki_DC: Gajamendə ta meghe Baltazar
Tupurri: Few ma kluu mani Belsatsar no

Francais: Daniel interprète l’inscription mystérieuse
Anglais: Daniel Interprets Handwriting on the Wall
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Bulu: Daniel a ve atinane ya ntilan
Guiziga: Daniyel miɓa mbiɗeˀvra ngi gwat mutoho mufuna wuluk ngi mbur
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daniyel fassitiri binndol dow mahdi
Fulfulde_DC: Daniyel fassitiri binndol dow mahdi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl tɔra mɔ nɛ yɔra
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl tɔra mɔ nɛ yɔra
Kapsiki_DC: Daniyɛl kancɛ ghena nya mbe rafe
Tupurri: Danyel naa wer yergen go ne Belsatsare

Francais: et Darius, le Mède , accéda à la royauté, à l’âge de soixante-deux ans.
Anglais: It seemed good to Darius [who became king after Belshazzar] to appoint over the kingdom 120  satraps who would be in charge throughout the kingdom,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dariyus ma Medena sli mulda. Busata valamu hay na'ta ay dok-karkiya yam ma'.
Bulu: A Darius, mone Méde a nga bet éjôé a too mimbu mewôm mesaman a mibaé.
Guiziga: Dariyus mbur Medi a ci buyo, naɓa naŋ ti vi kukur merkeɗ ngaˀ cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dariyus Mediijo heɓi laamu. Duuɓi maako cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi, saa'i o laamo.
Fulfulde_DC: Dariyus Mediijo heɓi laamu. Duuɓi maako cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi, saa'i o laamo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Darius be Mɛdɛ baa wan ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗɔŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiito.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Darius be Mɛdɛ baa wan ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗɔŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiito.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Dariyəs, nde Mɛde dzete meghe, vəa ŋkwa nya nza ta ŋkɛ ŋkwaŋemsə bakeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Dariyus je Meden da' wañ de maga kiñgi äe doo hiira' ti äog mono.

Francais: Darius décida de créer cent vingt postes de satrapes afin de placer dans tout l’empire des hommes qui représentent son autorité .
Anglais: and over them three chief commissioners (of whom Daniel was one), that these satraps might be accountable to them, so that the king would have no loss [from disloyalty or mismanagement].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Van kir Dariyus ŋaa'a kay tun sa ŋarmanna valamu kis kalam dok-ma' goy hay nagata valam kafe.
Bulu: Darius a nga yene mvaé ya telé bengovina ya bifase bijôé tañe ntet a mewôm mebaé be jôô señe jé e mevôm mese yʼéjôé jé.
Guiziga: Dariyus a wuluk ɓa a ci madiɗa ngi mizli micawwahay skat ti kukur cuw, ɓa a tislaka li zuma buyo tisl wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum fottani Dariyus o jo'ina lawan'en teemerre e noogas (120) dow laamu maako fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum fottani Dariyus o jo'ina lawan'en teemerre e noogas (120) dow laamu maako fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Darius zɔka'e ɔ dee ha'i mɛ hok o wi-duk-zu-nu gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo mɛ ɔ wan in wii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Darius zɔka'e ɔ dee ha'i mɛ hok o wi-duk-zu-nu gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo mɛ ɔ wan in wii.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Dariyəs tarete kezha nta mbelia jama gwəmsə ba'a bakemsə kezha sleke pɛtɛa hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Dariyus raw koge nen äe de el ga se lag Satrap  wo ti sir wañ äen kis ti äe do äog go ti sirn äuy.

Francais: Il nomma à leur tête trois surintendants à qui les satrapes devraient rendre compte de leur administration, de telle manière que personne ne puisse nuire aux intérêts du roi. Daniel était l’un des surintendants ;
Anglais: Then this Daniel, because of the extraordinary spirit within him, began distinguishing himself among the commissioners and the satraps, and the king planned to appoint him over the entire realm.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam tun sa ŋulon kisi ɦidi, Daniel ay jar sa ɦidina kay sa ŋarmanna as ŋa slen goy voksiya, a slena vi mulla ma baɗi.
Bulu: A nga telé fe beta bivete bilaa, bengovina ntet a mewôm mebaé be mbe éjôé jabe si. Ajô te môt éziñ a nji fe bo nguleya ndeñele jam da fombô mfi njô bôt. Daniel a mbe wua ya beta bejôô bete belaa.
Guiziga: A cifi madiɗa ngi slrahay makir ma, Daniyele naŋ a wuzla taŋ. A ca taŋ ɓa mizli micawwahay a slufaka taŋ ɓi ngi gwat macuh ar zumabuy taŋhaya, ɓa ko gwat a zuma hirnga da buyoyo ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o suɓi ardiiɓe tato, Daniyel woni gooto maɓɓe. Lawan'en ɗon kuuwa les ardaaŋgal maɓɓe, ngam taa laamiiɗo waɗa asar.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o suɓi ardiiɓe tato, Daniyel woni gooto maɓɓe. Lawan'en ɗon kuuwa les ardaaŋgal maɓɓe, ngam taa laamiiɗo waɗa asar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee gasawi taar zu wa, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa. O wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i tɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yak tɛ nu kɔ-wa ha̧ o gasawi nɔ‘i taar'i, wen ká ŋma mɔ tɛ́ɛ̀ sakali wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee gasawi taar zu wa, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa. O wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i tɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yak tɛ nu kɔ-wa ha̧ o gasawi nɔ‘i taar'i, wen ká ŋma mɔ tɛ́ɛ̀ sakali wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ nteyi mbeli nyi te ghə mahekene te ghəa nci. Ma kezha ɗema kabeze nda ghena ke meghe ne, kategeze nda dzeghwa ta slene mbe sla ta hɛɗia nci mbelia jama shɛhɛ ke hɛ. Nahe Daniyɛl kenza hwa mbeli nyi te ghəa shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: Se raw lag wañre wo  pel äaara swa' nen maga Satrap mo fer wo waçaçre ti joñre äaaran wo ne hara day ree po mo caa wañ wa hase. Danyel hay yoo wañre se swa'n wo no.

Francais: il surpassait les deux autres et tous les satrapes par ses capacités exceptionnelles, si bien que le roi avait l’intention de lui confier une responsabilité relative à l’empire tout entier.
Anglais: Then the [other two] commissioners and the satraps began trying to find a reason to bring a complaint against Daniel concerning the [administration of the] kingdom; but they could find no reason for an accusation or  evidence of  corruption, because he was faithful [a man of high moral character and personal integrity], and no negligence or corruption [of any kind] was found in him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Daniel kayni suw sa ŋulona hiɗi sa ŋarmanna kafe, kay ŋusta ta suw segena ka hayamu, mulla varay kay tunum ŋol kay nagata valam kafe.
Bulu: Daniel a mbe a dañe beta bivete bivoʼo bibaé a bengovina, amu a mbe a yeme abui mam, jame te e nga tindi njô bôte na a ve nye ésaé ja fombô ngum éjôé ôse.
Guiziga: Na ma na, Daniyel tuwa, a funa madiɗa migi slrahay micuw numuŋhoy ati mizli micawwahaya le, asi naŋ ti lesl haɗa, dar buy a wuluk ɓa a cufaŋ, i madiɗaŋ ar zuma buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder kuugal man Daniyel ɓuri ardiiɓe e lawan'en woɗɓe, ngam o woodi ruuhu kayɗiniiŋgu. Ngam man laamiiɗo annini ardingo mo dow laamu muuɗum fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder kuugal man Daniyel ɓuri ardiiɓe e lawan'en woɗɓe, ngam o woodi ruuhu kayɗiniiŋgu. Ngam man laamiiɗo annini ardingo mo dow laamu muuɗum fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Daniɛl iŋa so mgbara mɔ nyɛmna gan oi o gasawi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i ba nɛ o wi-duk-zu-nu mbɛt, hegɔ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ e a̧ nɛ gasawi zu nu kɔ‘i lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Daniɛl iŋa so mgbara mɔ nyɛmna gan oi o gasawi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i ba nɛ o wi-duk-zu-nu mbɛt, hegɔ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ e a̧ nɛ gasawi zu nu kɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Daniyɛl kenza za ma ke kweci mbeli nyi te ghə ba'a mbelia jama, kwa nza ŋkɛ zəzə nya zlahe ya mbe. Pa meghe zəzəte kave ŋkɛ kawəndə nya te ghəa pɛtɛa hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Danyel de see äe hay de dañ wañren wo de Satrapn wo werga koge ree äe hay de dañ rage day wañ hay ëiggi ga se hayn go ciñ ti sir wañn äuy.

Francais: Alors les autres surintendants et les satrapes se mirent à chercher si Daniel avait commis des erreurs au préjudice de l’empire, mais ils ne purent trouver aucune faute ni aucun manquement, car il était parfaitement honnête : il n’y avait vraiment rien à lui reprocher.
Anglais: Then these men said, “We will not find any basis for an accusation against this Daniel unless we find something against him in connection with the law of his God.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta sa ŋulona hiɗi sa yerimana gar yali kay pi lawta kay Daniel, kay lopna vi mulda, may nisi may fi va noŋɗi, fi joo kalamɗi kaw, kay nam ɗigere, yam ma jokŋa hiɗi sle ma lum hay liyamɗina may hayam noŋɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe te beta bivete bivok a bengovina be nga jeñ nge Daniel a nga bo bikobe biziñ bi ne soo njuk e be ngum éjôé ôse, ve be nji yen ékob éziñ, nge ateʼe éziñ, amu Daniel a mbe nya zôsôô : Jame ya ve nye bijô e nji bo be nye.
Guiziga: Dar madiɗa ngi migi slrahay ati mizli micawwahay tuwa, a wulkam da a lumam zluɓ neˀ avu Daniyele ar ɓi ngi zuma buyo kwana. Amma ko a lumam zluɓ ava ta, a lumam malambaˀ ava ta, asi naŋ teŋteŋ, yo gi gwat ti sefel anta ava ta, gwat malambaˀa a lumam avaˀa ko pal ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ardiiɓe woɗɓe e lawan'en go ɗaɓɓiti daliila wullaago Daniyel ngam kuugal maako nder laamu. Ammaa ɓe tawaay aybe koo boofol haa maako, ngam o koolaaɗo, yeebaare e boofol walaa haa maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ardiiɓe woɗɓe e lawan'en go ɗaɓɓiti daliila wullaago Daniyel ngam kuugal maako nder laamu. Ammaa ɓe tawaay aybe koo boofol haa maako, ngam o koolaaɗo, yeebaare e boofol walaa haa maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ‘i, oi gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu kia yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ tom ko Daniɛl tɛ nù yinɛ; mɔ kpɔk, wa kpa ŋma be gɔɔmɔ kóó yɔɔ-kaya ha̧ wa mɛ ɗɔ a sɛnɛ na, wen a̧ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ zu a tikiɗi bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ‘i, oi gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu kia yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ tom ko Daniɛl tɛ nù yinɛ; mɔ kpɔk, wa kpa ŋma be gɔɔmɔ kóó yɔɔ-kaya ha̧ wa mɛ ɗɔ a sɛnɛ na, wen a̧ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ zu a tikiɗi bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, ntake mbeli nyi te ghə ba'a mbelia jama kazele wəsə keve nda fete ke Daniyɛl mbe slene nyi te hɛɗia meghe. Ama fete shɛ keɗema wəsə keŋele ŋkɛ shɛ kesləyi hɛ, va nya nza ŋkɛ le kaganda tsape we. Pele se keɗema fete shɛ kesləyi mbeli mbe we.
Tupurri: Mo so no wañren wo de Satrapn raw wo kië ëeñ ma caa ree ne hen see ti ree joñre maga aà hay joñge äe ti waçaçge ree sirn mono. AÀma saara laa da' fen po noga älagge po see äe gaa werga aà hay de deele day nen bay ba mopo see äe ga aà joñ de el gaa noga se de yeege ti äe wa hase.

Francais: Ces hommes se dirent donc : « Nous n’aurons aucun motif pour accuser Daniel, à moins de trouver quelque chose en relation avec la loi de son Dieu. »
Anglais: Then these commissioners and satraps agreed to approach the king and said to him, “King Darius, live forever!
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kayni di'e: Nay as fi yali kay pi lawta kay Daniel noŋɗi, la nay min vum hay lawta, nay ma garam hay gatta vi Lawna valamu.
Bulu: Ane bôte bete be nga jô bebiene na: Bia ye bo teke jame ya ve Daniel mekua, nga ve bia jeñe jam éziñ da lat a metiñe ya Zambe wé.
Guiziga: Joˀ mizli tayna tuwa a ɓam: «Ar Daniyele, ndr'anta sa lumam zluɓ ko pal ta, sey i sa lumam naŋ muzluɓ le avu ɓimujuwa ngi Buymisemuŋ naŋ sukwani.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum yimɓe man mbi'mbi'tiri: “En tawataa daliila wullaago Daniyel, sonaa nder haala diina maako.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum yimɓe man mbi'mbi'tiri: “En tawataa daliila wullaago Daniyel, sonaa nder haala diina maako.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i baa keta ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ beka kpa ŋma yɔɔ-kaya tɛ Daniɛl mɛ ba a̧ nɛ wen sɛnɛ, kà bó nɛ́ tɛ́ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i baa keta ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ beka kpa ŋma yɔɔ-kaya tɛ Daniɛl mɛ ba a̧ nɛ wen sɛnɛ, kà bó nɛ́ tɛ́ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke mbelia shɛhɛ kwelɛ ghəa nci: «Wəsə shɛ kesləyi gheɓəmə kezha ve nda fete ke Daniyɛl we, nda gheɓəmə kakemave wəsə keve nda fete mbe hawe ta ŋkɛ va wəsə mahalegəa Shala ta ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: Mo so no jar sen la day wo gano: Naa da' ge mopo me' ma kañ tew Danyel sen gaa hase, joñ we na ni se ti äañ jag liñgi mani Baa äen an laybla'a.

Francais: Sans tarder, les deux surintendants et les satrapes se rendirent chez le roi et lui dirent : « Longue vie au roi Darius !
Anglais: All the commissioners of the kingdom, the prefects and the satraps, the counselors and the governors have consulted  and  agreed together that the king should establish a  royal  statute and enforce an injunction that anyone who petitions (prays to) any god or man besides you, O king, during the next thirty days, shall be thrown into the den of lions.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda sa ŋulona hiɗi sa ŋarmanna pat ɦini-ɦini kali kat mulla, nisi di talam ala: Mulla Dariyus, musaŋ iri musge.
Bulu: Teke yange, beta bivete bite bibaé a bengovina be nga ke be njô bôt, a jô nye na: A njô bôte Darius, tabeʼe nnôm éto!
Guiziga: Joˀ mizli madiɗa ngi slra ati mizli micawwa tayna, a kilam kutum, ara lumaka buyo a ɓakaŋ: «Aw buy Dariyus! Anja ki ndir ngi sete!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ardiiɓe e lawan'en go njahdi haa laamiiɗo, mbi'i mo: “Yaa laamiiɗo Dariyus, A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama!
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ardiiɓe e lawan'en go njahdi haa laamiiɗo, mbi'i mo: “Yaa laamiiɗo Dariyus, A yeeɗa haa foroy, barkaama!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i yaka sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu Darius, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i yaka sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu Darius, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki!
Kapsiki_DC: Le dera le dera ne, cape mbeli nyi te ghəa shɛhɛ ba'a mbelia jama shɛhɛ kalə sha meghe, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Meghe Dariyəs yawe, hɛyi ŋa Shala teghweme!
Tupurri: Do kay no so no, wañre sen wo de Satrapn raw wo naage wo de ngarge jag jag debañ pel wañ day riñ wo do kay nono gano: Wañ Dariyus, hay mbo ciñ caw tum!

Francais: Les surintendants de l’empire, les préfets, les satrapes, les ministres et les gouverneurs ont tenu conseil et proposent au roi de promulguer et publier un décret impérial de la teneur suivante : “Durant une période de trente jours, quiconque adressera une prière à un dieu ou à un être humain autre que le roi lui-même devra être jeté dans la fosse aux lions.”
Anglais: Now, O king, establish the injunction and sign the document so that it may not be changed, in accordance with the law of the Medes and Persians, which [insures that it] may not be altered  or  revoked.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona hay mulda kaf, sa ŋom slena, sa vul-gatta hiɗi sa guvernera kaf min ala naŋ ma ɗo ɗerwel kep goyo, telda ma li haya' dono'o ala: Jar buur dok-ɦidi lakŋi, san gige kaw ma siɗaw Lawna valamɗi, siɗaw sa maraɗi kaw, say siɗawaŋgi mi naŋ mulla kepe, la naɗi ma gumis hay zulla vi zlona.
Bulu: Beta bivete yʼéjôé, bi bi nʼabe biwôlô, bengovina, betebʼôsu yʼéjôé, a benya bôtô yʼéjôé, ba te tabʼékôan, nde ba sili wo ô bo jame di na: O nyoñe ntyiʼan njô bôt, a mialane wô avale di na: Tañe melu mewôm mela, môt ase a ye yeʼelane zambe nge môte mfe a nji bo wo, a njô bôt, ba ye wua nye ébé bengbwegbwem.
Guiziga: Mizli madiɗa ngi slrahay gar ar zuma buyo, mizli micawwahay, miji kaway, mukuti vuhoy, waɗ miwi lihey gar a gam kus madiɗa, ɓa buy a cici ɓi ar zuma buyo, yo ɓa a ɗuv ɓi ngi tika gwatay, mitikahay, kaɓa ani: ar hin kukur makir na, ko wa gar midir dibiɗ le da kuli, malla da mbur, mbak ka buyo le na, a sa hizigakaŋ ng'ar butum ngi moboroy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Minin ardiiɓe nder laamu maaɗa fuu, lawan'en e jawro'en e ngomna'en e sarwooɓe, min narri ƴamugo ma, barkaama, a waɗa dooka, a semmbiɗina ka, wi'ugo ni'i: Nder nyalɗe cappanɗe tati garanɗe, taa goɗɗo toro huunde haa ɗowanteeɗo malla neɗɗo feere, sey haa laamiiɗo tan. Mo ɗowtanaaki dooka ka'a, o sakkinteeɗo nder lowol barooɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Minin ardiiɓe nder laamu maaɗa fuu, lawan'en e jawro'en e ngomna'en e sarwooɓe, min narri ƴamugo ma, barkaama, a waɗa dooka, a semmbiɗina ka, wi'ugo ni'i: Nder nyalɗe cappanɗe tati garanɗe, taa goɗɗo toro huunde haa ɗowanteeɗo malla neɗɗo feere, sey haa laamiiɗo tan. Mo ɗowtanaaki dooka ka'a, o sakkinteeɗo nder lowol barooɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O gasa wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu-nu, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ in o wi-duk-zu-zika-nù lɛŋ baa keta ha̧ wannu mɛ gɔn geŋa'e: tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-taar, wi nɛ beka gasi wannu na, nɛ tɛ gasi ŋma sɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, wi tɛ ba a̧ pi̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O gasa wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu-nu, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ in o wi-duk-zu-zika-nù lɛŋ baa keta ha̧ wannu mɛ gɔn geŋa'e: tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-taar, wi nɛ beka gasi wannu na, nɛ tɛ gasi ŋma sɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, wi tɛ ba a̧ pi̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mbeli nyi te ghəa hɛɗia meghe, mbeli nyi te ghəa wəshi, mbelia jama, ka ncɛ ntsehwele ba'a ka ŋgwamna kemenete tsene. Wa nya ghena nya tsahwe hɛ nya: ‹Kategeze meghe kawəsə mahalegə kezha ɗema mbeli kasəkwə kwete shala keɗema kwete wəndə keɗema gha mbe hɛ mahekenemsə. Ma yayata wəndə nya kesəkwəte kwete shala keɗema kwete wəndə ne, katenegha ŋkɛ mbeli kwa kia yɛ nivɛrə.›
Tupurri: Mo so no wañre ma äil sir wañ äon wo äuy, jar ko wer horogn wo, Satrap wo, jar bag yañn wo de jar waçaç ree progren wo äuy äo' wo jag go boñ äuy ga wañ mo äo' kefder go ti ngeel äuy ma mañ jag jar wo go äuy gano: Wosela äuy nen naw do swa' tos baa po noga je tabay po we ga bay diñ ndo wañ wa no, aè äo'n go äi tu ne mingir wo.

Francais: Que le roi promulgue donc ce décret et le signe, de telle sorte qu’il ne puisse pas être modifié, conformément à la loi des Mèdes et des Perses, qui est irrévocable. »
Anglais: So King Darius signed the document, that is, the injunction.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni mulla, ɗoŋ ɗerwelda vi telda na'ta goyo, tun seŋ gaa kuɗa'a kaw, kay sa as kus gatta na'taɗi, kuɗ gatta vi Medena hiɗi Persena ta sa as muɗa' ɗita.
Bulu: Ajô te, a njô bôt, a ntoo ve nyoñ atiñe te a sane de, nalé ba ye bo te beta tyendé de aval atiñe Beméde a Bepers e né, teke atyendé.
Guiziga: Aw buy ɗu, wurenna so na, juw ɓi ngi tika gwat waɗ haŋ ɗik taˀ ara, anja a mbiɗi takaɓa ɓimujuwa ngi Medihey ati ngi Persehey ma mbiɗi ta na ya.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Waɗ dooka ka'a, waɗ lammba ma dow maaka, barkaama, haa ka tabita fodde umrooje Medi'en e Perezzi'en, ɗe ngaylataake.”
Fulfulde_DC: Waɗ dooka ka'a, waɗ lammba ma dow maaka, barkaama, haa ka tabita fodde umrooje Medi'en e Perezzi'en, ɗe ngaylataake.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ kinii, wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n geŋa’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ e  tumbal  k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ, nɛ bíí beka kpai ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpai nɛ mɔ tɛ heembea ko o be Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ na’ɛ na ga.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ kinii, wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n geŋa’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ e  tumbal  k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ, nɛ bíí beka kpai ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpai nɛ mɔ tɛ heembea ko o be Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ na’ɛ na ga.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya gɛ meghe yawe, yɛte wəsə mahalegə nya ba'a dɛkate lamba ta ŋa te, yitea ɗema ŋkɛ kazhɛne kazhɛremte geva, kala nya ɗe wəsə mahalegəa ka Mɛde ba'a ka Pɛrse nya keɗema kazhɛremte geva.»
Tupurri: Patalam no wañ, daga ndo mo waçaç go ga aà na nono, kañ do äo go ti kefder no, nen maga aà mo hay diñ fen maga fer blam gaa has doga aà ti jag liñgi jar Mede wo de jar Perse wo ga aè älag ree ma äil kefder maga wañ kañ do go äil äe go gaa nono.

Francais: Là-dessus, le roi Darius signa le document du décret.
Anglais: Now when Daniel knew that the document was signed, he went into his house (now in his roof chamber his windows were open toward Jerusalem); he continued to get down on his knees three times a day, praying and giving thanks before his God, as he had been doing previously.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta mulla Dariyus tun selem gaa kuɗ ɗerwelda vi telda na'ta.
Bulu: Eyoñe te njô bôt Darius a nga san atiñ .
Guiziga: Ar nah na, buy Dariyus a tuh ɓi micica ngi tika gwatay, a ɗuva haŋ ara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nonnon laamiiɗo Dariyus waɗi dooka, tabitini ka bee lammba mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Nonnon laamiiɗo Dariyus waɗi dooka, tabitini ka bee lammba mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Darius kpɛka wen kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ yɔr mɔ e  tumbal  tɛ geŋa'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Darius kpɛka wen kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ yɔr mɔ e  tumbal  tɛ geŋa'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa meghe Dariyəs dɛkate lamba ta ŋkɛ te palepa ta wəsə mahalegəa shɛ.
Tupurri: Wersen mokay wañ raw kañ do go äil kefdern ma mañ jag jar go ti tosge no.

Francais: Lorsque Daniel apprit qu’un tel décret avait été signé, il regagna sa maison. A l’étage supérieur, il ouvrit les fenêtres orientées vers Jérusalem. C’est là que, trois fois par jour, il se mettait à genoux pour prier et louer son Dieu. Il le fit comme d’habitude.
Anglais: Then, by agreement, these men came [together] and found Daniel praying and making requests before his God.
