KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ yaa só nɛ́ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so mbɔrɔ oi nu'nɛ́ há̧ o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi k’ɛɛ, o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ in dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ nu’ɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ yaa só nɛ́ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so mbɔrɔ oi nu'nɛ́ há̧ o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi k’ɛɛ, o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ in dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ nu’ɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese ghen'yɛ kafa nda ghena ke ka mene slene ta ŋa nyi kaka mɛ ŋkwa nyi kese kageze nda ghena te sləa ŋa ke ka meghea kɛfia n'yɛ, mbeli nyi te ghəa n'yɛ, ka shihɛ n'yɛ ba'a mbeli pɛtɛ we.
Tupurri: Wuur hay laa jag weere joçoçre äo jar ndar nen waçaçre äo maga hay wo waçë waçaçre ti ëu äo ne wañre wuur wo de wañre wuur ma leeren wo, ne paçaçre wuur wo de jar ma äil sirn äuy wo mo gaè.

Francais: Toi, Seigneur, tu es sans faute ! Nous, nous ne pouvons que nous humilier, comme en ce jour, nous, habitants de Jérusalem, gens de Juda, et tous les autres Israélites, proches ou lointains, dispersés dans les pays où tu les as chassés à cause de leur infidélité à ton égard.
Anglais: “Righteousness belongs to You, O Lord, but to us confusion  and  open shame, as it is this day—to the men of Judah, to the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and to all Israel, those who are nearby and those who are far away, in all the countries to which You have driven them, because of the [treacherous] acts of unfaithfulness which they have committed against You.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɗigerta taŋ naŋu Bum-Sumuna, may zulota vuma numa'a, ki hay buur ma wulini nala, tam sumuna vi Yuda, tam sum sa hay Yerusalemna hiɗi sa Israyel kafe, tam nisi sa ka goboyo hiɗi sa goy gine'e, hay nagat kaf sa naŋ digiɗsi goy haya'a kuɗ bay-vida visiya, ta nisi muɗ tuwsi joo'o vokaŋ hiɗi na'ta.
Bulu: Wo Nti, ô ne te kʼékop! Jam e liʼiya bia e ne ve na bi sili biabebiene si avalʼane môse wu; nne e ne nalé mfaʼa wongan, bôte be too Yérusalém, bôte ya Yuda, a bôte bevoʼo bese yʼIsraél, ba be ne bebé a ba be nʼôyap, mmialane mesi mesi, vôm ô nga titane be asu dôé amu beyeñeyeñ bap.
Guiziga: Naka Bumbulvuŋ, ka jeŋŋe! Ndra Zudahay ati ngi Zeruzalemey, Israyeley gar, migweˀ gweˀ ati mikileŋ kileŋhey, misi asi ruwuy gar, ka muɓula taŋ asi gwat malambaˀ taŋ mugukuw di na, i roko ti mesem a hirnga ndra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Jawmiraawo, an a adiliijo, ammaa minin Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima e Isra'iila'en wonɓe nder lesɗe ɓadiiɗe e daayiiɗe fuu, min cemti hannde. A saŋkiti min ngam min zammbi ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Jawmiraawo, an a adiliijo, ammaa minin Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima e Isra'iila'en wonɓe nder lesɗe ɓadiiɗe e daayiiɗe fuu, min cemti hannde. A saŋkiti min ngam min zammbi ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ k’ɛnɛ, GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ nɛ foe a̧ gbɛ yɛ sɔsɔɔ, ɛɛ o be Juda, o bíí Jerusalɛm, o be  Israɛl  nɛ oi-zu lɛŋ: o wan nɛ a̧a̧ saŋa hɛ̧ɛ̧ in ɔ wan nɛ ɔ nyɛi̧a hɔ tɛ ge fara ge nde n’ɛnɛ ndaka so wa pɛsi si sɛnɛ, wen ŋgazu nɛ wa de so in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ k’ɛnɛ, GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ nɛ foe a̧ gbɛ yɛ sɔsɔɔ, ɛɛ o be Juda, o bíí Jerusalɛm, o be  Israɛl  nɛ oi-zu lɛŋ: o wan nɛ a̧a̧ saŋa hɛ̧ɛ̧ in ɔ wan nɛ ɔ nyɛi̧a hɔ tɛ ge fara ge nde n’ɛnɛ ndaka so wa pɛsi si sɛnɛ, wen ŋgazu nɛ wa de so in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma gha, gha Mahwətə ne, tiɗiɗi na. Ma ghen'yɛ le ŋa n'yɛ ne, hawe ya te ghen'yɛ tsetsenya, ghen'yɛ ka Zhɛrəzalɛm, ka Zhəwda ba'a pɛtɛa kweci ka Israyɛl nyi dekwede dekwede keɗema nyi cakeɗa cakeɗa, dzeyi te pɛtɛa hɛɗi nyi ŋkeyi hɛ na tewəmbəreke beze ghena nya menete ŋa hɛ.
Tupurri: Ma äo Wañkluu ndo keëede, soçoçren na diñ see wuuri. Do maga wara jar Juda wo, jar Jerusalem wo de jar Israyel wo äuy, maga wo la mañ noga wo wo go haçaç haçaç ti sir maga ndo nii ra wo go wer ndarge gog äaara maga saara kol see äaara go de ree ti pel äo de soçoçre ti wara nono.

Francais: Oui, Seigneur, honte à nous, à nos rois, nos chefs et nos ancêtres, car nous t’avons désobéi !
Anglais: O L ord , to us belong confusion  and  open shame—to our kings, to our princes, and to our fathers—because we have sinned against You.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina, zulota vi irma kayni kuma numa'a, kay muliyana vuma'a, kay yerimana vuma'a, tam sumayma'a kaw, kay numa li sulukawa kataŋu.
Bulu: Yaa a Nti, bi ne njalan a ôson, biabebien, bejô bôte bangan, bivete biangan a bimvame biangan, amu bi nga bo wo melo.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ, ndra ati buy ndrahay, yarma ndrahay, dideˀ ndrahay na, mesem a hirnga ndra, asi i gam mungra le avu ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Jawmiraawo, laamiiɓe amin e mawɓe amin e kaakiraaɓe amin, min cemti, ngam min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Jawmiraawo, laamiiɓe amin e mawɓe amin e kaakiraaɓe amin, min cemti, ngam min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, foe baa yɛ in o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi in o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ, wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, foe baa yɛ in o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi in o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ, wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahwətə yawe, hawe ya te ghen'yɛ, ka meghea kɛfia n'yɛ, mbeli nyi te ghəa n'yɛ ba'a ka shihɛ n'yɛ, va nya menete ŋa jaɗafa ghen'yɛ.
Tupurri: Manwuri, soçoçren na diñ see wuuri, diñ wañre wuurn wo, weere wañre wuurn wo de paçaçre wuurn wo wer maga wuur hay joñ älagge see äo.

Francais: Mais toi, Seigneur notre Dieu, dans ta bienveillance, tu nous pardonnes, bien que nous nous soyons révoltés contre toi.
Anglais: To the Lord our God  belong  mercy  and  lovingkindness and forgiveness, for we have rebelled against Him;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Slugota hiɗi gida ka taŋ naŋ Bum-Sumuna Lawna vuma'a, kay numa ŋelaŋ vunaŋ ŋolo.
Bulu: Ve wo, Nti, e Zambe wongan, e mvame jôé été, wo jamé bia, akôsa bo bi nga bene njôane wôé.
Guiziga: Amma Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra, i slikiɗam ɓi le avu ka, pura ndra ircece, pula mungra ndraˀahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: An Jawmiraawo Allah, a mari hinnuye e yaafuye koo to minin min tuurtani ma.
Fulfulde_DC: An Jawmiraawo Allah, a mari hinnuye e yaafuye koo to minin min tuurtani ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, zu-a nɛ oi dee ŋgazu k’ɛɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́‘i, ɛnɛ nɛ wan-de-ko in wan-e-ɗaŋmɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, zu-a nɛ oi dee ŋgazu k’ɛɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́‘i, ɛnɛ nɛ wan-de-ko in wan-e-ɗaŋmɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama gha Nde sleke ŋkwa Shala ta n'yɛ nya kezhɛ heli ne, kelemte n'yɛ fete ta n'yɛ te wənə, ya ghen'yɛ se kaka fama ŋa ghena.
Tupurri: Koge decoo wo de fuggi äil wo na see Wañkluu, Baa wuur no, gahaçyla wuur hay joñ ti grañ go see äe.

Francais: Nous ne t’avons pas écouté, lorsque tu nous ordonnais d’obéir aux lois que tu nous communiquais par tes serviteurs les prophètes.
Anglais: and we have not obeyed the voice of the L ord  our God by walking in His laws which He set before us through His servants the prophets.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Numa may hum vun Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vumaɗi, gatta valamu ta nam tun vokma'a hiɗi sa sunda valamu sa jobta numa min hum kuɗa'ɗi kaw.
Bulu: Bi nji ke wôʼô wo, éyoñ ô nga sili bia na, bi ve metiñ ô nga kalane bia a bebo bisaé bôé bekulu mejô mewôk.
Guiziga: Ti ka miɓa ndra ti balam gawla ɗik mijiviɗey, ɓa i gam kaɓa ka mudubuna ndra di na, ndr'i cunukuw mi ta Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min ɗowtanaaki ma, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, min tokkaaki umrooje ɗe ndokkuɗa min bee jaggiiɓe ma annabi'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Min ɗowtanaaki ma, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, min tokkaaki umrooje ɗe ndokkuɗa min bee jaggiiɓe ma annabi'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ usa h’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ usa h’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese ghen'yɛ kafa ghena ta ŋa, gha Shala Mahwətə ta n'yɛ kezha dzeghwa kala wəshi mahalegəa ŋa nyi kegezete n'yɛ geva laka ka mene slene ta ŋa nyi kaka mɛ ŋkwa we.
Tupurri: Wuur hay laa jag Manwuri, Baa wuurn ma seege ti jag liñgi äe maga se hay laa ra ne wuur pel nen do weere joçoçre äe jar ndar nen waçaçre ma jag äen wo mo gaè.

Francais: Le peuple d’Israël en entier a violé ta loi et s’est détourné pour ne pas écouter tes instructions. Alors, à cause de nos désobéissances, la malédiction promise dans la loi de Moïse , ton serviteur, s’est déversée sur nous.
Anglais: Yes, all Israel has transgressed Your law, even turning aside, not obeying Your voice; so the curse has been poured out on us and the oath which is written in the Law of Moses the servant of God, because we have sinned against Him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyel kaf raw gatta vaŋawa goyo, min humaŋ vunaŋɗi. Ki kayn nala be'da hiɗi slen ma yi kamna ma ka ɗoy hay gatta vi Musus sa ma sunda vi Lawna nigawa kuma'a, kay numa li sulukawa tam Lawna.
Bulu: Ayoñ Israél ese e nga tyam atiñe dôé, a yale feñ asu ya bo te vôʼôlô miñyeʼelane miôé. Ajô te, amu melo mangan, biyoʼé bi ne ntilan e metiñ me Môze, mbo ésaé wôé bi kubuya bia nyô.
Guiziga: Israyeley gar a ngilaka ɓimujuwa ɗike, yo a mbiɗam duba manja a cunukuw mi. Vurˀe nis ati hazi mutoho ar ɓimujuwa ngi gawla ɗik Moyis na, a mbiɗam le nga hirnga ndra, asi i zluɓam ɓi le avu ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isra'iila'en fuu ƴaɓɓi tawreeta ma, cali ɗowtanaago bolle ma. Min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa, ngam maajum naalooje e kunayeeje binndaaɗe nder tawreeta jaggiiɗo ma Muusa fuu ukkani min.
Fulfulde_DC: Isra'iila'en fuu ƴaɓɓi tawreeta ma, cali ɗowtanaago bolle ma. Min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa, ngam maajum naalooje e kunayeeje binndaaɗe nder tawreeta jaggiiɗo ma Muusa fuu ukkani min.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  lɛŋ gbina Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ wa a̧r bɛ̧ nɛ mboozu h’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ o fom in o bee-mɔ nɛ yɔra so zaŋ kalata Heembea ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Moisɛ mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  lɛŋ gbina Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ wa a̧r bɛ̧ nɛ mboozu h’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ o fom in o bee-mɔ nɛ yɔra so zaŋ kalata Heembea ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Moisɛ mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl kedzawanji wəmbəa wəsə mahalegəa ŋa ba'a kazhɛrete wəmbə kezha fama ghena ta ŋa. Nahe ghen'yɛ kemenete ŋa jaɗafa. Tagha gɛ, pa bezla nya kemeɗeyi geva mbe wəsə mahalegəa Moyize, nde mene slene ta ŋa, dzeghənyɛ kənəa ghen'yɛ.
Tupurri: Israyel wo äuy hay cegaë wo jag liñgi äon go, cel wo go, laa wo laa jag äo gaè. Wersen so faëge wo de ree maga Baa hay haç' go ga se kañ ra ne wuur ti day wo go yerge äil jag liñgi mani Moyis weejoçoç Baan raw wo leëge ne wuur ti, sen na wer maga wuur hay joñ älagge see Baa.

Francais: Tu as réalisé ce que tu avais annoncé au sujet de nous-mêmes et des chefs qui nous gouvernent : tu as fait venir sur nous, à Jérusalem, des malheurs tels qu’on n’en a jamais vu ailleurs dans le monde.
Anglais: And He has carried out completely His [threatening] words which He had spoken against us and against our rulers [the kings, princes, and judges] who ruled us, to bring on us a great tragedy; for under the whole heaven there has not been done anything [so dreadful] like that which [He commanded and] was done to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Slen ma nam dum kuma numa'a hiɗi sa ti mul kuma'na nam hobom vunamawa, hay li ma nan hin joo ta ŋolda nig gaa kuma'a, gaa kuɗ dukalawna pet va bay li ki van li tam Yerusalem nala tuwa.
Bulu: O tôéya e jam ô nga kat ajô dangane biabebien a bivete bia jôô bia: O kuliya be bia, e Yérusalém, minjuʼu be ngenane te yene vôme mfe émo ji.
Guiziga: Mingiɓi Buymisemuŋ miɓa zleˀe da ndra ati da buy miwi lihey muwam ndra na, a ga le wãˀ muduba. Ki so ndra ti mendere madiɗa, ko a gi ɗaˀ asi ruwuyo kaɓa magi ani a Zeruzalem na ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A hiɓɓini ko mbi'ɗa dow amin e ardiiɓe min. A ukkani min sarru saatuŋgu, ko waɗi haa Urusaliima, irin man meeɗaay haa duniyaaru fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: A hiɓɓini ko mbi'ɗa dow amin e ardiiɓe min. A ukkani min sarru saatuŋgu, ko waɗi haa Urusaliima, irin man meeɗaay haa duniyaaru fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ wen n’ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so zu yɛ in zu o gasawi nɛ yaa so zu yɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧; ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o ŋgamɔ in o ŋga zɛɛ mɛ tik zu yɛ. Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ tɛ de zaŋnu hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dee sɛn Jerusalɛm ga na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ wen n’ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so zu yɛ in zu o gasawi nɛ yaa so zu yɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧; ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o ŋgamɔ in o ŋga zɛɛ mɛ tik zu yɛ. Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ tɛ de zaŋnu hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dee sɛn Jerusalɛm ga na.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kemenete wəsə nya gezete na te ghəa n'yɛ ba'a te ghəa mbeli nyi kese kasleke n'yɛ. Nahe na keghweneke ndiremi nyi jama jama kadzeghəa ghen'yɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Wəndə shɛ kegha kanakɛ ndiremi nyi kala nyi te hɛɗi lema we.
Tupurri: AÀ raw bag jag waçaçre se maga se hay waçaçn ti wuur de wañre wuur maga hay wo waçaç ree wuur go, raw kañ ree ma kluu ne wuur ti, te ree ma kay ga caa Jerusalem joñ ti boñ ti tamsir la gaa hase.

Francais: Conformément à ce qui est écrit dans la loi de Moïse, tous ces malheurs nous sont arrivés ; et nous, Seigneur notre Dieu, nous ne t’avons pas supplié de t’apaiser, nous ne nous sommes pas détournés de nos péchés, nous n’avons pas tenu compte de ta ferme résolution.
Anglais: Just as it is written in the Law of Moses, all this tragedy has come on us. Yet we have not wholeheartedly begged for forgiveness  and  sought the favor of the L ord  our God by turning from our wickedness and paying attention to  and  placing value in Your truth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki ɗo'ay hay gatta vi Musus nala, joot kayni kaf co kuma'a; numa min tiy vok Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vumaɗi, numa min hin joota vuma goyɗi, numa min poŋ ir gasita vaŋɗi kaw.
Bulu: Aval e ne ntilan e metiñ me Môze, minjuʼu mise mi, mi kuiya be bia; ve bia, a Nti, e Zambe wongan, bi nji yeʼelane wo na ô jeʼebe, bi nji liʼi abé dangan, nge bisi ntyiʼane wôé ô ne te kʼatyendé.
Guiziga: Mendere tayna gar a gam ar ndra, kaɓa mutoho ar ɓimujuwa ngi Moyis. Amma i pulaka gwat malambaˀ ndraˀahaya ta, i jikam slimiɗ asi ɓi mikaslsla ɗike, ɓa i tuslukuw mevel da ka Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kiita ka winnda nder tawreeta Muusa fuu do'i dow amin. Ammaa koo jonta boo, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, min toraaki ma mo'ere, min tuubaay dow aybeeji amin, min kakkilanaay gooŋga ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Kiita ka winnda nder tawreeta Muusa fuu do'i dow amin. Ammaa koo jonta boo, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, min toraaki ma mo'ere, min tuubaay dow aybeeji amin, min kakkilanaay gooŋga ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tika zu yɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ɛɛ ga̧a̧ see'nɛ́, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ee dea ɗaŋmɔ duk wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zii kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tika zu yɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ɛɛ ga̧a̧ see'nɛ́, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ee dea ɗaŋmɔ duk wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zii kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kala nya kerafete geva mbe wəsə mahalegəa Moyize ne, nahe pɛtɛa ndiremia shɛhɛ kedzeghəa ghen'yɛ. Ama kese ghen'yɛ kazele gweɗakwe ŋa wənəa ŋa, gha Shala Mahwətə ta n'yɛ we, kese ghen'yɛ kazhɛre nda wəmbə ke yɛ jaɗafa ta n'yɛ we, kese ghen'yɛ kaɓela kaganda ta ŋa we.
Tupurri: Ree sen caa wuur mo äuy na do maga aà go de yerge äil jag liñgi mani Moyisn nono, day wuur laa joñ kam kam ne Manwuri, Baa wuurn gaè. Wuur laa mbuë faale ne joñre wuur ma ni nañ gaan wo gaa, wuur laa wii wer ne cwaçyn gaè.

Francais: C’est pourquoi tu n’as pas manqué de faire venir sur nous ces malheurs. En effet, Seigneur notre Dieu, tu es juste dans tout ce que tu fais, mais nous n’avons pas écouté tes instructions.
Anglais: Therefore the L ord  has kept the tragedy ready and has brought it on us, for the L ord  our God is [uncompromisingly] righteous  and  openly just in all His works which He does—He keeps His word; and we have not obeyed His voice.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay na'ta Ma-Vatɗina ŋom joot na'ta kay hina' co kuma'a; kay Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a nam ɗigere hay lop ma nam lumna kaf, may numa min humum vunamɗi.
Bulu: Ajô te nde ô nji jôʼé môs éziñ ya zuu minjuk e be bia. Yaa, a Nti, e Zambe wongan, ô ne zôsôô e jam ese wo bo été. Ve bi nji vôʼôlô miñyeʼelane miôé.
Guiziga: Vurˀe Bumbulvuŋ, ki ga ɓa mendere hana a so ng'ar ndra gbaˀa si. Asi ka Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra, ka jeŋŋe ar gwat ngi gi ɗik gar. Amma ko i cinukuw mi ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: An, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a yejjitaay haala kiita ma, a hiiti min fakat. Ngam a adiliijo nder kuuɗe ma fuu. Ammaa minin min ɗowtanaaki ma.
Fulfulde_DC: An, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a yejjitaay haala kiita ma, a hiiti min fakat. Ngam a adiliijo nder kuuɗe ma fuu. Ammaa minin min ɗowtanaaki ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ dee kana ha̧ o ŋgamɔ nɔ‘i mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ de lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ zii so wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ dee kana ha̧ o ŋgamɔ nɔ‘i mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ de lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ zii so wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Vatse se na ɗeke ɗeke kezha ve ndiremia shɛhɛ te ghen'yɛ. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ma gha Shala Mahwətə ta n'yɛ ne, tiɗiɗi na mbe wəshi nyi mene na pɛtɛ, ama kefate ŋa ghena ta ŋa ghen'yɛ we.
Tupurri: Diñ wersen ga Manwur joñ ga ree sen mo caa wuuri, werga Manwuri, Baa wuurn keëed ti joñre äen wo äuy ama wuur hay laa jag äe gaè.

Francais: « Seigneur notre Dieu, lorsque tu as fait sortir ton peuple d’Égypte grâce à ta force irrésistible, tu as acquis une renommée qui subsiste encore aujourd’hui ; mais nous, nous avons désobéi et nous sommes coupables.
Anglais: “And now, O Lord our God, who brought Your people out of the land of Egypt with a mighty hand and who made for Yourself a name, as it is today—we have sinned, we have been wicked.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni, Bum-Sumuna Lawna vuma'a, naŋ ma kal sumuna vaŋ ay goy hay nagata Egipte pa hiɗi ɓaŋ ma donona, naŋ ma li a semda vaŋu tiya ki numa ka wi vaydi nala, numa li sulukawa, numa muɗi joo'o.
Bulu: A Nti, e Zambe wongan, éyoñ ô nga vaa bôte bôé Ejipte, amu ngule jôé ja dañ, ô nga bi duma, nde e né a kui môse wu; ve bia, bi nga bo wo melo a bi bili mekua.
Guiziga: Na wurenna, Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra, ka mubo ti sukwi ɗik ti ruwuy Ezipte ti gidaŋ ɗik na, slimiɗ ɗik a zil le ti di nah, kaɓa naŋ mazil dana ani na, amma ndr'i gam mungra le, i ziriɗaka mi ɗike le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a wurtini ummaatoore ma lesdi Misra bee baawɗe ma mawɗe. Haa hannde fuu a waɗani innde ma tedduŋgal maŋngal. Gooŋga, min mbaɗi hakke, min mbaɗi kalluɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a wurtini ummaatoore ma lesdi Misra bee baawɗe ma mawɗe. Haa hannde fuu a waɗani innde ma tedduŋgal maŋngal. Gooŋga, min mbaɗi hakke, min mbaɗi kalluɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ŋga er'nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ gboo dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, de nɛnɛ ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zɔk sɔsɔɔ'ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ nɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ in o wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ŋga er'nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ gboo dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, de nɛnɛ ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zɔk sɔsɔɔ'ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ nɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ in o wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Nde sleke ŋkwa Shala ta n'yɛ yawe, ma kwa fəakave mbelia ŋa na shave mbe Ɛzhipte laka berete ta ŋa nya wəba ne, nahe zləvəa ŋa kedzemte ɓeshi nya. Ama ghen'yɛ ne, nahe ghen'yɛ kese kaka jaɗafa ba'a kaka 'yaghwa mehele.
Tupurri: Day patala mono Wañkluu, Baa wuur no, ndo maga ndo hay laa jar äon wo le go äil sir Ejipte de do äo ma de eegre debañ no, ndo maga ndo hay ra ëu see äo go doga aà wara no mono, wuur hay joñ älagge, wuur diñ jar haçaç.

Francais: Seigneur, renouvelle tes bienfaits, détourne ton ardente colère de Jérusalem, ta ville, ta montagne sacrée. A cause de nos fautes et des péchés de nos ancêtres, les nations qui nous entourent couvrent d’insultes Jérusalem et ton peuple.
Anglais: O Lord, in accordance with all Your righteous  and  just acts, please let Your anger and Your wrath turn away from Your city Jerusalem, Your holy mountain. Because of our sins and the wickedness of our fathers, Jerusalem and Your people  have become  an object of scorn  and  a contemptuous byword to all who are around us.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum-Sumuna, kuɗ lopna vaŋu ma ɗigera kaf, hin ɦiyda vaŋu hiɗi roŋŋa vaŋu raw goy tam hoyok-ziyna vaŋu Yerusalem, tam hiɗiyta vaŋu ta peldetta; kay kuɗ sulukŋa vuma'a hiɗi sulukŋa vi sumayma'a, Yerusalem hiɗi sumuna vaŋ kaf muɗi zulo'o vok ir sum sa ka ŋuymana.
Bulu: A Nti, betaʼa vumelan mbamba mimboone miôé, tame vaa ngul ayaa jôé e be Yérusalém tisone jôé nkôle wôé ô nʼétyi! Amu na abé dangan a bikobe bʼésaa bangan mbie Yérusalém be ntoo jôme meta e be bôt ba bômane bia.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ, ka maga gwata jeŋŋe na, anja mevel ɗik ati himaˀ ɗik, a mbiɗi duba avu Zeruzalem, walahay ɗik, muwã ɗik mipal na. Asi vur mungra ndrahay ati malambaˀ ngi dideˀ ndrahay na, sukwi mugun hirnga ndra gar, ara zaka Zeruzalem ati mizli ɗikeye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde nii kuuɗe ma fuu ɗe adiliije, sottin tikkere ma saatunde dow berniwol ma Urusaliima, hooseere ma seniinde. Ngam daliila hakkeeji amin e zunuubaaji kaakiraaɓe amin, taariiɓe min fuu ɗon njanca Urusaliima e ummaatoore ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde nii kuuɗe ma fuu ɗe adiliije, sottin tikkere ma saatunde dow berniwol ma Urusaliima, hooseere ma seniinde. Ngam daliila hakkeeji amin e zunuubaaji kaakiraaɓe amin, taariiɓe min fuu ɗon njanca Urusaliima e ummaatoore ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ nyimsea in ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yu zu Jerusalɛm nɛ duk nɛ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ in sa̧a̧ kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ zu ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ in yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ a̧ ziimɔ ba nɛ Jerusalɛm in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ ti o bíí nɛ ya zik yɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ nyimsea in ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yu zu Jerusalɛm nɛ duk nɛ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ in sa̧a̧ kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ zu ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ in yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ a̧ ziimɔ ba nɛ Jerusalɛm in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ ti o bíí nɛ ya zik yɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala yawe, ma laka tiɗiɗia ŋa ne, kelemte ghwə ta hwepe wənəa ŋa seyi kənəa Zhɛrəzalɛm, meleme ta ŋa, ghweme ta ŋa nya keveyi geva tekeleke. Ma tewəmbəreke yɛ fete ta n'yɛ ba'a yɛ jaɗafa ta ka shihɛ n'yɛ ne, Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a mbelia ŋa yaŋele pɛtɛa hwelefefi nyi dzeyi yitea ghen'yɛ.
Tupurri: Wañkluu, wer joñre äo ma ti ngeel äen wo no, daga jiili äo mo caa go noga äil äo mo cee ndo ne Jerusalem äi leege mani äon ti noga ne huuli äo ma bay ëagn ti wa so. Gahaçyla, wer älagge wuurn wo de debaycoçoçre paçaçre wuur wo, Jerusalem wo de jar mani äon wo go diñ fen feg ti nen jar maga wo ti wuur mo kara äuy no.

Francais: Écoute donc, Seigneur notre Dieu, la prière et les supplications que je t’adresse. Par égard pour toi-même, regarde avec bonté ton sanctuaire dévasté.
Anglais: Now therefore, our God, listen to (heed) the prayer of Your servant  (Daniel) and his supplications, and for Your own sake let Your face shine on Your desolate sanctuary.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni, Lawna vuma'a, humaŋ siɗawta hiɗi giɗel-delta vi sa ma sunda vaŋu, lo kuɗ slugota vaŋ naŋ Bum-Sumuna, hin vokaŋu wile gaa'a kay liyna vaŋ ma peldetna ma ɦoy gaana.
Bulu: Ajô te a Nti, e Zambe wongan, wôʼô ñhe meyeʼelan a minjaʼan ma liti wo. Amu ésemé wo semé womien, vôme wôé a nʼétyi a nto ndaman, tame yene nye a nleme mvam .
Guiziga: Aw Buymisemuŋ ndra, wurenna so na, cine diradibiɗ ati tumbul ngi gawla ɗik na. Go mihiri ɗike njahha ng'ar hay ɗik muwaha na, ɓa mizli a sunukuw ki Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jonta yaa Allah amin, heɗita do'a e tornde maccuɗo ma. Daliila innde ma, laar nokkuure ma seniinde yibbinaande bee yerduye.
Fulfulde_DC: Jonta yaa Allah amin, heɗita do'a e tornde maccuɗo ma. Daliila innde ma, laar nokkuure ma seniinde yibbinaande bee yerduye.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ‘m wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ha̧ saŋa-yí‘nɛ́ mɛ tok zu Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɗaŋa'i, wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ‘m wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ha̧ saŋa-yí‘nɛ́ mɛ tok zu Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɗaŋa'i, wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala ta n'yɛ yawe, ma tsetsenya gɛ ne, fate səkwə ta nde mene slene ta ŋa ba'a mpi dzeve ta ŋkɛ. Ma tewəmbəreke ghəa ŋa ne, zhɛraghe kema ta ŋa kənəa ghɛa ŋa nya kakwəfi.
Tupurri: Patalam so no, O Baa wuur no, co' mbo sug tosge wo de joñge kam kam mani weejoçoç äo no. Wer äil de el äo no, mbuë mbo nen äo ko ngeel äo ma bay ëag maga go de älagge mono.

Francais: Mon Dieu, écoute bien, regarde attentivement ; vois l’état de dévastation de notre ville, cette ville qui t’est consacrée. En te présentant nos supplications, nous ne comptons pas sur nos mérites, mais sur ton amour infini.
Anglais: O my God, incline Your ear and hear; open Your eyes and look at our desolations and the city which is called by Your name; for we are not presenting our supplications before You because of our own merits  and  righteousness, but because of Your great mercy  and  compassion.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna vanu, jakaŋ humaŋu, humanu. Malaŋ iraŋ goyo, ɗuwaŋ yam-jonona vuma'a hiɗi hoyok-ziyna vuma'a ma semda vaŋu ka yiy haya. Kay numa mar giɗel-delta vuma taŋ kayni may kuɗ lopna vuma'a ma ɗigeraɗi, may kuɗ slugota vaŋu ta ŋolda.
Bulu: A Zambe wom, vôʼôlôʼô, tukaʼa fombô; yene tisone jangan ane é ntoo ntyaman, tison é ne énjôé. Eyoñ bia yeʼelane wo, bi nji buni na, bi ne jôm éziñ, ve bia buni nyeʼane wôé ô ne tekeʼe nné.
Guiziga: Aw Buymisemuŋ ɗu, jiko slimiɗ, yo cin. Wuna hiri ɓa ki pura gwat muwahahay ati walahay ngi zila slimiɗ ɗik ara na. Ndra matumbulukuw na, anta vur gwat ngi gi ndra mijeŋŋe ta, amma vur ka mapur ircece haɗa na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Allah am, nan, laar! Laar bille amin, laar berniwol ngol innde ma ɗon ewne ton! Min ɗon ndari, toro haa yeeso maaɗa, naa ngam kuuɗe amin adiliije, ammaa ngam hinnuye ma ɗuuɗɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Allah am, nan, laar! Laar bille amin, laar berniwol ngol innde ma ɗon ewne ton! Min ɗon ndari, toro haa yeeso maaɗa, naa ngam kuuɗe amin adiliije, ammaa ngam hinnuye ma ɗuuɗɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o mɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ ɗaŋa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ye nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ sɛnɛ! Bo nɛ wen deemɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̀ɛ̀ ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen zu gasa deako k’ɛ́nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o mɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ ɗaŋa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ye nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ sɛnɛ! Bo nɛ wen deemɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̀ɛ̀ ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen zu gasa deako k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala ta ɗa, fate megela gi! Pelakɛ ntsə ta ŋa shɛ na neweve nza ta meleme ta n'yɛ nya keŋzla ŋzla, meleme nya keveyi geva nya kaŋa ŋa gi! Kenza tewəmbəreke slene nyi tiɗiɗi tiɗiɗi ta n'yɛ mpi dzeve ghen'yɛ kwa kema ta ŋa we, ama tewəmbəreke wəba ta zhɛ helia ŋa.
Tupurri: Baa äi no, co' mbo sugi, day laa mbo! Buñ nen äo go day ko mbo tabul wuurn wo de äi leege maga aè ëe ëu äo ne hen ti mono! Gahaçyla, wuur de ma joñkam kam ne ndo mo na bay diñ werga joñre wuur po wo ti ngeel äe lay na wa, ama diñ wer koge decoo jar äo ma debañ no.

Francais: Seigneur, écoute-nous ! Seigneur, pardonne-nous ! Seigneur, sois attentif ! Par égard pour toi, mon Dieu, interviens sans tarder en faveur de cette ville et de ce peuple qui te sont consacrés. »
Anglais: O Lord, hear! O Lord, forgive! O Lord, listen and take action! Do not delay, for Your own sake, O my God, because Your city and Your people are called by Your name.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum-Sumuna humma humge, Bum-Sumuna, vulma gida tage. Ma-Vatɗina jakaŋ humaŋu. Laŋ lopna vaŋu, vi yaŋɗi, kuɗaŋ naŋu Lawna vanu. Kay semda vaŋu ka yiya hay hoyok-ziyna hiɗi sumuna vaŋu.
Bulu: A Nti, vôʼôlôʼô bia! A Nti, jaméʼé bia! A Nti! A Nti keʼe melo môé! Amu ésemé ô bili mfaʼa wôé womien a Zambe wom, boʼo jam éziñ, te yange asu tisone nyô a ayoñe bôte di, mbie bi nʼémbiôé.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, cine ndra di! Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, pula mungra ndraˀahaya. Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, jiko slimiɗe, yo ga gwat nah, ki mur ta. Aw Buymisemuŋ ɗu, slimiɗ ɗik mazil ar walahay ɗik, yo a wuzla mizli ɗikey vur ka vuna.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan min! Yaa Jawmiraawo, yaafan min! Yaa Jawmiraawo, heɗita min! Huuw daliila innde ma, yaa Allah am, taa neeɓu ngam berniwol ngo'ol e ummaatoore nde'e, an jeyi!”
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan min! Yaa Jawmiraawo, yaafan min! Yaa Jawmiraawo, heɗita min! Huuw daliila innde ma, yaa Allah am, taa neeɓu ngam berniwol ngo'ol e ummaatoore nde'e, an jeyi!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ haya-a wen zu ye in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ zu wa’ɛ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ haya-a wen zu ye in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ zu wa’ɛ!
Kapsiki_DC: Shala yawe, fate n'yɛ ŋa n'yɛ gi! Shala yawe, kelemte n'yɛ te wənə gi! Shala yawe, ghwenemte sleme gi! Shala ta ɗa, ma tewəmbəreke ghəa ŋa ne, sate te ŋkwa kahe kahe kezha meleme ta ŋa ba'a kezha mbeli nyi kaŋa ŋa.»
Tupurri: Wañkluu, laa mbo! Wañkluu fug mbo äil go! Wañkluu co' mbo sugi! Joñ mbo mopo day gor wa so, wer äil de el äo no, O Baa äi no! Gahaçyla aè de ëe ëu äo ti äi leege äon wo de jar äon wo no.

Francais: « Je continuai de prier, de confesser mes fautes et celles d’Israël mon peuple, et d’adresser mes supplications au Seigneur mon Dieu au sujet de sa montagne sacrée .
Anglais: While I was still speaking and praying, and confessing my sin and the sin of my people Israel, and presenting my supplication before the L ord  my God in behalf of the holy mountain of my God,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nan ka law tuwa, nan ka siɗawa, nan ka ham sulukŋa vanu hiɗi sulukŋa vi sumuna vanu sa Israyella, hay li ma nan ka giɗel del Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vanu kay hiɗiyta ta peldetta valamu;
Bulu: Me nga ke ôsu a yeʼelan, a meme minkobane miam a mi Israél ayoñe dam, a liti minjaʼane miam e be Nti, e Zambe wom, ajô nkôle wé ô nʼétyi.
Guiziga: I ra ɓi ɓi zleˀe aruŋ, i ra dir dibiɗ, i ra njika malambaˀ ɗuwoy ati ngi Israyel mizli ɗuwoy, i ra tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗu vur ɓi ngi muwã  mipal   nga naŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Diga mi ɗonno wolwa tawon, mi ɗon waɗa do'a, mi ɗon waŋgina hakkeeji am e ɗi Isra'iila'en ummaatoore am, mi ɗon toro Jawmiraawo Allah am ngam hooseere maako seniinde,
Fulfulde_DC: Diga mi ɗonno wolwa tawon, mi ɗon waɗa do'a, mi ɗon waŋgina hakkeeji am e ɗi Isra'iila'en ummaatoore am, mi ɗon toro Jawmiraawo Allah am ngam hooseere maako seniinde,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mi ɓɔna fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, wor nɛ Sɔ̧, gbar nɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m in ko dukbíí kɔ‘m  Israɛl , ai nɛ nú sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m wen zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ̧-a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mi ɓɔna fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, wor nɛ Sɔ̧, gbar nɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m in ko dukbíí kɔ‘m  Israɛl , ai nɛ nú sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m wen zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ̧-a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Nda ghə yasəkwə 'ya, nda yɛ jaɗafa ta ɗa ba'a ŋa Israyɛl, hwelefe ta ɗa yancɛ 'ya ba'a nda dzeve yampi nda 'ya ke Shala Mahwətə ta ɗa, te ghəa ghweme nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala ta ɗa.
Tupurri: De maga ndi hay waçaç waçaçre ëa, ndi hay tosge, ndi hay wii fuggi äil ti älagge äin wo de älagge jar äi jar Israyel wo, ndi hay joñ kamkam ne Manwuri, Baa äin ti huuli ma bay ëag mani Baa äi no,

Francais: Or, tandis que je priais ainsi, l’ange Gabriel, que j’avais vu dans ma vision précédente, s’approcha de moi d’un vol rapide, à l’heure où l’on offre le sacrifice de l’après-midi .
Anglais: while I was still speaking in prayer and  extremely exhausted, the man Gabriel, whom I had seen in the earlier vision, came to me about the time of the evening sacrifice.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay li ma nan ka law hay siɗawta van tuwa, Gabriel sa ma vul tuwam kiran jewna piray katanu, kayni hay liyna vi ɗifin ma vulatitna.
Bulu: Me yeʼelane nalé, nde Engele Gabriel me nga yene ñyenane wome yʼôsu, a nga yele avô a kui ma bebé awolo ebien ba ve mimveane ya mamengôʼé,
Guiziga: Ti ya madir dibiɗ kanah na, Gabriyel, mbur ya mupura ti kleŋ tuwa, a slikiɗo faw kutum ng'avi ya, ar ler ngi vula gwat ngi mikuli ngi pastaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: diga mi ɗon waɗa do'a tawon, Jibirilla mo ngi'no mi nder wahayu am naane go, fiiri, wari law haa am. Ɗum saa'iire nde ɓe lii'anto Allah dokke nyaamdu kiikiiɗe .
Fulfulde_DC: diga mi ɗon waɗa do'a tawon, Jibirilla mo ngi'no mi nder wahayu am naane go, fiiri, wari law haa am. Ɗum saa'iire nde ɓe lii'anto Allah dokke nyaamdu kiikiiɗe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Gabriɛl bíí n'am baa zɔk tɛ hɔɔ-zu kɔ‘m nɛti'i bu̧i̧a tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m nɛ haya-a ŋgimbi ɗafa-sɔ̧ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Gabriɛl bíí n'am baa zɔk tɛ hɔɔ-zu kɔ‘m nɛti'i bu̧i̧a tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m nɛ haya-a ŋgimbi ɗafa-sɔ̧ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe səkwə ghə 'ya ne, pa Gabriyɛl nya ghate nya 'ya kanakɛ hendave ɗa geva le zlə kahe kahe, te vəa melɛ tɛhwɛɗi.
Tupurri: Ndi hay waçaç waçaçre nen tosge ëa, kola Gabriyel, blo maga hay naa nen see äe le me tañgu nen mbuëgi nen raw urgi le deparday, ya' le see äi d, sen na de wur maga aè de ma joñsiigi jag ma de lawn mono.

Francais: Il m’instruisit en me disant : “Daniel, je suis venu maintenant pour éclairer ton intelligence.
Anglais: He instructed me and he talked with me and said, “O Daniel, I have now come to give you insight  and  wisdom and understanding.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hatanu, law hiɗi nanu kaw. Nam di tanu: Daniel, nan maawa wulini kay mal varta vaŋ goyo kay naŋ ma huma.
Bulu: ve nyiin a jô me na: A Daniel, me zuya éyoñe ji asu ya faé feʼe jôé éfufup.
Guiziga: A dubuniy gwat, a ɓiy: «Daniyel, wurenna yi so ɓa i vuluw lesle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O faamtini yam, o wi'i: “Daniyel, jonta mi wari faamtingo ma annabaaku go.
Fulfulde_DC: O faamtini yam, o wi'i: “Daniyel, jonta mi wari faamtingo ma annabaaku go.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ wee ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Daniɛl, mi tɛɛ mɛ usi mgbara mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ wee ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Daniɛl, mi tɛɛ mɛ usi mgbara mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ncɛte ɗa ghena, ma ke sha 'ya: «Daniyɛl, nahe 'ya kese tsetsenya kezha ghwene mehele ta ŋa.
Tupurri: A had ndi day wii me gano: Danyele, ndi aà mo deñ patala ma haç ti ne ndo maga ndo mo laë wer feçeçre wo.

Francais: Dès que tu as commencé de supplier Dieu, un message a été prononcé de sa part, et je suis venu te le communiquer, car Dieu t’aime. Efforce-toi donc de comprendre ce message et de discerner le sens de la vision.
Anglais: At the beginning of your supplications, the command [to give you an answer] was issued, and I have come to tell you, for you are highly regarded  and  greatly beloved. Therefore consider the message and begin to understand the [meaning of the] vision.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay tun cawta vi siɗawta vaŋ pa, yoboyn kep kali goyo, nan co kayni kay daŋ labara valamu; kay naŋ kayni mi sa ma nan minaŋ ŋolo, vaŋ yoboyna, humaŋ caw ɗekka kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñ ebien wo te taté na wo yeʼelane Zambe, foé éziñ ja te toteban é soʼo be nye, nje ma te zu kate wo, amu Zambe a nyeʼe wo. Ajô te, vaʼa nguleya wôʼô foé éte, a yemelan atinane ya ñyenane te.
Guiziga: Ti ka mizla tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ na, mingiɓi a bo le ti vaŋ, yi so na ngi ɓuw di. Asi Buymisemuŋ a hĩyuw le haɗa. Sla wala ngi ɓi hana ati gwat ka mupura ti kleŋ na!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i a fuɗɗi toraago Allah, wolde iwi diga maako e mi wari yeccugo ma nde, ngam a ɗuuɗa-samanjo. Faamu wolde nde, faamu boo maana wahayu man:
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i a fuɗɗi toraago Allah, wolde iwi diga maako e mi wari yeccugo ma nde, ngam a ɗuuɗa-samanjo. Faamu wolde nde, faamu boo maana wahayu man:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ aia nú mɛ, GASA WAN zia tiger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ e tom nú‘m mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, wen mɛ dee tɛ-a nyɛmna. Mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ aia nú mɛ, GASA WAN zia tiger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ e tom nú‘m mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, wen mɛ dee tɛ-a nyɛmna. Mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghatema ta ŋa kampi nda dzeve ke Shala ne, nahe ŋkɛ kegezete kwete ghena, nahe 'ya kese kezha ncɛ ŋa ŋkɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaɗe ŋa Shala. Fave ghena nya tegeze ŋa 'ya te ghəa wəsə nya nakɛ nya na.
Tupurri: De maga ndo tï¡ï¡ wer joñ kamkam äon pel Baa no kay tu mono, aè raw kal waçaçre wo go siigi day ndi a na ferge äe ne ndo, werga ndo diñ je dage. Co' sug waçaçre seno, day ni ndo laa wer fen maga mbuë nen äo mono.

Francais: Une période de soixante-dix fois sept ans a été fixée pour ton peuple et pour la ville où tu demeures ; c’est nécessaire pour que la désobéissance prenne fin, que les fautes cessent et que les péchés soient pardonnés, pour que la justice éternelle se manifeste, que la vision et la prophétie s’accomplissent et que le temple de Dieu soit consacré de nouveau.
Anglais: “Seventy weeks [of years, or 490 years]  have been decreed for your people and for your holy city (Jerusalem), to finish the transgression, to make an end of sins, to make atonement (reconciliation) for wickedness, to bring in everlasting righteousness (right-standing with God), to seal up vision and prophecy  and  prophet, and to anoint the Most Holy  Place .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lumu dok-siɗiya ŋaɓay goyo, kay sumuna vaŋu hiɗi hoyok-ziyna vaŋ ma peldetna kaw, kay tew jiw-zlat goyo, kay vat sulukŋ goyo, kay por kay joota, kay mar ɗigerta ta vatɗita, kay hob vun wid-ŋayayta hiɗi vun-jobta, kay ɦok mul kay ma peldet suw kafna.
Bulu: Mimbu mewôme zamgbwa biyoñe zamgbwa mi ne ntelan asu bôte bôé, a asu tison é nʼétyi; éyoñe te ja yiane na melo me man, bikop bi man, a abé e jamban, ndembene zôsôô ya nnôm éto a ye yené, ñyenan a nkulane mejô bia ye tôéban, a nda Zambe é nʼétyi ja ye beta teléban étyi.
Guiziga: A ɗuvam vihey le tarnaˀ tarnaˀ makaw kukur tarnaˀ, vur mizli ɗikey ati walahay ka misi ara na, ɓa ngi kiɗa mi ngi moˀore ati mungra, ɓa ngi pula mungra, ngi so ti gi jeŋŋe ngi sete. Ɓa pura gwat ti kleŋ ati ɓi ngi mijiviɗey a gam muduba, yo ɓa a pam mal ngi vula li mihĩˀĩ da Buymisemuŋ a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah ta'ani ummaatoore ma e berniwol ma ceniiŋgol duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi, haa o haɗa tuurtol, o itta hakke, o hefa aybe, o tabitina adilaaku nduumiiŋgu, o waɗa lammba dow wahayu e annabaaku, o moyta ɓurɗo senaago.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah ta'ani ummaatoore ma e berniwol ma ceniiŋgol duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi, haa o haɗa tuurtol, o itta hakke, o hefa aybe, o tabitina adilaaku nduumiiŋgu, o waɗa lammba dow wahayu e annabaaku, o moyta ɓurɗo senaago.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: « ‹Wa gɔna pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ in sa̧a̧ ye kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ gbina heembea in dee ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kaɗi, ha'i mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ in ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Sɔ̧ mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o hɔɔ-zu in o wen ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ tɛ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu Sa̧a̧-Wi  nɛ̀ gana o dɔka-a lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: « ‹Wa gɔna pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ in sa̧a̧ ye kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ gbina heembea in dee ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kaɗi, ha'i mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ in ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Sɔ̧ mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o hɔɔ-zu in o wen ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ tɛ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu Sa̧a̧-Wi  nɛ̀ gana o dɔka-a lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe va mberefaŋe zhigə mberefaŋemsə kesləyi geva kezha hwelefe ta ŋa ba'a kezha meleme ta ŋa nya keveyi geva tekeleke. Nahe vəa shɛ kehi kezha tereke wəsə kwa ndiremi, kezha kiɗi jaɗafa, kezha kelemte geva yɛ fete te wənə, kezha ncɛ geva tiɗiɗi nya kaghala ghala, kezha yipə geva wəshi nyi nakɛ mbeli ba'a ghena ta ka mɛ ŋkwa kadzawa ba'a kezha zhɛne ghɛa Shala kave geva tekeleke.
Tupurri: AÈ hay ngaä lumo we go do renam ti jar äon wo de äi leege ma kluu ma bay ëarge no, ma caa wer cegaëge ti jag liñgin go, ma dig älaggen go, ma façaç joñre ma ni nañ gaan wo go, ma age de keëed maga taw gaa mono, maga lwa'ge wo de waçaçre maga aè hay waçë ra go pel bol mo leë wo jag go, ma ferge go gel ngeel ma bay ëag has has no.

Francais: Voici donc ce que tu dois savoir et comprendre : depuis l’instant où a été prononcé le message concernant le retour d’exil et la reconstruction de Jérusalem, jusqu’à l’apparition du chef consacré, il y a sept périodes de sept ans . Ensuite, pendant soixante-deux périodes de sept ans, la ville et ses fortifications seront reconstruites, mais les temps seront difficiles.
Anglais: So you are to know and understand that from the issuance of the command to restore and rebuild Jerusalem until [the coming of] the Messiah (the Anointed One), the Prince,  there will be  seven weeks [of years] and sixty-two weeks [of years]; it will be built again, with [a city] plaza and moat, even in times of trouble.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ ma wi kayni hum kaw. Tun caw tam yoboyna ma hot in Yerusalem kulon pa, ta-ta tam mulla-Mesiyas, lumun liy siɗiya; jar lumun dok-karkiya yam ma' lo, baŋal-liyna hiɗi zulla ma hotis hay baŋalamu, ma inis kulo lo. May hay liyna vi yorta.
Bulu: Jam wo yiane yem a wôk nde di: ataté éyoñe foé ya nsoone minkôm ja te toteban, a nyô mfefé nlôñane Yérusalém, a kui nsoone évet é ne ñwoʼone mbon, mimbu mewôm menyin mia ye lôt. Wôna tañe mimbu mewôm mesaman a mibaé biyoñe zamgbwa, tison a aleme dé bia ye beta lôñeban, ve biyoñ bia ye bo ayaé.
Guiziga: Sina sin le, yo sla wala nah, mingiɓi mubo ɓa mizli mijahay a moko, yo waɗ ngi ndira walahay Zeruzalem hiri naŋ a muŋ, ɓa hã buy mipaŋ mal ngi vula slra a bo na, naɓa vihey ada tarnaˀ tarnaˀ makaw tarnaˀ. Ar vihey tarnaˀ tarnaˀ makaw kukur merkeɗ ngaˀ cuw na, a sa ndiraka walahay ati mohol naŋhaya a muŋ, amma a sa gi i hin mutuwaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum anndu e faamu ɗu'um: Diga saa'i wolde iwi haa Allah ngam nyiɓtaago Urusaliima haa wargo ardiiɗo mo Allah moyti ɗum, duuɓi joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi caaloto. Nden nder duuɓi cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi (62) nde joweeɗiɗi, yimɓe nyiɓtoto Urusaliima: Laabi e gasɗe paddooje mahititte nder wakkati ɓillaaje.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum anndu e faamu ɗu'um: Diga saa'i wolde iwi haa Allah ngam nyiɓtaago Urusaliima haa wargo ardiiɗo mo Allah moyti ɗum, duuɓi joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi caaloto. Nden nder duuɓi cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi (62) nde joweeɗiɗi, yimɓe nyiɓtoto Urusaliima: Laabi e gasɗe paddooje mahititte nder wakkati ɓillaaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kinii, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ‘e, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ heembea wen baa Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn woyo hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wan nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a tɛ hɔ, tɛ de pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo, wa tɛ ɗafi o bee-gara ye in o ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya ŋgimbi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kinii, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ‘e, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ heembea wen baa Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn woyo hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wan nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a tɛ hɔ, tɛ de pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo, wa tɛ ɗafi o bee-gara ye in o ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya ŋgimbi.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya wəsə nya hi na kaɗepete ba'a kafave nya: Ma se te və nya gezete geva ghena te ghəa zhɛne geva ta mbeli nyi kefəhwe geva kase ba'a ŋa ta Zhɛrəzalɛm zhɛkwa, hwa'a te nca ta wəndə nya te ghə nya ntave Shala ne, va mberefaŋe zhigə mberefaŋemsə ya shɛ. Ma mbe va ŋkwaŋemsə bakeghəmbe zhigə mberefaŋe ne, kateŋa geva meleme ba'a zli nya yite, ama dzawe dzawe tenza yɛ va shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: Dosen ndo nen koge day ndo nen laa wer äe ga tï¡ï¡ wer ti wur maga aè kal waçaçre le go ga fer kneç' Jerusalem, fer booge äe haçaç wo go dayge ti wur mani mesi wañn mono, lumo ni rename. Day nen lumo do hiira' ti äog aè fer ge yañ boor ngeeln wo de blam biin wo, nen wur lawge.

Francais: A la fin de ces soixante-deux périodes, un homme consacré sera tué sans que personne le défende. Puis un chef viendra avec son armée et détruira la ville et le sanctuaire. Toutefois ce chef finira sous le déferlement de la colère divine. Mais jusqu’à sa mort il mènera une guerre dévastatrice, comme cela a été décidé .
Anglais: Then after the sixty-two weeks [of years] the Anointed One will be cut off [and denied His Messianic kingdom] and have nothing [and no one to defend Him], and the people of the [other] prince who is to come will destroy the city and the sanctuary. Its end  will come  with a flood; even to the end there will be war; desolations are determined.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol lumu dok-karkiya yam ma', Mesiyas kep ma kaays goyo, sa ma kuɗum ma li loɗi. Sumuna vi mul mara kep ma co'o, nisi ma ɓulak hoyok-ziyna hiɗi liyn ma peldetna, dabta valamu ma li ki niy ma tina nala. Dita coli ala ɓulak-goyta ma mus ta-ta hay vatta vi duura.
Bulu: Eyoñe mimbu mewôm mesaman a mibaé mite mi maneya nyô a ne ñwoʼone mbon a ye vaseban, ve sa ñhe amu émien. Ve mfaʼa tison a vôm a nʼétyi, bôte be évete ja zu ba ye tyame bie. Ve da ayaa Zambe da ye suʼulane wôé évete te. Vʼa kui awu dé, a ye bo bita bia tyame mam aval e ne ntilan.
Guiziga: A dirba vi tarnaˀ tarnaˀ makaw kukur merkeɗ ngaˀ cuw na, mbur mipaŋ mal ngi vulaŋ slra, a sa kiɗam pal vagay, amma ko mbur pal masa cik vu aseˀe anta. Walahay ati hay ngi Buymisemuŋ na, mizli ngi buyoy misi tumbuŋ, a sa wahaka taŋ. Mizli ngi buy tayna vuna, i himaˀ ngi Buymisemuŋ masa kiɗa taŋ, yo hã avu kiɗa mi ngi vurum kwana, ɓi micica ngi ngizla vu ada.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To duuɓi cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi (62) nde joweeɗiɗi go timmi, yimɓe mbaran moytaaɗo, walaa ko o heɓata. Ardiiɗo feere waran, wilan berniwol e nokkuure seniinde. Timmoode maako waran bana ilam kalkoojam, haa ragare man boo konu e halkere laatoto, bana Allah taynori.
Fulfulde_DC: To duuɓi cappanɗe joweego e ɗiɗi (62) nde joweeɗiɗi go timmi, yimɓe mbaran moytaaɗo, walaa ko o heɓata. Ardiiɗo feere waran, wilan berniwol e nokkuure seniinde. Timmoode maako waran bana ilam kalkoojam, haa ragare man boo konu e halkere laatoto, bana Allah taynori.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn ɗoŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo'i, wa tɛ gbɛ ŋma bíí nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a yinɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wen ŋma mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a na; ɓɛɛ war ko ye in Tua ko Sɔ̧, dukbíí ko ŋma wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, sɔŋkur mɔ ko wi’ɛi tɛ duk hee gba-zu a̧ gbina ga, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋamɔ beka kaɗi na hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi kaɗa-a ko biro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn ɗoŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo'i, wa tɛ gbɛ ŋma bíí nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a yinɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wen ŋma mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a na; ɓɛɛ war ko ye in Tua ko Sɔ̧, dukbíí ko ŋma wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, sɔŋkur mɔ ko wi’ɛi tɛ duk hee gba-zu a̧ gbina ga, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋamɔ beka kaɗi na hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi kaɗa-a ko biro.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta va nyi ŋkwaŋemsə bakeghəmbe shɛhɛ ne, katepesle wəndə nya ntave Shala mbeli kaɗema wəndə keya ŋkɛ shɛ. Zhɛne ne, katese kwete wəndə nya te ghə le ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kezha beze meleme ba'a ghɛa Shala. Ama katemte ŋkɛ mbe wəba ta hwepe wənəa Shala. Hwa'a te mte ta ŋkɛ ne, katempa ŋkɛ ba'a katebeze wəshi ŋkɛ kala nya ketarete geva.
Tupurri: Blam lumo se ma do hiira' ti äogn wo mono, aè ii gi mesi po yañ go day je äe po joñ ge gaè. Day jar mani wañ po a ge wo yañ, Saara älag ge äi leegen wo go de ngeel ma bay ëag no, Ane huli wañ sen la joñ ge nen ree ma glumglum Ama aà go de waçaçge an ga ree ma taw jarn wo ge go haçaç ti tawge ti durgi no.

Francais: Pendant la dernière période de sept ans, il imposera de dures obligations à un grand nombre de gens. Au bout de trois ans et demi, il fera même cesser les sacrifices et les offrandes. Ce dévastateur accomplira ses œuvres abominables avec rapidité, jusqu’à ce que la fin qui a été décidée s’abatte sur lui .” »
Anglais: And he will enter into a binding  and  irrevocable covenant with the many for one week (seven years), but in the middle of the week he will stop the sacrifice and grain offering [for the remaining three and one-half years]; and on the wing of abominations  will come  one who makes desolate, even until the complete destruction, one that is decreed, is poured out on the one who causes the horror.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ma vi bonot hiɗi sumun ŋolo ir lumut kep, hay galla vi lumuta, nam ma tel ɗifinna hiɗi vulda; sa ma ɓulak liyna ma tuɗ ta-ta co tam dabta vi liwista, ta-ta hay li ma ɦo-gaata hiɗi slen ma laway goyna nig gaa kay sa ma ɓulak liyna.
Bulu: Eyoñe ya mimbu zamgbwale mia suʼulan, a ye titi élat e bitule bi bôt abui yôp. Mvuse mimbu mila a étun, a ye telé mboone metunaʼa a mimvean. Ntyame mam ate a ye bo bʼangôndô mimboone mié avôl avô, akekui asuʼulan e ne ntelan da ye ku nye yôp.
Guiziga: Ar vi mitarnaˀ ngi dirbahay na, a sa tika ˀay ngi jumoˀay da zigiduw, yo angi reta ngi vi tarnaˀ na kwana, a sa kiɗa mi ngi mikuli ati gwat ngi vulo. Mingizla mizli a sa sawa, a sa ga gwat mukuy ta naŋhaya kutum, hã ɓi micica tuwa, a mbiɗi nga hirnga naŋ a muŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ardiiɗo go haɓɓan e tabitinan alkawal bee yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngam duuɓi joweeɗiɗi. Ɓaawo duuɓi tati bee reeta o haɗan lii'anaago Allah kirseteeɗi e dokke. Haa wakeere nyiddunde, nattinoowo daroto haa to timmoode nde Allah taynori yotti dow maako .”
Fulfulde_DC: Ardiiɗo go haɓɓan e tabitinan alkawal bee yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngam duuɓi joweeɗiɗi. Ɓaawo duuɓi tati bee reeta o haɗan lii'anaago Allah kirseteeɗi e dokke. Haa wakeere nyiddunde, nattinoowo daroto haa to timmoode nde Allah taynori yotti dow maako .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ oi sɔŋkur pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o dɔka bíí mɛ nɔ tɔk nɛ ŋgai in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dora ɗafa-sɔ̧ in aa-zɛzɛ tɛ reeta ŋgimbi'i. Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ‘i  tɛ de ndiŋmɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i gɔna nɛ mɔ tɛ tik nɛnɛ zu a̧.› »
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ oi sɔŋkur pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o dɔka bíí mɛ nɔ tɔk nɛ ŋgai in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dora ɗafa-sɔ̧ in aa-zɛzɛ tɛ reeta ŋgimbi'i. Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ‘i  tɛ de ndiŋmɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i gɔna nɛ mɔ tɛ tik nɛnɛ zu a̧.› »
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa keɗaŋe ta vəa yɛ va mberefaŋe ne, kateŋka mbeli kwele kwele ŋkɛ le berete yitea mene wəsə nya ɗema hɛ. Ma kwa sebe ta yɛ va mahekene ba'a kwete yite ne, katefɛa yɛ melɛ ba'a wəshi nyi fə mbeli kase ŋkɛ. Katemene wəshi nyi ndiremi ndiremi kashasha ta ŋkɛ nde beze wəshia shɛhɛ kahe kahe hwa'a te və nya teza sebe te gheŋkɛ le ghəa ŋkɛ kala nya ketarete geva.»
Tupurri: Wañn la tay ge jag yañ go tamëag de jar debañ nen lumo boñ Ane wo dayge ti gisiëgi naw se renam wo mono, se diggi siigi jagn wo yañ wo go de haçge feçeçre ne Baa no. Je älag jarn rawge wuu joñge feçeçre hoor seen wo haçaç wo go ti wur maga fen ma ree ngeeln wo de fen maga aè hay ngaä le go ti äe cwaa wo ne je taw jarn ti.

Francais: Prière de Daniel
Anglais: Daniel’s Prayer for His People
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Siɗawta vi Daniel
Bulu: Daniel a yeʼelane Zambe
Guiziga: Dira dibiɗ ngi Daniyel
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Do'aare Daniyel ngam lenyol muuɗum
Fulfulde_DC: Do'aare Daniyel ngam lenyol muuɗum
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko Daniɛl
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko Daniɛl
Kapsiki_DC: Səkwə ghə ta Daniyɛl
Tupurri: Danyel tos ti Israyel wo

Francais: La prophétie des soixante-dix périodes
Anglais: Gabriel Brings an Answer
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: Njika ɓi ngi gwat masa gi ar hin wal wal kukur tarnaˀ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jibirilla fassitiri annabaaku duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi
Fulfulde_DC: Jibirilla fassitiri annabaaku duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu ko Daniɛl
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu ko Daniɛl
Kapsiki_DC: Ghena nya mbe va nyi 70
Tupurri: Baa yiñ jag ne Danyele

Francais: Durant la troisième année du règne de Cyrus, roi de Perse, un message de Dieu fut révélé à Daniel, appelé aussi Beltassar. Ce message, digne de foi, annonçait de grandes difficultés . Daniel y réfléchit attentivement et en découvrit le sens grâce à la vision.
Anglais: In the third year of Cyrus king of Persia a message was revealed to Daniel, who was named Belteshazzar; and the message was true and it referred to great conflict (warfare, misery). And he understood the message and had an understanding of the vision.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata ɦidita vi Sirus mul ma Persiya, yoboyn kep ɗeki kir Daniel ma yum Belsasar. Yoboy namna kayni gasiya, duura ŋolla ma li'e, nam vi yoboy namna, hum caw slen ma vul tuwam kiramna.
Bulu: Mbu lale Sirus njô bôte ya Perse a nga jôô, foé Zambe é nga litiban e be Daniel, nyô a mbe jôé afe na Beltsazar. Foé éte é ne nyô ya buni, é nga liti mbia minjuk mia zu. Daniel a nga tuʼa fase foé éte a yen atinane yʼété amu ñyenan a nga yen.
Guiziga: Angi vi mimakir naŋ ngi Sirus buy Perse mazum buy na, Buymisemuŋ a njik ɓi le da Daniyel mazilaka Beltasara. Mingiɓi nah naŋ kaslsla, yo a ɓi di i ɓi ngi bonoy madiɗa. Daniyel a ja ɓi nah le, a sla wala nah ar naŋ mupura ti kleŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya, tataɓu, Allah wolwani Daniyel bi'eteeɗo Beltesacar. Wolde nde'e ɗum gooŋga: Haɓre mawnde waɗan. Daniyel faami wolde man, o faami boo wahayu man.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya, tataɓu, Allah wolwani Daniyel bi'eteeɗo Beltesacar. Wolde nde'e ɗum gooŋga: Haɓre mawnde waɗan. Daniyel faami wolde man, o faami boo wahayu man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ taar pɛ-wan ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ, Sɔ̧ usa ŋma mɔ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ‘i sa'e Bɛltasar. Mɔ‘i duka nɛ kpasawen nɛ usi nɛ mɔ zu ŋgamɔ nɛ tɛ tik zu nu. Daniɛl zia mgbara mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ taar pɛ-wan ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ, Sɔ̧ usa ŋma mɔ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ‘i sa'e Bɛltasar. Mɔ‘i duka nɛ kpasawen nɛ usi nɛ mɔ zu ŋgamɔ nɛ tɛ tik zu nu. Daniɛl zia mgbara mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mahekene ta va ta Sirəs, meghe nya mbe Pɛrse te meghe ne, pa ghena ta Shala ncɛte nda geva ke Daniyɛl nya heka mbeli kaBɛltasar. Nahe ghena shɛ kenza kakaganda ba'a kaghena nya dzawe. Pa Daniyɛl zəzəve ghena shɛ ba'a fave ghena nya mbe wəsə nya nakɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de swa' maga Sirus wañ Perse de ma joñwañ mono, aè raw naa nen waçaçre po ne Danyel maga aè hay ëege äe ga Belsatsar mono. Waçaçre sen diñ waçaçre ma cwaçy, aà waçaç ti durgi maga a ge de gayri ma debañ ne jar ti mono. Danyel kal ëaw waçaçre seno, raw kañ ti äe ti fen maga mbuë nen äe mono.

Francais: « A cette époque, moi, Daniel, j’observai les rites de deuil pendant trois semaines complètes :
Anglais: In those days I, Daniel, had been mourning for three entire weeks.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li namna kayni, nanu, Daniel, nan mus hay do'olla ir lumu ɦidi.
Bulu: Melu mete, ma Daniel, me nga too meyeb été tañe sondô éla:
Guiziga: Ti hin nana, ya Daniyele, naɓa i gi le luuma makir ar li vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i man min Daniyel mi jooɗi nder suno asaweeje tati.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i man min Daniyel mi jooɗi nder suno asaweeje tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, mi Daniɛl, zima mɔ tɛ alat taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, mi Daniɛl, zima mɔ tɛ alat taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma 'ya, 'ya Daniyɛl mbe vəa shɛ ne, pa 'ya nza ɗa kala wəndə nya mte wəndə ve kashikwə mahekene.
Tupurri: De sen ni ndi Danyele, ndi kal joñ lumo swa' nen lawge.

Francais: Je ne mangeai aucun mets délicat, je ne consommai ni viande ni vin, et je renonçai à me parfumer la tête, jusqu’à ce que ces trois semaines soient passées.
Anglais: I ate no tasty food, nor did any meat or wine enter my mouth; and I did not  anoint (refresh, groom) myself at all for the full three weeks.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan min ti tin ma jibet noŋɗi, sliwna hiɗi vinna nan min tunum hay vunanɗi, nan min set tuwan hiɗi mulɗi kaw, ta-ta lumu ɦidi vatay vat'.
Bulu: Teke di jôm éziñ: toʼo tit nge nyu woon, teke tyembane nlô, vʼakekui sondô éla éte é lôteya.
Guiziga: Y'anta zum gwat mezle ko neˀ ta, ko ˀuse, ko mbaazla, anta ci a balam ɗu ta. Y'anta gi urdi avu vu ta, hã luuma makir a kiɗ mi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi nyaamaay nyaamdu welndu, mi nyaamaay kusel, mi yaraay inaboojam boo. Mi wujaaki sam haa asaweeje tati man caali.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi nyaamaay nyaamdu welndu, mi nyaamaay kusel, mi yaraay inaboojam boo. Mi wujaaki sam haa asaweeje tati man caali.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi nyɔŋ so de nyɔŋmɔ na, kpoo in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ye nú‘m na, mi sɔ̧ nɔ̧́ tɛ‘m na mbɛt tɛ alat nɔ‘i taar'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi nyɔŋ so de nyɔŋmɔ na, kpoo in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ye nú‘m na, mi sɔ̧ nɔ̧́ tɛ‘m na mbɛt tɛ alat nɔ‘i taar'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kazehwe wəsə kezeme nya zeɗe 'ya we, kedzawa mɛa ɗa sli keɗema tɛ we, keslaɗete ghə 'ya, nda kiɗinji shikwə nyi mahekene nyi we.
Tupurri: Ndi laa ree reege po ma de el gaa lay, hayba naèy noga yii ndi baa jag ti äaara gaè. Ndi tag noo po see äi gaa lay haçaç lumo ma swa'n bag wo jag go.

Francais: Le vingt-quatrième jour du premier mois, je me trouvais au bord du Tigre, le grand fleuve.
Anglais: On the twenty-fourth day of the first month, as I was on the bank of the great river Hiddekel [which is the Tigris],
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta dok-ma' yam fiɗita vi til ma jewna, nan ka colay deŋel niy-lum ma ŋolla ma yum Hiddekel.
Bulu: Ngon ôsu é too melu mewôm mebaé a menyin, me nga too mfôme beta ôsôé ba loone tigre.
Guiziga: Angi hin mukuruˀ nga mufaɗ ngi kiya mudumbuŋ na, naɓa ya deŋ a mi mubuliy madiɗa mazilaka Tigre.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde noogas e nayaɓre nder lewru aranndu hitaande man mi ɗonno haa fomoonde Tigiris, maayo maŋngo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde noogas e nayaɓre nder lewru aranndu hitaande man mi ɗonno haa fomoonde Tigiris, maayo maŋngo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, mi a̧a̧ so ká̧ nana-yì Tigrɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, mi a̧a̧ so ká̧ nana-yì Tigrɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa bakemsə wəfaɗeghəmbe ta hɛ te tere kwa ghate ne, nahe 'ya kese mɛa Tigre, hələ nya wəba.
Tupurri: Ti naw do äog ti naa nen few ma tañgun mono, ndi hay jag maarog ma de paçaçge ma kluu ga diñ Hidekel mono.

Francais: Tandis que je regardais, j’aperçus un personnage, vêtu d’habits de lin, avec une ceinture en or pur autour de la taille.
Anglais: I raised my eyes and looked, and behold, there was a  certain man dressed in linen, whose loins were girded with [a  belt of] pure gold of Uphaz.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan poŋ iran kulo'o, nan ɗuw kayni, iran wi sa kep cuki hiɗi sligar ma haɓna, furamu ay juni hiɗi kanti ma ora vi Ufas.
Bulu: Me fombôʼô ana, nde ma yene môt éziñ a beʼe bifumulu mengômesan, kandé or é tii nye angeteñ.
Guiziga: I zuɓa hirnga paɗɗa, keɗ na, mbur deŋ ti zana ngi gugumay mislirkeɗ, kanda ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ wak a dingiriŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi tijji dow, mi yi'i goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce daneeje, taadiiɗo taadorgol kaŋŋeeri Ufas.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi tijji dow, mi yi'i goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce daneeje, taadiiɗo taadorgol kaŋŋeeri Ufas.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà‘m ba yí‘m nɛ ŋgɔn wo, mi zɔka ŋma bíí nɛ pi̧i̧ ŋma yɛm-yɛm laa, nɛ hɛra zaŋ nɛ kanda lɔr mɛ nu Ufaz.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà‘m ba yí‘m nɛ ŋgɔn wo, mi zɔka ŋma bíí nɛ pi̧i̧ ŋma yɛm-yɛm laa, nɛ hɛra zaŋ nɛ kanda lɔr mɛ nu Ufaz.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma newe 'ya ne, pa 'ya nakɛ kwete wəndə mbe lekwesa pawa, zewe mze kwa tere tere nya ganyɛ ya hwa hwə ve.
Tupurri: Ndi raw mañ nen äi ciñ, ndi kañ nen äi ta' koge, kola jobo la deñ de oçoçbe leçeç ti, de sa' sag äe de mblaaga boo biñni ma Ufas no.

Francais: Son corps ressemblait à une pierre précieuse, son visage brillait comme un éclair, ses yeux étaient pareils à des torches enflammées, ses bras et ses jambes luisaient comme du bronze poli. Quand il parlait, on croyait entendre le bruit d’une foule .
Anglais: His body also was like beryl [with a golden luster], his face had the appearance of lightning, his eyes were like flaming torches, his arms and his feet like the gleam of burnished bronze, and the sound of his words was like the noise of a multitude [of people or the roaring of the sea].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tuwamu ay ki hiɗiyn krisolit nala, vokomu sli va ma wile'e nala, iramu ki sin-kuta nala, ɓalamu hiɗi selemu ki wayta ta golɓotta nala, delem ma dina ŋray ca ki sumun ŋol dak-dak nala.
Bulu: Nyôle jé é mbe é funaʼane akoʼo é nʼédima, asu dé vʼane feleves, mise mé me funaʼane bisiʼi bi nduan, mo mé a mebo mé bi vianeʼe ngeñeban ane nséane mvot. Eyoñ a kobô, vʼane wo wôʼô éduñe nkunda bôt.
Guiziga: Vu naŋ, naŋ kaɓa ɗugur marva, mihiri naŋ kaɓa wucuɗ ngi vuŋ, hiri naŋ kaɓa dali i vu, haŋ ati sar naŋhaya, a wucuɗam kaɓa ɓiri gaza mingirzla kuleɗ kuleɗ, mingiɓi naŋ, kaɓa i zigiduw taˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓanndu maako ɗon ɗelka bana hayre kirisoliti. Yeeso maako ɗon yayna bana ma'ere, gite maako laati bana tostilamji. Juuɗe maako e kosɗe maako ɗon ɗelka bana njamndi mboɗeeri ɓolinaandi. Sawtu maako ɗon iida bana hoolo jama'aare ɗuuɗnde .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓanndu maako ɗon ɗelka bana hayre kirisoliti. Yeeso maako ɗon yayna bana ma'ere, gite maako laati bana tostilamji. Juuɗe maako e kosɗe maako ɗon ɗelka bana njamndi mboɗeeri ɓolinaandi. Sawtu maako ɗon iida bana hoolo jama'aare ɗuuɗnde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ-a duk so hee de toka ta ga, saŋa-yí-a tok hee pi̧i̧-kórò ga, o gbaayi-a ya hee leɓe-wee ga, o ɓaa-a in o naŋ-a hɔɔ ŋmaa in de yɔka ndɛrɛ. Tiger-a nɔ̧́í̧ hee gba giti ger giiwi ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ-a duk so hee de toka ta ga, saŋa-yí-a tok hee pi̧i̧-kórò ga, o gbaayi-a ya hee leɓe-wee ga, o ɓaa-a in o naŋ-a hɔɔ ŋmaa in de yɔka ndɛrɛ. Tiger-a nɔ̧́í̧ hee gba giti ger giiwi ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe geva ta ŋkɛ kenza kala pelɛ kwa sleke sleke, kema ta ŋkɛ kala slesla ta va, ntsə ta ŋkɛ kala ghwə te wəvəzə, yɛ dzeve ta ŋkɛ ba'a yɛ seɗa ta ŋkɛ kala ɓayɛ ɓayɛ ta mze kwa ghwə ghwə nya kenjɛhe njehe, gaka ta ŋwələa ŋkɛ kala gaka ta mbeli kwele kwele.
Tupurri: Hoçoçgesee äe hay do Krisolid huuli ma de woren nono. Pel äe sag do sagge Baa nono, nen äe wo do wuu maga de yaçaçge nono. Do äe wo de äaale wo de mañ boo dob ma de guur see nono. Waçaçre äe do ngarge jag jar ngaäa nono.

Francais: Moi, Daniel, je fus le seul à voir cette apparition. Les gens qui m’entouraient ne virent rien, et pourtant, saisis de terreur, ils coururent se cacher.
Anglais: And I, Daniel, alone saw the vision [of this heavenly being], for the men who were with me did not see the vision; nevertheless, a great panic overwhelmed them, so they ran away to hide themselves.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nanu Daniel, van kayni vul tuwam kiran nan van kepe, kay sum sa ay hiɗi nanu may wi van kaynɗi, may narta ŋolda bowsiya, nisi mun jaŋi kay ŋay tuwsiya.
Bulu: Ma, Daniel, me nga yene jame te étam. Bôt be nga bômane ma be nji yene jôm, ve be nga mate ke sobô, amu woñ ô nga bi be.
Guiziga: I ya Daniyel pal ɗu, mupura gwat mubugo vu hana, mizli misi ati yahaya, a puraka ta. Amma didak a muɗa taŋ cek, a kilam nga ɗum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min Daniyel feere am yi'i wahayu man. Wonduɓe bee am ngi'aay koo ɗume, ammaa kulol maŋngol naŋngi ɓe, ɓe ndoggi haa ɓe nyukko.
Fulfulde_DC: Min Daniyel feere am yi'i wahayu man. Wonduɓe bee am ngi'aay koo ɗume, ammaa kulol maŋngol naŋngi ɓe, ɓe ndoggi haa ɓe nyukko.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Nɛ́ mi Daniɛl ɛ̀n'am a̧ zɔka so mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ; o bíí n’ɛɛ yaa so in o ŋmaa'i zɔk so kɔ-wa na. Zu-a'i, kíì dee wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yu mɔ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Nɛ́ mi Daniɛl ɛ̀n'am a̧ zɔka so mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ; o bíí n’ɛɛ yaa so in o ŋmaa'i zɔk so kɔ-wa na. Zu-a'i, kíì dee wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yu mɔ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si.
Kapsiki_DC: Deke 'ya, 'ya Daniyɛl nde nakɛ nca ta wəndəa shɛ. Wəsə shɛ kenakɛ mbeli nyi yitea 'ya we, ama pa hɛ ghazlənənji kwele kwele ba'a hwɛnji kalə kawəfərə.
Tupurri: Ndi Danyele, ndi ko mbuëgi nen sen diñ ndi boñ. Jar maga hay wo see äi ni ko wo mbuëgi nenn gaè. AÀ ne heçeçne raw caa rage go debañ day saara kal dañge de ëeere yoñge.

Francais: Je demeurai donc tout seul à contempler cette apparition impressionnante. Cependant mes forces me quittèrent, mon visage changea de couleur, il devint livide, et je me retrouvai sans aucune énergie.
Anglais: So I was left alone and saw this great vision; yet no strength was left in me, for my normal appearance turned to a deathly pale, and I grew weak  and  faint [with fright].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan hin coli van kep zaw, nala wida ŋolda na'ta vul tuwa' kiranu; dono ma tanna vat goyo, iran zoɓa, vokan muɗ mirwiki, donota vanu vat goyo.
Bulu: Me mbe étame ya yen étua, jame di. Ve ngul é nga kôlô ma nyô, asu dam é tyendé fe, nyô é nga bo ékukut, me suʼulane te fe ngule nyô.
Guiziga: Yi ndir pal ɗu ar li pura gwat madiɗa mubugo vu na. Gidaŋ anta avu ya mata wãˀ. Kuturkuy ngi vu ɗu a mbiɗi, ko i lum gidaŋ neˀ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi lutti feere am, mi ɗon yi'a wahayu mawɗo oo. Semmbe am fuu jinni, yeeso am nyiɓɓi jamum, mi tampi.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi lutti feere am, mi ɗon yi'a wahayu mawɗo oo. Semmbe am fuu jinni, yeeso am nyiɓɓi jamum, mi tampi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi ɓɔna hi̧i̧ ɛ̀n'am zɔk nɛ gasa mɔ‘i; gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina so lɛŋ, saŋa-yí‘m kpaia kifi nɛ ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgai gbo tɛ‘m.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi ɓɔna hi̧i̧ ɛ̀n'am zɔk nɛ gasa mɔ‘i; gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina so lɛŋ, saŋa-yí‘m kpaia kifi nɛ ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgai gbo tɛ‘m.
Kapsiki_DC: Deke 'ya nde tene kanewe wəsə meŋelea shɛ. Pa berete ta ɗa denenyɛ, pa kema ta ɗa zhɛrete pa ba'a nzanyɛ tɛarawe rawe, pa 'ya zhɛre ɗa kande dewə berete.
Tupurri: Ndi kal gwa'ge boñ ko mbuëgi nen se ma kluu no. Eegre äi raw hooge go, see äi dañ me go, kal hragge go lay. See äi hu go äuy tu.

Francais: J’entendis le personnage prononcer des paroles ; au bruit de sa voix, je perdis connaissance et m’écroulai le visage contre terre.
Anglais: Then I heard the sound of his words; and when I heard the sound of his words, I fell on my face in a deep sleep, with my face toward the ground.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan ka hum delem ma di yoboyna; hay li ma nan hum delem ma di yoboyna, nan ŋel goy diwiŋ', nan dab vokan gaa'a kay nagata.
Bulu: Me nga wôʼô môt ate a kobôʼô mejô; éduñe ya tyiñe jé é nga bo na me dimili fek, ve ku asu e butu si.
Guiziga: I ra cine ˀay naŋ maɓi. Da ya mira cine ˀay ngi mingiɓi naŋ na, i ɓurusl ɓurusl, ya durus a ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi nani bolle maako. Nde mi ɗon nana bolle ɗe'e, faɗɗere hoosi yam, mi hippi dow lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi nani bolle maako. Nde mi ɗon nana bolle ɗe'e, faɗɗere hoosi yam, mi hippi dow lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi zia wen ko wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ tɛ wen'i, bele zara'm pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ mi ba sɔnti'm gu nu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi zia wen ko wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ tɛ wen'i, bele zara'm pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ mi ba sɔnti'm gu nu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa 'ya fate ŋwələa ŋkɛ. Ma va gaka ta ŋwələa ŋkɛ ne, pa mehele ta ɗa zanyɛ ba'a pa 'ya teɗe ɗa njifə kema mbe hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Ndi raw laa geçeçge waçaçre äe no. De maga ndi laa geçeçge waçaçre äen wo mono, ti äi raw ma' nen go, ndi raw le'ge de mbuë nen gesiñ.

Francais: Alors une main me toucha et me fit tenir, tout tremblant, sur mes genoux et mes mains.
Anglais: Then behold, a hand touched me and set me unsteadily on my  hands and knees.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Duw na kayni, ɓam tara kep tun tanu, musan kulo kay ŋulofonu hiɗi gifanu, tuwan ka van bat-bat'.
Bulu: Nde wo wo bi ma a telé me tetele me nyeñebaʼan.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, haŋ ngi mbur a sa wusiy, a slikiɗiy, a puliy dilak ti miliwis, haŋ jah jah da ruwuy, i ra jijik.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden juŋngo goɗɗo meemi yam, darni yam dow juuɗe am e koppi am nde mi ɗonno diwna tawon.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden juŋngo goɗɗo meemi yam, darni yam dow juuɗe am e koppi am nde mi ɗonno diwna tawon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma er bíí tama'm, ba'm e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mi gu zu naŋ-am nak nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma er bíí tama'm, ba'm e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mi gu zu naŋ-am nak nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa dzeve kwaɗakɛ ɗa ba'a kafakate ɗa, te və nya bare bare 'ya te yɛ ghəa shene ta ɗa ba'a yɛ hwə dzeve ta ɗa.
Tupurri: Kola do po raw du'ge me see, kal mañ mege go ciñ. Ndi de laa koyoçgre äi wo de do äi gesiñ da'ge ti'i.

Francais: Le personnage me dit : “Daniel, toi que Dieu aime, efforce-toi de comprendre le sens des paroles que je t’adresse. Tiens-toi debout, car c’est auprès de toi que j’ai été envoyé en cet instant.” A ces mots, je me mis debout en tremblant encore.
Anglais: So he said to me, “O Daniel, you highly regarded  and  greatly beloved man, understand the words that I am about to say to you and stand upright, for I have now been sent to you.” And while he was saying this word to me, I stood up trembling.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nam di tanu: Daniel, sa ma hayan kaŋŋa, humaŋ yoboyna ma nan min di taŋu: Colaŋ kulo kay seŋu hay liyn ma naŋ hayamna zawni; kay nan gi'ay taŋ wulini. Hay li ma nam dan yoboyn kayni dina, nan col kulo'o hiɗi tuwan van bat-bat'.
Bulu: Môt ate a nga jô me na: A Daniel Zambe a nyeʼe, vaʼa nguleya wôk atinane ya mejô ma kobô wo. Tebeʼe tetele, amu ba te lôme ma be wo awolo di.
Guiziga: Dar mbur tuwa a ɓiy: ‹Daniyel, ka mbur Buymisemuŋ mihĩyuw haɗa, cici deŋ ar li ɗike, yo cine mingiɓi ya maɓuw di na, asi wurenna, a slinoko ya le ng'avi ka.» Ti naŋ maɓiy ɓi nah na, i slikiɗ deŋ, i wus jaɓ jaɓ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o wi'i yam: “Daniyel, a ɗuuɗa-samanjo. Umma, faamu ko mi wi'ete e dara haa nokkuure nde ngonɗa ngam Allah neli yam haa maaɗa.” Nde o wi'i ɗum, mi ummi mi dari, mi ɗon diwna.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o wi'i yam: “Daniyel, a ɗuuɗa-samanjo. Umma, faamu ko mi wi'ete e dara haa nokkuure nde ngonɗa ngam Allah neli yam haa maaɗa.” Nde o wi'i ɗum, mi ummi mi dari, mi ɗon diwna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Wi’ɛi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Daniɛl, wi nɛ dee tɛ Sɔ̧, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ; mɛ̀ kúr mɛ̀ yór ŋgɔn wen mi a̧a̧ nɛ tom ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.› Tɛ wen'i, mi kura yor nɛ naka-tɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Wi’ɛi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Daniɛl, wi nɛ dee tɛ Sɔ̧, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ; mɛ̀ kúr mɛ̀ yór ŋgɔn wen mi a̧a̧ nɛ tom ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.› Tɛ wen'i, mi kura yor nɛ naka-tɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke wəndəa shɛ sha 'ya: «Daniyɛl, gha nya ɗe Shala, fave ghena nya mbe ghena nyi geze ŋa 'ya. Sate ŋa meslete, kwa nza ŋkɛ ke gha ghweneke ŋa geva 'ya tsetsenya.» Ma mba ŋkɛ kageze ɗa ghena ne, pelɛhetɛme 'ya sate te ŋkwa le bare bare.
Tupurri: Blam äe se kal riñ ndi gano: Danyele, je ma dage no, laa mbo wer waçaçre maga ndi day waçaç rage ne ndo mono. Oo go ti deele ti ngeel maga ndo ni mono, gahaçyla, aè äo' ndi le patala see äo. De maga aà waçaç waçaçre sen ne ndi mono, ndi kal urgi go ciñ ti deele deñ da'ge.

Francais: Il ajouta : “N’aie pas peur, Daniel ! Dès le premier jour où tu as manifesté ton humble soumission envers ton Dieu, en ayant à cœur de comprendre ce qui se passait, ta prière a été entendue et je me suis mis en route pour t’apporter la réponse.
Anglais: Then he said to me, “Do not be afraid, Daniel, for from the first day that you set your heart on understanding this and on humbling yourself before your God, your words were heard, and I have come in response to your words.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di tanu: Daniel, laŋ narɗi; kay tun caw tam buurta jewta ta naŋ fi hay dikaŋu kay huma, kay hot yaŋ gaa vok Lawna vaŋ pa, yoboyna vaŋ humisawa, nan co tan kayni kuɗ yoboyna vaŋu.
Bulu: A nga beta jô na: Te ko woñ a Daniel! Ataté môs ôsu ô nga suu womiene si mfaʼa Zambe wôé, a bi nkômbane ya yeme jam da lôt. Zambe a nga wôʼô meyeʼelane môé, a me nga zu na me ve wo éyalan.
Guiziga: A ɓiy na: ‹Ki zluwun ta Daniyel, asi mingiɓi ɗik a ndil le sesẽŋ avu Buymisemuŋ, zle ti ka mija a mevel ɗike, ɓa ki sla wala ngi ɓi, yo ki hin hirnga a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ na, ya muso na, vur ɓi nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o wi'i: “Taa hul, Daniyel! Allah ma nani do'a ma diga nyannde aranndeere nde tefɗa faamu e leesnuɗa hoore ma yeeso maako. Min mi wari ngam daliila do'a ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o wi'i: “Taa hul, Daniyel! Allah ma nani do'a ma diga nyannde aranndeere nde tefɗa faamu e leesnuɗa hoore ma yeeso maako. Min mi wari ngam daliila do'a ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ de kíì na, Daniɛl, wen ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ee so nɛ see-mɛ mɛ kii mgbara mɔ in nɛ mɛ mɔka nɛ see-mɛ ti Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, a̧ kpɛka kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen mɔ‘i a̧‘m tɛ nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ de kíì na, Daniɛl, wen ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ee so nɛ see-mɛ mɛ kii mgbara mɔ in nɛ mɛ mɔka nɛ see-mɛ ti Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, a̧ kpɛka kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen mɔ‘i a̧‘m tɛ nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke mtsehete: «Ghazlənəma na ma Daniyɛl ma! Kwa nza ŋkɛ ma se te kwa ghate ta hɛ nya ɗehwe fa wəsə nya kemenete geva ba'a nya shifəmte ghəa ŋa na kwa kema ta Shala ne, nahe səkwə ta ŋa kefate geva. Kezha zhɛne səkwə ta ŋa se 'ya.
Tupurri: Se day riñ ndi gano: Danyele, joñ heçeçne wa, gahaçyla, ti naw ma tañgu maga ndo ëig le äil äo ga ndo mo laa wer mopo, day ndo mo fer ti see äo gesiñ pel Baa äon mono, aè de laa waçaçre äon wo. Ndi a na diñ wer waçaçre äo sen wo.

Francais: Mais l’ange protecteur de l’empire perse s’est opposé à moi pendant vingt et un jours, jusqu’au moment où Michel , l’un des principaux anges, est venu à mon aide. J’ai donc été retenu auprès des rois de Perse.
Anglais: But the  prince of the kingdom of Persia was standing in opposition to me for twenty-one days. Then, behold, Michael, one of the chief [of the celestial] princes, came to help me, for I had been left there with the kings of Persia.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vi nagata vi Persiya col diganu ir buur dok-ma' yam kep; may wulin kayni Mikayel, kep jar sa ŋulona coowa kay gut kuɗanu, nan musi tani kat muliyana vi Persiya.
Bulu: Ve Engele a kamane njôane ya Perse, a nga tebe me ngame yat tañe melu mewôm mebaé a wua, a kui éyoñe Miké, wua ya minlô beéngele, a nga zu volô ma. Ajô te me nga tabe fefele bejô bôte ya Perse.
Guiziga: Yerima misi i modro ngi ruwuy Perse, a cici kaŋ kaŋ avu ya, hã hin kukur cuw ngaŋ kaˀa. Amma pura Misel, ngi wuzla modro mudumbuŋhoy, a so jiniy, joˀ yi sa ndir a ciki buy Perse.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa malaa'ikaajo aynoowo laamu Perezzi'en dartani yam nyalɗe noogas e go'o. Nden Mika'iilu , gooto nder hoore'en malaa'ika'en, wari, walli yam, mi jooɗi ton kommbi laamiiɓe Perezzi'en .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa malaa'ikaajo aynoowo laamu Perezzi'en dartani yam nyalɗe noogas e go'o. Nden Mika'iilu , gooto nder hoore'en malaa'ika'en, wari, walli yam, mi jooɗi ton kommbi laamiiɓe Perezzi'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko wannu Pɛrsɛ dee ŋgazu in am zɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ Michɛl ŋma kpɔk mgbara o gasa betom mɛ yiwese tɛɛ gbak am, ɓɛɛ mi ɓɔn kɔ‘m katɛ o wannu Pɛrsɛ hi̧i̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko wannu Pɛrsɛ dee ŋgazu in am zɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ Michɛl ŋma kpɔk mgbara o gasa betom mɛ yiwese tɛɛ gbak am, ɓɛɛ mi ɓɔn kɔ‘m katɛ o wannu Pɛrsɛ hi̧i̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe nde ya keya hɛɗia Pɛrse zhɛnete ɗa ghə kahɛ bakemsə kwetɛŋeghəmbe. Ama pa Mishɛl, kwete wəndəa mbelia jama ta ka ghwene ta Shala se kakemanakɛ ɗa. Tagha nza ɗa 'ya yitea ka meghea kɛfi nya mbe Pɛrse.
Tupurri: Je kluu  ma ti sir ma Persen hay giñ ndi nen naw do äog ti boñ ama, Misel, jobo yoo wañre ma kluurin wo boñ hay a kay mege, ndi raw hayge ni ye' see wañre ma Persen wo.

Francais: Et maintenant je viens pour te faire comprendre ce qui arrivera à ton peuple dans l’avenir, car voici encore une vision qui concerne ce temps-là.”
Anglais: Now I have come to make you understand what will happen to your people in the latter days, for the vision is in regard to the days yet to come.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulini nan coowa kay ɗekaŋ kay slen ma min li tam sumuna vaŋu hay buur ma min co voko; kay va min ɗek tuwam kiraŋ lo kay buur namna cani.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji ma zu bo wo na ô yeme jam da ye kui bôte bôé melu ma zu, amu ñyenan ôfe wu ô; fombôʼô éyoñe te.
Guiziga: Yi so na, ɓa ngi ɓuw ɓi ngi gwat masa gi tumbuŋ avu mizli ɗikey, asi ar hin masa gam tayna na, gwat ngi pur ti kleŋ ada pal aruŋ.›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi wari jonta ngam faamtingo ma ko heɓata ummaatoore ma yeeso ɗo ngam woodi boo wahayu ngam nyalɗe garanɗe ɗe'e.”
Fulfulde_DC: Mi wari jonta ngam faamtingo ma ko heɓata ummaatoore ma yeeso ɗo ngam woodi boo wahayu ngam nyalɗe garanɗe ɗe'e.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi tɛa mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-mɛ wen mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ; mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i biti.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi tɛa mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-mɛ wen mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ; mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i biti.›

Francais: Et maintenant, voici le message digne de foi que j’ai à te transmettre : “Trois rois vont se succéder au gouvernement de la Perse, suivis d’un quatrième qui accumulera des richesses plus grandes encore que ses prédécesseurs. Anglais: And now I will tell you the truth. Behold,  three more kings are going to arise in Persia. Then a  fourth will become far richer than all of them. When he becomes strong through his riches he will stir up the whole  empire  against the realm of Greece.

Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya gɛ ne, 'ya kageze ŋa kaganda. Katedzedzete meghe ka meghea kɛfi mahekene mbe Pɛrse, zhɛne ne, katetsene mcɛlə nde wəfaɗe za ma ke pɛtɛa kweci. Ma vəa ŋkwa nya tendeke nda berete mcɛləa ŋkɛ ne, katezele yayata ntsehwele ŋkɛ kezha ha nda mpa ke hɛɗia Grɛse.
Tupurri: Patala ndi day na sii waçaçre ma cwaçyn go ne ndo so: Ko ga wañre kol ge wo yañ ti sir ma Persen swa'a, day blam äe ma de naan sen tay ge horog yañ debañ de dañ ma lan wo. Day de maga aà kol ge we go de eegre diñ wer horog äen wo no, se mbuë gi nen yañ go äuy tu diñ de wañ sir ma Yafan  no.

Francais: Mais un guerrier deviendra roi de Grèce . A la tête d’un empire étendu, il agira comme bon lui semblera.
Anglais: Then a  mighty [warlike, threatening] king will arise who will rule with great authority and do as he pleases.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May mul ma dono ŋolo ma fok kulo'o, ma ti mulda hiɗi gaŋeraŋ ŋolo, nam ma li va ma nam mina.
Bulu: Ve mbene ya mewosan wo ye bo njô bôte ya Grés. A ye bo nlô ya éjôé é ne ndam a a ye bo avalʼa yene mvaé.
Guiziga: Amma buy migidaŋ a sa bo tir ruwuy Greke, a sa zuma buyo ka naŋ muwuɗu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa laamiiɗo cemmbiɗɗo waran. Kaŋko o laamoto bee baawɗe mawɗe, o waɗan ko o yiɗi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa laamiiɗo cemmbiɗɗo waran. Kaŋko o laamoto bee baawɗe mawɗe, o waɗan ko o yiɗi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: « ‹Mɔ kpɔk, ŋma ŋga wannu tɛ kur tɛ nu Grɛk; nu kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gasi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de mɔ hee see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: « ‹Mɔ kpɔk, ŋma ŋga wannu tɛ kur tɛ nu Grɛk; nu kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gasi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de mɔ hee see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama katedzete meghe katsala sewajɛ mbe Grɛse. Katesleke hɛɗi nya bezle ŋkɛ ba'a katemene wəsə nya ɗe ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ama wañ po ma de jiili kol ge yañ, joñ ge wañ yañ de eegre day joñ ge fen maga äil äe dan yañ.

Francais: Toutefois, quand il sera bien établi, son pouvoir royal sera brisé et son royaume sera disloqué aux quatre coins de l’horizon. Ce ne sont pas ses descendants qui lui succéderont : le pouvoir royal sera réparti entre d’autres gens , mais ceux-ci n’atteindront pas la puissance qu’il avait.
Anglais: But as soon as he (Alexander) has risen, his kingdom will be broken [by his death] and divided toward the four winds of heaven [the north, south, east, and west], but not to his descendants, nor according to the [Grecian] authority with which he ruled, for his kingdom will be torn out  and  uprooted and given to  others (his four generals) to the exclusion of these.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nam ma sli yalam kulo'o, mulda valamu ma ɓet goyo, ma ɓuraw goy jar simeɗ ma fiɗina vi dukalawna, na' ma hin hay jafam loɗi, ma li dono'o ki nam ay naɗi kaw, kay mulda valamu ma jet goyo, na' ma vulis goy tam sara'a kaw.
Bulu: Ve da na, éyoñ a maneya tuʼa telé éjôé jé, ngule njôane jé ja ye buʼi a éjôé jé ja ye kabane ngab ényin. Saake bôte ya mvoñe jé mbe ba ye tyendé nye: Ngule njôan ja ye kaban e be bôte befe, ve balé bete teke kui abime ngu a nga bili.
Guiziga: Da naŋ misa cifi le kuy kuy ar buyo na, gidaŋ nga naŋ ngi zuma buyo a sa kiɗi, zumabuy naŋ a sa wuɗkaka asi gazlavay kuɗgulum gar. Anta i dideˀ naŋhay masa zumaka li naŋ ta, anta sa ndilaka gidaŋ nga naŋ miwi di mizli zleˀe na ta, asi zumabuy nga naŋ a sa kiɗi, anta sa mo ng'asi haŋ taŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To o tabiti, laamu maako do'oto, senndoto haa alkibilaaji nayi fuu. Yimɓe danygol maako keɓataa ngu, baawɗe maagu boo ustan, ngu wilete, woɗɓe laamoto pellel maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: To o tabiti, laamu maako do'oto, senndoto haa alkibilaaji nayi fuu. Yimɓe danygol maako keɓataa ngu, baawɗe maagu boo ustan, ngu wilete, woɗɓe laamoto pellel maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ ŋgai a̧ wan'i tɛ ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ dam mgbii-zan naar lɛŋ. Mɔɔ-wan'i tɛ ye nɛ er o ŋma bíí nɛtɛ nɛ beka kpa ŋgai hee nɛti ga na; mɔɔ-wan'i beka pii ɗoŋ er o bezaŋ-aa ɓɔna mbɛt.
